description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。半導體元件、整流電路、電晶體和電路、運算放大器、線性積體電路、邏輯元件、數位電路、數位積體電路、微處理器、放大器等。
description.en: Semiconduction Device, Rectifier circuit, Transistor Circuit, Operational Amplifier, Linear Integrated Circuit, logic Device, Digital Circuit, Digital Integrated Circuit, Micro Processor, Amplifier, etc.

description.zh: (A) 熱工實驗：能量轉換、熱之傳遞、對流及輻射、熱交換器、燃燒及燃料等之實驗。(B) 流力實驗：雷諾數實驗、管路摩擦實驗 (損失係數)、管路能量損失實驗 (90° 彎管、小半徑彎管、大半徑彎管、突擴、突縮)、文氏管流量實驗、孔口板流量實驗、壓力量測實驗、堰流量實驗、pump 性能曲線實驗、壓力中心實驗、風洞實驗 (升力、阻力係數)。
description.en: (A) Thermal Lab.Thermal experiments include energy transformation, heat conduction, convection, and radiation, heat exchanger, combustion, etc. (B) Fluid Mechanics Lab.Reynolds’s Number test, Pipe friction test (loss coefficient), Pipe energy loss test (90°miter, elbow, sudden enlargement and contraction), Venturi meter flow measurement, Orifice flow measurement, Pressure measurement, Wear flow measurement, Pump performance test, Pressure center test, Wind tunnel experiments (lift and drag coefficient).

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。自動控制數學基礎、物理系統的數學模式、控制器的種類、時域分析、穩定性分析、根軌跡法、頻率領域的分析、控制系統的設計、Z 轉換、數位控制、電腦控制之介面及程式、現代控制理論與簡介。
description.en: Mathematical Foundation of Automatic Control, Mathematical Model of Physical System, Controller Type, Time-Domain Analysis, Stability Analysis, Root Locus Method, Frequency-Domain Analysis, Design of Control System, Z-Transform, Digital Control, Interface and Programming of Computer Control, Theory and Introduction of Modern Control.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。半導體元件、整流電路、電晶體和電路、運算放大器、線性積體電路、邏輯元件、數位電路、數位積體電路、微處理器、放大器等。
description.en: Semiconduction Device, Rectifier circuit, Transistor Circuit, Operational Amplifier, Linear Integrated Circuit, logic Device, Digital Circuit, Digital Integrated Circuit, Micro Processor, Amplifier, etc.

description.en: Mathematical Foundation of Automatic Control, Mathematical Model of Physical System, Controller Type, Time-Domain Analysis, Stability Analysis, Root Locus Method, Frequency-Domain Analysis, Design of Control System, Z-Transform, Digital Control, Interface and Programming of Computer Control, Theory and Introduction of Modern Control.

description.zh: 為了訓練學生獨立思考與判斷能力，培養健全人格，提升人文涵養，延續通識教育六大向度的核心課程，在各向度均規劃了一系列的博雅選修課程，提供學生更多的選擇，以建立學生開闊的視野及達成全人教育的精神。
description.en: To train students have the abilities of independent thinking and judgment, develop the healthy personality and Humanities conservation, and keep the six fields of core curriculum in general education. this course will design a series of optional curriculum on Erudition & Refinement in each field, and develop students the broader sight and reach the spirit of the holistic education.

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 為了訓練學生獨立思考與判斷能力，培養健全人格，提升人文涵養，延續通識教育六大向度的核心課程，在各向度均規劃了一系列的博雅選修課程，提供學生更多的選擇，以建立學生開闊的視野及達成全人教育的精神。

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 1. 無線通訊簡介 2. 無線通訊之現況與未來發展 3. 峰巢式行動電話概論 4. 無線傳輸簡介 5. 行動電話之技術 6. 無線通訊系統與標準 7. 衛星行動通訊及其應用 8. 第三代行動通訊重要技術之導論
description.en: 1.Understanding Wireless 2.The Current and Future Developments of Wireless   Communications3.The Cellular Concepts 4.Introduction to Mobile Radio   Propagation 5.Cellular Technologies 6.Wireless Systems and Standards7.Satellits Communications Technology and Its Implementaion 8.The Key Technologies of the Trird Generation Mobile   Communication Systems

description.zh: 為了訓練學生獨立思考與判斷能力，培養健全人格，提升人文涵養，延續通識教育六大向度的核心課程，在各向度均規劃了一系列的博雅選修課程，提供學生更多的選擇，以建立學生開闊的視野及達成全人教育的精神。

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 本課程探討現代通訊的基本原理，內容重點放在類比通訊的調變技巧與雜訊分析．課程大綱包括：1. 簡介 2. 信號與系統 3. 機率、隨機程序與雜訊 4. 振幅調變：雙旁波帶、調幅、單旁波帶與殘旁波帶 5. 角度調變：頻率調變與相位調變 6. 脈波調變：脈幅調變、脈寬調變、脈位調變、脈碼調變與步差調變 7. 數位通訊簡介對於數位通訊有進一步興趣的同學可繼續選修『數位通訊系統』課程
description.en: Fundamental principles of modern communication will be investigated in depth in this course, with emphasis on analog communications.Basic modulation techniques will be introduced with nosie analysis.Contents include1.Introduction 2.Signals and Systems3.Probability ,Random Process,and Nosie4.Amplitude Modulations:DSB,AM,SSB,and VSB5.Angle Modulations:FMand PM6.Pulse Modulations:PAM,PWM,PPM,PCM,and DM7.Intorduction to Digital Communication Students who want to know more details sbout digital commmunication are encouraged to take the course Digital Communication Systems

description.zh: 1. 積體電路的分類，2. 積體電路晶片設計的流程，3.CMOS 元件的基本結構與佈局，4.CMOS 元件的設計規範技術，5.CMOS 元件組成各種數位電路，6. 以高階方法探討積體電路之設計，7. 系統分割，8. 設計問題之探討，9.IC 的構造， 10. 設計方法，11. 時序問題之探討，12. 鐘脈問題之探討，13.VLSI 之測試，14. 有助於設計與測試的結構化技巧探討，15. 專題製作。
description.en: 1.Classification of VLSI circuit 2.Flow of VLSI design 3.VLSI characterization 4.CMOS design methods5.CMOS digital circuit 6.High-level VLSI design7.System partiton 8.Time squence9.Clock10.VLSI testing 11.Special projects

description.zh: 介紹設施規劃，合理化的觀念、原理、方法步驟，舊規劃合理化的理由、重要性、方法及步驟。設施搬運系統及位置的遴選、及其考慮因素及決定方法
description.en: This course introduces the concepts, theories, and approaches of facilities planning.  Material handling and site selection are also included.

description.zh: 顧客關係管理主要目的是了解企業與顧客之關係，促使顧客滿意及忠誠回應而產生終身價值，進而提昇企業獲利，其內容包括顧客關係管理的概念與本質、顧客行為、顧客資料探勘、顧客關係管理系統、顧客關係管理專案之規劃與管理、顧客關係管理的績效衡量、顧客關係管理實務研討。商業智慧 (Business Intelligence, BI)，是企業利用現代資訊技術收集、管理和分析結構化與非結構化的企業資料與資訊，創造和累積企業知識與見解，以改善企業決策品質與採取有效的企業行動，進而提升企業各方面績效。由基本現場管理 (Shop Floor Control) 需求談起，然後介紹製造資訊分類與收集技術（包括 RFID），也將包括資料庫與資料倉儲觀念，最後介紹 BI 於顧客關係管理之應用。課堂中也將輔以目前市面上商用 BI 套裝軟體，並將其專業上相關資訊在此系統上實際應用，體驗 BI 對企業之重要性。
description.en: The objectives of Customer Relationship Management (CRM) are to study the relationship between corporation and customer, to increase the profit by customer lifetime value through customer satisfaction and royalty. The topics of this course includes concepts and context of CRM, consumer behavior, customer data mining, CRM system, planning and management of CRM projects, performance measurement of CRM. Business intelligence (BI) systems refer to applications and technologies which gather and analyze data about company operations. It then provides a comprehensive correlation of those factors, such as metrics on sales, production, internal operations, and helps managers to make better business decisions. This course focuses on applications of BI in CRM, with the introduction of shop floor control concepts and data collection techniques such as RFID, along with database and data warehouse concepts. Hands-on experience in BI software implementation is also emphasized.

name.zh: 顧客關係管理與商業智慧
name.en: Customer Relationship Management and Business Intelligence

description.zh: 本課程介紹環境之物理及人因相關因素對人員生理及肌肉骨骼系統之影響。內容包括噪音與噪音防治、氣溫等大氣狀況、振動與加速度、環境照明、人體計測與工作 / 工作空間設計等相關內容。課程目的在使修課學生了解工業環境與作業負荷對於人員之影響，進而於職場建立有效之因應對策。使學生能夠 a. 瞭解工作場所主要人因工程危害因子 (包括採光照明、噪音振動、極端溫濕環境、異常氣壓等物理因子及肌肉骨骼危害因子)、法規要求、量測 / 計算方法、評估與控制策略、以及相對應的預防措施。b. 具有評估及分析工業環境物理性與肌肉骨骼危害因子及擬訂其控制及預防對策的能力。
description.en: This course introduces physical and musculoskeletal effects of various environmental and ergonomic factors on humans. Lectures cover topics of noise and noise control, environmental temperature, vibration and acceleration measurements, environmental illumination, and work design. This course aims to cultivate students to identify different types of ergonomic risk factors (e.g. luminance, extreme temperatures, abnormal pressure, noise, vibration, musculoskeletal hazards) that can present in the work environment and to learn the related regulation requirements, risk assessment tools, and hazard control strategies.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意學生與教授討論擬定專題研究的題目，在教授的個別指導下，進行實驗研究，並將研究結果寫成報告。
description.en: The topic of the special projects is discussed and together by the students and advisor. Under the face-to -face instruction of the advisor the student will conduct the research and experiments, and the final report at the end of the semester.

description.zh: 本門課內容包括以下﹕能量與動力原理，燃料與燃燒簡介，鍋爐與熱交換器簡介，渦輪機與內燃機，核能與水力發電動力廠
description.en: This course is an introduction to the following topics﹔principles of energy and power, fuels and combustion, boiler and heat exchanger, turbine and internal combustion systems, nuclear and hydraulic power plants.

description.zh: 進階冰水主機實習、進階冷凍工程實習、進階中央空調系統實習、空調設備工程品質管理實務、進階空調工程實習。
description.en: Advanced practices and experiments of water chiller unit, refrigeration engineering, central air conditioning system, quality control of air conditioning facilities, and air conditioning engineering.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。電路元件、直流電路、交流電路、電磁感應、直流電機、變壓器、三相交流、三相感應電動機、單相感應電動機、同步電動機、特殊電機、電工儀表、電工法規。
description.en: ME113 Introduction to Electrical Engineering (3-0-3)Prerequisite: Consent of Instructor Circuit Components, DC Circuit, AC Circuit, Electro-magnet Induction,DC Electric Machines, Transformers, Three-Phase AC, Three-Phase Induction Motors, Single-Phase Induction Motors, Synchronous Motors,Special Electric Machines, And Electrical Instrument and Meters.

description.zh: 電腦概論與程式語言簡介，認識 Visual BASIC，即時運算視窗與基本運算，常數與變數，表單製作與程式，基本的輸入與輸出功能，結構化程式設計與流程圖，選擇結構與訊息方塊，工具箱與控制向介紹，重覆結構，捲軸與清單的應用，陣列及資料排序與搜尋，副程式與函數，內建函數，資料檔的應用，功能表、多表單與資料庫應用。
description.en: Prerequisite: ME150 or Consent of Instructor Computer Languages: C, QBASIC, FORTRAN or LISP (Compiler or Interpreter), including Statements of Flow Control: (Sequence, Selection and Iteration), Basic Data Type, Input/Output Statements of subprograms(Parameters Called by Value and Address), Array, String and Pointer Struct, Union and File, and How to Design a Large Program (Project, Memory Mode, Library).

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。物質熱力學特性、改變能量形式之基本原理、熱力學第一及第二定律、可逆性與可用性、動力循環、冷凍循環、混合氣、化學反應。
description.en: Prerequisite: Consent of InstructorThermodynamic Properties of Substance, Energy Forms, The First Law Thermodynamics, The Second Law of Thermodynamics, Irreversibility & Availability, Power Cycle, Refrigeration Systems, Mixtures, and Chemical Reactions.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。介紹產品製造的程序和各種加工方法，及使用的機械設備、製造過程材料及製程參數的影響，製程規劃及製造成本的因素、產品檢驗量測技術及品質管制的方法、製程自動化及電腦整合製造系統等。
description.en: Introduction to a variety of manufacturing processes and associated production equipments, operations planning and cost estimating of the production process, techniques of measurements and basic components of a quality control  system, concepts of process automation and computer integrated manufacturing.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。

The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。介紹產品製造的程序和各種加工方法，及使用的機械設備、製造過程材料及製程參數的影響，製程規劃及製造成本的因素、產品檢驗量測技術及品質管制的方法、製程自動化及電腦整合製造系統等。
description.en: Introduction to a variety of manufacturing processes and associated production equipments, operations planning and cost estimating of the production process, techniques of measurements and basic components of a quality control  system, concepts of process automation and computer integrated manufacturing.

description.zh: 本課程之教學目標在使學生瞭解信號與系統之基本概念及分析方法，以作為控制，通訊，電子電路，濾波器設計及數位信號處理等課程修習之基礎。課程內容包含：(1) 標準訊號及訊號表示法 (2) 連續系統的數學分析 (3) 離散系統的數學分析 (4) 拉氏轉換分析 (5) Z - 轉換分析 (6) 傅立葉分析 (7) 工程應用。
description.en: course title : signals and systemsdescription : this course contains the properties of signals , systems , LTI systems , and basis linear transforms . this is a basic course in the field of control and communication .

Course Title:MicroprocessorDescription:This course introduces the working principles of computer.It puts emphasis on both hardware and software, as well as both theoryand appplication. Basically, this course covers the introduction ofgeneral microprocessors:their architecture and operation, Assemblylanguage program and module program, instruction addressing mode,instruction operation, and I/O Program and interface. Morespecifically, multi-programming configuration and multi-processingconfiguration are also discussed here. New topics will be added ifneeded.

description.zh: 通論，基本理論，傳輸線參數，傳輸線的數學模式，變壓器的數學模式及標么值系統，對稱成分，對稱三相故障，非對稱故障，負載潮流分析與控制，電力系統之經濟運轉，發電機之數學模式，電力系統穩定度，電壓控制系統，電力控制系統，系統保護。
description.en: Introduction, Basic principles, Transmission line parameters, Line model, power flow analysis, optimal dispatch of generation

description.zh: 探討各種電機特性及工作原理，內容包含：(1) 磁路分析 (2) 電機 - 機械能量轉換 (3) 繞組及氣隙磁動勢 (4) 繞組電感及電壓方程式 (5) 繞組因數 (6) 直流機 (7) 感應機 (8) 同步機。
description.en: Course Title:Electric MachineryDescription:Principles, Construction and Application of transformer,DC motors, DC generators, induction motors, induction generators,synchronous motors and synchronous generators.

description.zh: 最佳化組合邏輯之演算法，可規劃邏輯元件，組合邏輯之 VLSI 設計，使用 MSI 與標準電路元件設計多層邏輯，使用閘陣列設計，循序邏輯之元件，循序邏輯之分析與合成，VLSI 之設計與測試技巧，各種 CALD 軟體工具介紹。
description.en: 1.Algorithms for Optimization of combirational logic2.VLSI realizations of combination logic3.Multilevel logic using complex parts and cells.4.Components of sequential systems5.Synthesis of clock-mode sequential circuits.

description.zh: 半導體開關在電力電子電路之作用，波形失真與諧波分析，DC-DC 轉換器，AC-DC 轉換器，DC-AC 轉換器。
description.en: 1.power semiconductor switches. 2.waveform distortion  & harmonic analysis. 3.DC-DC converter. 4.AC-DC converter. 5.DC-AC converter.

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的人文素養。透過文學概論、藝術概論與文化概論等相關課程，引導學生探索文學的妙趣，欣賞藝術的美質，瞭解文化的傳統。從古典到現代，從本土到世界，從物質到心靈，建構多元化的文化視野。以臺灣為出發點，搜尋未知的世界地圖，找到人們必然駐足的角落，以及自己不可缺席的人文風景。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste and the cultural cultivation of our students. Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. From classic to modern, from local to universe, from material to spirit, we want to construct multiple cultural views. Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

name.zh: 博雅核心課程 - 文化
name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Culture

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生對歷史這門學科有一通盤、系統的認識，以便讓學生瞭解歷史的思維取向，增加個人的歷史意識。並在歷史學門的領域中，提供數門基礎及進階課程，供同學選修，以期同學從課程的學習中，理解台灣、中國乃至世界文明的進程與發展，剖析歷史學與現實的互動，提昇學生批判思考之能力。
description.en: This course focuses on getting the students familiar with the academic field of history in a more comprehensive and systematic view. The students are stimulated to think and make judgment with a view to "knowing the history," adding to a better sense of history. Further, they are guided to select some  courses in the field of history, including the formation and changes of the of Taiwan China and the World-as well as interactions between history and the reality-thus enhancing their critical ability to think and judge.

name.zh: 博雅核心課程 - 歷史
name.en: Core Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：History

description.zh: 1. 訊號時域與須域特性的量測  7.  類比訊號的取樣與重整 2. 比式濾波器的設計          8.  脈幅調變系統 3. 雙旁波帶 AM 調變系統        9.  脈碼調變系統 4. 單旁波帶 AM 調變系統        10. 數位通頻傳輸 5. FM 調變系統與解調          11. 訊號多工的傳送與接收 6. 鎖相迴路檢波器的設計      12. 通訊系統的設計與模擬
description.en: The lab course is designed for supplementing the lecture course'Communication Systems' and 'Digital Communication Systems'.sStudents can learn the principles and practive of analog and digital communication systems from laboratory experiments and projects.The cintents include1.measuremnts of signals in time domain and frequency domain 2.design of analog filters3.double sideband AM systems4.single sideband AM systems5.FM systems6.dessign of phase-locked-loop detectors7.sampling and regeneration of analog signals8.pulse amplitude modulation(PAM)systems9.pulse coded modulation(PCM)systems10.digital passband transmission11.multiplexing systems12.design and simulation of communication systems

description.zh: 使學生熟悉，應用程式設計之環境、方法、及原則，內容含：（１）作業系統與應用程式之關係（２）視窗環境（３）網路環境（４）整合設計學生將窗撰寫完整之應用程式
description.en: To familiarize the student with the environments,methodologies,and principles of application softwaredesign.Topics include :1.Run-time environments2.Window environments3.Networking environments4.Integrated designThe student will write application programs with actual function.

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 1. 資料表示法：定點系統 (Fixed Point System)，浮點系統 (Floating Point System)，2. 運算工作：定點之加減乘除，快速之運算，浮點運算，3. 指令與控制：各種指令介紹，中斷，硬體控制單元設計 (Hardwired Control)，微程式控制單元設計 (Microprogramming)，4. 記憶系統：記憶體之層次 (Memory Hierarchy)，虛擬記憶系統 (Virtualmemory)，快速記憶 (Cache Memory)。
description.en: 1.Data representation 2.Logic operations3.Command and control4.Memory organization5.Processor organization

description.zh: 1. 傅利葉分析與訊號取樣，2. 離散時序系統之頻率響應與電路設計， 3. Infinite Impulse Response 數位濾波器設計：Bilinear 轉換式，Impulse-invariance 方式，Step-invariance 方式，高通、帶通、帶拒濾波器轉換式，4.Finite Impulse Response 數位濾波器設計：FourierSeries 方法，Window 方法，5. 離散與快速傅利葉轉換：DFT、FFT 等演算法。
description.en: 1.Fourier analysis and signal sampling2.Frequcy response of discrete time system3.IIR digital filter design4.FIR digital filter design5.Discrete fourier transform6.Fast fourier transform

description.zh: 1. 時變電磁場之介紹；2. 平面電磁波；3. 傳輸線之理論及應用；4. 導波管與共振腔；5. 天線與輻射系統。
description.en: 1.Introduction to Time-Varying Fields;2.Plane Electromagnetic Waves;3.Theory and Applications of Transmission Lines;4.Waveguides and Resonators;5.Antennas and Radiating Systems.

description.zh: 本課程探討現代通訊的基本原理，內容重點放在類比通訊的調變技巧與雜訊分析．課程大綱包括：1. 簡介 2. 信號與系統 3. 機率、隨機程序與雜訊 4. 振幅調變：雙旁波帶、調幅、單旁波帶與殘旁波帶 5. 角度調變：頻率調變與相位調變 6. 脈波調變：脈幅調變、脈寬調變、脈位調變、脈碼調變與步差調變 7. 數位通訊簡介對於數位通訊有進一步興趣的同學可繼續選修『數位通訊系統』課程
description.en: Fundamental principles of modern communication will be investigated in depth in this course, with emphasis on analog communications.Basic modulation techniques will be introduced with nosie analysis.Contents include1.Introduction 2.Signals and Systems3.Probability ,Random Process,and Nosie4.Amplitude Modulations:DSB,AM,SSB,and VSB5.Angle Modulations:FMand PM6.Pulse Modulations:PAM,PWM,PPM,PCM,and DM7.Intorduction to Digital Communication Students who want to know more details sbout digital commmunication are encouraged to take the course Digital Communication Systems

description.zh: 1. 展頻和錯誤控制碼簡介 2. 頻率再使用和細胞概念 3. 無線電傳播環境 4. 同通道干擾 5. 涵蓋 6. 頻譜效率和容量 7. 通道模型 8. 分集 9. 二代細胞式行動通訊標準
description.en: 1.Introduction to spread spectrum communications and error control codes 2.Frequency reuse and cellular concepts 3.Mobile radio propagation environment 4.Co-channel interference 5.Coverage 6.Spectral efficiency and capacity 7.Propagation modeling 8.Diversity 9.2G cellular standards

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 本課程之目的為使學生瞭解生產計畫與管制的基本概念，訓練學生對於生產計畫與管制的各項方法，制度設計及改善等具有基本認識，並應用管理科學及作業研究於生產計畫與管制之研究發展。本課程包括下列主題：生產計畫與管制概論、產品設計與發展、預測、來源需求規畫、生產排程、總排程、存貨管理、豐田式管理、專案規畫與管理等。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to introduce the fundamental concepts of production planning and control.  In addition, applications of management science and operations research in production control and planning are also provided.  This course is consisted of the following subjects: introduction, product design and development, forecasting, resources requirement planning, production scheduling, total scheduling, inventory management, Toyota management, and project management.

description.zh: 本課程的目的將藉由五個面向了解企業倫理的本質，分別為：從全球化角度認知社會可接受的商業行為，將待人和善深植於良好的企業中，企業形象再造，強化職業倫理以及投資於可持續發展和有社會責任的公司。本課程亦教導學生瞭解今日快速變化工商界，符合企業倫理的公司治理原則與方式。課程的教導將朝下列五個方向進行：（1）廠商的社會責任（如：產品綠化與環境保護），（2）消費者的保護（如：產品的安全性），（3）員工的權益（如：職業健康），（4）員工對公司的責任（如：利益衝突），（5）雇主與員工關係（如：性別平等）。
description.en: The objective of this course is to appreciate the essential of Business Ethics through five main faucets: recognizing socially acceptable business conduct from the global perspectives, embedding good business in treating people nice and fair, reengineering corporate image, enhancing professional ethics, and investing in sustainable and socially responsible corporations. This course also discusses with the students the corporate governance that follows business ethics in today's changing business society. Five major categories will be covered: (1) Corporate Social Responsibility (e.g., Green product and environmental protection), (2) Consumer protection (e.g., Product safety), (3) Employee's rights and benefits (e.g., Occupational health), (4) Responsibility of employee to the firms (e.g., Conflict of interest), and (5) Employer-employee relations (e.g., Gender equity).

description.zh: 本課程在二技為品質管理。使學生瞭解品質管理的觀念、原理、領域。品管部門的組織、功能，如何管理產品或服務的品質，品管的工具、方法，如何持續改善品質的方法，品質表示法，如何評估品質管理成效，相關法令，品質管理未來趨勢。
description.en: This course lets the students understand the concepts, theories, and areas of qualify control, organization and functions of quality department.  Besides, the way to manage the products or the service quality, tools and methods of quality control, the way to improve the quality, quality representation method, evaluation of quality control, related regulations and future trends are also included.

description.zh: 本課程提供學生學習下列技術：低成本自動化，應用於自動化之元件與設備的認識，氣壓控制技術，可程式控制器，生產線機器連線整合控制實務，自動化生產技術。
description.en: This course provides students with the following technologies: low cost automation components, pneumatic control, programmable logic controller, the practical control of integrated production line, and automation production technology.

description.zh: 本課程探討企業管理之基本課題，除了作業面外，也包含管理策略面。
description.en: This course discusses the fundamental issues regarding the business management.  Both the operational and managerial levels are covered.

description.zh: 排程主要在規劃與排定活動執行的優先順序，以使各項資源得到最佳的運用。本課程主要在介紹生產排程的基本理論與方法，使學生奠定排程研究與排程實務問題解決的基礎。
description.en: Scheduling consists of planning and prioritizing activities that need to be performed in an orderly sequence of operation. It is a tool that optimizes use of available resources. This course focuses on the basic concept on scheduling. The purpose of this course is to guide the students to learn the basic methodologies of scheduling, and to understand the scheduling application aspects.

description.zh: 本課程包含 ERP 系統演進， ERP 系統軟硬體結構，及家具製造業管理智慧系統。
description.en: This course includes: ERP development history, ERP software and hardware infrastructures, and  Furniture  manufacture  industry management intelligence system..

name.en: Enterprise Resource Planning for Furniture  Manufacture  Industry

description.zh: 本課程藉由家具相關設計競賽活動或產學合作計畫案，讓學生實際演練家具設計程序及創新方法。本課程同時配合家具材料、家具結構與實習、家具製圖、電腦輔助家具設計等課程，期能習得家具創新設計與產品工程的能力。
description.en: The course through furniture design contest or industry-academy cooperation project, let students practice the design procedure and creative methods. The course coordinate the other courses: furniture construction and practice, furniture drawing, computer aided furniture design etc, expect getting the capability of creativity design and product engineering.

description.zh: 創造家具工業新的工業技術並將銷售與產品體驗統合起來，建立具有適應性、資源效率的智慧型工廠，並在商業流程及價值流程中整合客戶以及商業夥伴，提供完善的服務。
description.en: The creation of new industrial technology and sales experience and product integration furniture industry together to build smart factory adaptable, resource efficiency, and integrate customers and business partners in the business process and value stream, to provide better services.

notes: 排一般教室，1 週【停開】

description.zh: 從展示空間之規劃過程讓學生了解規劃的基礎概念及空間設計之實務，以達到展示之最佳效果，例如施工設計、色彩、照明、空間結構、展示佈置以及櫥窗設計等展示效果。
description.en: This course develops the students understanding of the exhibition design process and practical experience such as lighting, coloring, space structure, arrangement and construction, and show window design.

description.zh: 介紹家具產銷體系從原始概念、產品發展以迄賣到最後消費者手中所 涉及之種種。課程內容包括行銷研究、產品開發、標價計畫、配銷、 廣告促銷以及行銷計畫等。
description.en: An introduction to furniture production and marketing systems. Emphasis is on the role of marketing in a managerial context. Areas studied include: Product development, marketing research and information systems, pricing, adverising, promotion, distribution and inventory management.

description.zh: 應用試作技術課程之試作技術，進行家具相關設計圖面實體模型之材料加工、組裝實作。
description.en: To practice product model making techniques. Based on furniture product working drawing, design students can practice model making techniques with different materials and processing methods.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意學生與教授討論擬定專題研究的題目，在教授的個別指導下，進行實驗研究，並將研究結果寫成報告。
description.en: The topic of the special projects is discussed and together by the students and advisor. Under the face-to -face instruction of the advisor the student will conduct the research and experiments, and the final report at the end of the semester.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 計算機系統之基礎觀念介紹及應用。主要內容包括：計算機系統簡介，，資料的表示法、數字系統、邏輯，周邊裝置及儲存體，程式語言與程式設計，作業系統，檔案與資料庫。本課程引入程式設計的觀念與方法，於熟習基本程式語法後，再導入進階程式語言。著重邏輯思考與程式設計能力之訓練，同時輔以程式設計過程所應注意之程式結構、偵錯、可攜性、軟體工程的基本概念，使修習者得以奠定程式設計之基礎。
description.en: This introductory course covers the fundamentals and applications of computers, including: introduction to computer systems, data representation, number systems, and logic, peripherals and storage,  programming languages and programming, operating systems, files and database systems. This course introduces to the students the basic computer programming concepts. Syntax and semantics of the programming language.

name.zh: 計算機概論與程式設計
name.en: Introduction to Computer Science and Programming

description.zh: 由介紹基本熱傳有關現象，配合熱力守恆有關公式之應用，討論各種熱交換環境下應考慮之因素，分析熱傳導、熱對流、熱輻射及相變熱傳之計算方法。並將要更深入地探討在各不同熱傳導系統內所可能形成之熱力分佈現象，以期學習者能以淺入深地對相關熱傳導系統工程設計上培養出最佳能力。
description.en: Introduction of basic heat transfer phenomena, using thermodynamic conservation equations to discuss the parameters under different heat exchange circumstances, heat conduction, heat convection, heat radiation and phase change are analyzed, discussion in depth on the heat transfer problems in application to cultivate heat transfer design capability.

description.zh: 各種冷煤壓縮機簡介，容積式壓縮機效率分析，離心式壓縮機分析，各種送風機簡介，送風機應用，泵之應用分析。
description.en: Introduction to refrigerant compressors, efficiency analysis of volumetric compressors, analysis of centrifugal compressors, introduction to fans, applications of fans, and application of pumps.

description.zh: 介紹系統分析的基本概念及方法，深入熟悉開發一個電腦化資訊系統之方法及步驟。包含：系統分析、系統設計、系統建置、系統運轉、系統評鑑等之實施方式及步驟。
description.en: This course introduces the basic concepts and approaches of systems analysis including systems analysis, systems design, systems establishment, and systems evaluation and testing.

description.zh: 財務報表所反映的是企業的經營績效，不同的產業有不同的特質、不同的經營環境，即使在相同的產業中，企業若採行不同的競爭策略，在財務報表上也會有不同的表現。本課程的主要目的是要使學生了解如何透過財務報表，來評估企業的經營績效與價值。本課程將介紹以下內容：1) 基本財務報導與特別科目的報導與分析 2) 基本分析理論 3) 償債能力、獲利能力、經營能力、資本結構、現金流量的分析 4) 特殊行業的財務報表分析 5) 探討我國最近發佈的 7 號、34 號及 35 號會計準則公報對企業與投資人的影響。
description.en: The goal of this course is to help students evaluate the performance and measure the values of firms by financial statements. The topics of this course includes 1) financial reports and analysis of special accounting subjects; 2) basic financial statement analysis; 3) solvency, profitability, business performance, financial structure and cash flow analysis; 4) financial statement analysis of special industries 5) recent developments of GAAP.

description.zh: 企業倫理是企業經營本身的倫理，內容可以分為對內和對外兩部份。本課程將介紹：1、企業與員工間的勞資倫理 2. 企業與客戶間的客戶倫理 3. 企業與同業間的競爭倫理 4. 企業與股東間的股東倫理 5. 企業與社會間的社會責任 6. 企業與政府間的政商倫理
description.en: Business ethics is the intrinsic value of enterprise. It contains two parts, inside and outside enterprise. This course will introduce 1. Ethics between employer and employee2. Ethics between enterprise and client3. Ethics between enterprise and competitor4. Ethics between enterprise and stockholder5. Ethics between enterprise and society6. Ethics between enterprise and government

description.zh: 為培育學生瞭解當前投資決策與理財之實作能力，透過實驗室建置的投資決策模擬競賽環境，以培養學生建立其證券投資分析、金融工具分析、企業評價及資本市場之基本與技術分析等決策能力。進一步訓練學生通過國際與國內相關的投資專業證照考試，以期達到理論與實務充份接軌之目標。
description.en: To nurture students to understand the practical skills of the current investment knowledge, through the investment decision-making simulation laboratory, students build their equity investment analysis, financial instruments, business evaluation, the fundamental and technical analysis of capital market, and other decision-making ability. Further training students to obtain international and domestic investment professional certification exams in order to achieve the goal of seamless integration of theory and practice.

description.zh: 本課程在使學生瞭解與企業 (工業) 相關之法律，以為未來就業時能具備基本之法律基礎。課程大綱如下：商事法之套特質、民法概述、商業登記法、公司法、票據法、保險法。
description.en: This course is set to make the students understand the concepts of laws dealing with related industrial and business, and being the base of working in the futures. It includes: 1.The Characters of business laws. 2.The presentment of civil code. 3.The business registration laws and business laws. 4.The insurance laws.

description.zh: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
description.en: The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in learning how to process, and decipher the readings that serve as springboards for reading skills development, vocabulary building, language analysis, and thought-provoking discussions. The readings include a variety of viewpoints on global topics centered around social issues, the environment, psychology, business, and technology.  Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

name.zh: 進階英文閱讀與聽講練習

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。材料一般性質之介紹、化學對材料性質的影響、原子在晶體內的堆積方式及 X 光繞射、固體內原子排列的不規則性和原子擴散、固體傳導電子特性、凝固的各種物理性質、相金屬和有關的各種機械性質、鋼鐵材料及其應用。
description.en: Prerequisite: Consent of InstructorGeneral Properties of Materials, Chemical Effects to Material Properties, Atomic Packing Types in Crystals and X-ray Diffraction, Imperfections of Atomic Arrangement in Solids and Atomic Diffusion, Conduction of Electrons in Solids, Solidification, Physical Properties, Metals and their Mechanical Properties, Ferrous Materials and their Applications.

description.zh: 先修課程：微積分或負責教授同意。常微分方程式、線性常微分方程式、拉普拉氏轉換、級數及傅立葉級數、線性代數及矩陣、積分定理。
description.en: Introduction of the deformation, Strain and stress of structure (Beam, Column, Pressure vessel) under different loading conditions such as Tension, Compression, Shear force, Torsion and Bending moment.

description.zh: 先修課程：3001011 或負責教授同意。力、質量與加速度、質點運動學、質點動力學、功與能、衝量與動量、剛體運動、剛體系的動力學。
description.en: Force and Acceleration, Kinematics of a particle, Kinetics of a particle, Work and Energy, Impulse and Momentum, Kinematics of a Rigid Body, Kinetics of a Rigid Body.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.  This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

description.zh: 各學院指定向度學分規定如下：機電學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。電資學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、自然與科學向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。工程學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。管理學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、自然與科學向度課程 4 學分。設計學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。
description.en: The dimension credits stipulated by each college are as follows：CMEE：4 credits for the humanities and art curriculum, 4 credits for the Social and Rules of Law curriculum, and 4 credits for the innovation and entrepreneurship curriculum.EECS：4 credits for the humanities and art curriculum, 4 credits for the nature and science curriculum, and 4 credits for the innovation and entrepreneurship curriculum.College of Engineering：4 credits for the humanities and art curriculum, 4 credits for the Social and Rules of Law curriculum, and 4 credits for the innovation and entrepreneurship curriculum.College of Management：4 credits for the humanities and art curriculum, 4 credits for the Social and Rules of Law curriculum, and 4 credits for the nature and science curriculum.College of Design： 4 credits for the humanities and art curriculum, 4 credits for the Social and Rules of Law curriculum, and 4 credits for the innovation and entrepreneurship curriculum.CHASS：4 credits for t

name.zh: 學院指定向度 - 人文與藝術
name.en: College designated dimension curriculum：Humanities and Art

description.zh: 各學院指定向度學分規定如下：機電學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。電資學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、自然與科學向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。工程學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。管理學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、自然與科學向度課程 4 學分。設計學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。人社學院：社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、自然與科學向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。修完學院指定向度課程 12 學分，剩餘 6 學分可在人文與藝術向度、社會與法治向度、自然與科學向度及創新與創業向度自由修滿，達到通識畢業 18 學分。
description.en: NA

name.zh: 學院指定向度 - 自然與科學
name.en: College designated dimension curriculum：Nature and Science

description.zh: 集總電路和克希荷夫定律（KCL,KVL），電路元件，串、並聯電路，一階電路，二階電路，線性非時變電路分析，相量及弦波穩態分析，耦合元件和電路，多相電路，複數頻率，頻率響應，狀態變數法，雙埠網路，PSPICE，傅式分析及轉換，拉式轉換。
description.en: Lumped Circuits,KCL,KVL,Circuit elements,series & parallelcircuits,the RL&RC circuit,linear time-invarient circuitanalysis,the phasor concept & SSS analysis,magnetically coupled circuits,polyphase circuits,complex frequency, frequency response,state-variable analysis,two-port circuitsPSPICE,Fourier analysis & transforms,Laplace transforms

description.zh: 機率空間；組合分析；隨機變數；期望值與慣矩；聯合分佈隨機變數；慣矩母函數及特徵函數；大數法則及中央極限定理；隨機漫步及帕森程序。
description.en: Course Title:Probability and Statistics Description:This course is designed for students to get concepts and methods of Probability and Statistics. The main purpose of this course is establishment of the foundations of industrial management, quality control, and industrial economics.

description.zh: 基本儀器介紹；電子零件之認識；二極體電路（特性）；運算放大器；電晶體電路（特性）；A/D ，D/A 轉換器；類比乘法器。運算放大器應用；線性電壓調整器；電壓參考及電流源；電壓比較器；電壓控制振盪器；鎖相迴路；頻率－電壓轉換器；類比－數位轉換器；數位－類比轉換器；特殊裝置語言合成電路。
description.en: Course Title:Electronics and Electronics Lab.Description:The properties of semiconductor and fabrication of a PNdiode and BJT, and their characteristics are explained. Part 2concentrates on analog circuit and system. Method of biasing adiscrete BJT or EET are given, and stability of the operating point isdiscussed. The small-signal model for each device is abstained and usedto calculate the performance of low frequency single stage andcascaded amplifiers. The feedback concepts of AMP. OP AMP, itscharacteristics and applications are described.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹工程上、物理上系統解析的相關數學工具，內容包括五大項：一 常微分方程式：一階，二階，及高階常微分方程，拉譜拉斯轉換，   特殊函數。二 向量幾何與分析：矩陣行列式及特徵問題。三 傅立葉級數，積分及轉換。四 偏微分方程及邊界值問題。五 複變分析及映射轉換。
description.en: This course intends to inbtroduce the mathematical principles and practices that today's engineers need to know. The course contents are 1. Ordinary Differential Eqs: 1st order, 2nd order and higher    order ODEs. Laplace transform, special function.2. Vector Algebra and Vector Analysis: Matrixs and    Determinants, Eigenvalve problems.3. Fourier Series, Integral and Transforms.4. Partial Differential Equations and Boundary Value    Problems.5. Complex Analysis: complex Integration, conformal mapping    and Applications.

description.zh: 線性電路；電算放大器；二極體；非線性電路應用；接面場效電晶體（JFET）；金屬氧化物半導體場效電晶體 (MOSFET)；雙極性接面電晶體（BJT）；差動放大器；多級放大器。金氧半電晶體；雙接面電晶體；差動及多極放大器；功率放大器；頻率響應；回授；類比積體電路；濾波器；調諧放大器；振盪器。
description.en: Course Title:Electronics and Electronics Lab.Description:The properties of semiconductor and fabrication of a PNdiode and BJT, and their characteristics are explained. Part 2concentrates on analog circuit and system. Method of biasing adiscrete BJT or EET are given, and stability of the operating point isdiscussed. The small-signal model for each device is abstained and usedto calculate the performance of low frequency single stage andcascaded amplifiers. The feedback concepts of AMP. OP AMP, itscharacteristics and applications are described.

description.en: 各學院指定向度學分規定如下：機電學院：人文與藝術向度課程4學分、社會與法治向度課程4學分、創新與創業向度課程4學分。電資學院：人文與藝術向度課程4學分、自然與科學向度課程4學分、創新與創業向度課程4學分。工程學院：人文與藝術向度課程4學分、社會與法治向度課程4學分、創新與創業向度課程4學分。管理學院：人文與藝術向度課程4學分、社會與法治向度課程4學分、自然與科學向度課程4學分。設計學院：人文與藝術向度課程4學分、社會與法治向度課程4學分、創新與創業向度課程4學分。人社學院：社會與法治向度課程4學分、自然與科學向度課程4學分、創新與創業向度課程4學分。修完學院指定向度課程12學分，剩餘6學分可在人文與藝術向度、社會與法治向度、自然與科學向度及創新與創業向度自由修滿，達到通識畢業18學分。

name.zh: 學院指定向度 - 創新與創業
name.en: College designated dimension curriculum：Innovation and Entrepreneurship

description.zh: 瞭解工程系統中常用數學之原理及應用，內容包含：1. 常微分一階、二階及高階方程式之解法，2. 拉普拉斯 (Laplace) 變換及其在電路上之應用，3. 向量分析及其在電磁學上之應用。
description.en: 1.Ordinary differential equations of the first order2.Linear ordinary differential equations of the second order3.Laplace transforms4.Vector analysis and its application to electormagnetics

description.zh: 1. 瞭解電路元件之基本特性及其組合電路之分析方法，內容包含：(1) 電路元件：電壓及電流源，主動元件，(2) 電路特性：歐姆定律，柯希荷夫電壓與電流定律等，(3) 一階及二階電路：電路之微分方程描述及各種輸入信號之響應，(4) 穩態分析與頻率響應：分析電路之頻域，(5) 電腦輔助電路分析：如使用 SPICE 工具。2. 瞭解線性與非線性電路的組成與分析法，內容包含：(1) 交流激勵電路：交流穩態分析，功率計算及相電路，(2) 三相電路：Ｙ與△型轉換及功率分析，(3) 變壓器電路：互感應及電壓電流的變換，(4) 頻率響應分析：極點與零點，轉移函數，(5) Fourier 級數，轉換及應用，(6) Laplace 轉換及應用。
description.en: The course covers the synthesis and analysis of bath linear and nonlinear circuits.Contents include:1.Introduction to linear circuit analysis, 2. Resistive circuit, 3. Kirchhoff laws, 4. Thevenin and Norton theorem, 5. First and second order circuit, 6. Node and loop analysis, 7. Steady state response and analysis, 8. SPICE tool, 9.AC circuit :AC steady-state analysis, phasor analysis, 10. Three phase circuits, 11. Transformer circuits, 12. Frequency response, 13. Fourier series, Fourier transformation and application, 14. Laplace transformation and application.

description.zh: 介紹電子零組件之組成，特性以及其應用，使學生具有實用電路之分析模擬與設計應用之能力，內容涵蓋：1. 半導体物理，2. 基本主動元件 (二極体，雙極性電晶体，場效電晶体)，3. 放大器電路，4. 邏輯 (數位) 電路，5. 積体電路。
description.en: 1.Semiconductor physics 2.Diode 3.Bipolar Junction transistor 4.Field-efferct 5.Operatonal amplifier 6.Digital logic circuit 7.Integrated circuit

description.zh: (1) 半導體二極體特性曲線；(2) 半導體二極體之應用：整流器，濾波器，剪波器，箝位器，倍壓器；(3) 發光二極體驅動電路；(4) 齊納二極體穩壓電路；(5) 雙極接合面電晶體之辨別與參數量測；(6) 雙極接合面電晶體輸入及輸出特性曲線；(7) 雙極接合面電晶體直流偏壓電路；(8) 共射極放大電路；(9) 射極隨耦電路；(10) 共基極定電流源電路；(11) 場效電晶體之辨別與參數量測；(12) 場效電晶體轉移及輸出特性曲線；(13) 場效電晶體直流偏壓電路；(14) 場效電晶體放大電路；(15) 整流及濾波電路；(16) 偏壓分析與設計；(17) 基本放大器 (共射，共基，共集模式，共源，共汲，共閘等); (18) 串級放大器；(19) 差動放大器。
description.en: (1)The characteristic curve of PN diode; (2)The applications of PN diode : Rectifier, Filter, Clipper, Clamper, and Voltage-doubler; (3)Light Emitting Diode drivers; (4)Zener diode for voltage regulation; (5)The identification of BJT's leads and the measurement of b parameter; (6)The input and output characteristic curves of BJTs; (7)DC biasing circuits for BJTs; (8)Common-Emitter(CE) amplifiers; (9)Emitter-follower(EF) circuits; (10)Common-Base(CB) constant current sources; (11)The identification of FET's leads and the measurement of device parameters; (12)The transfer and output characteristic curves of FETs; (13)DC biasing circuits for FETs; (14)The amplifying circuits of FETs; (15)Retifier circuit and Filter; (16)Bias analysis and design; (17)Common Emitter amplifier, Common base amplifier, Common collector amplifier; (18)Differential amplifier.

description.zh: 瞭解微算機之基本組織架構及應用，內容包含：1.PC 之使用，2. 微電腦學習機之使用，3. 邏輯分析儀之使用，4. 組合語言之設計與除錯，5. 記憶體設計 ROM/RAM，6. 輸出入埠設計及程式控制，7. 輸出入埠應用 (鍵盤介面、LED 顯示介面)，8.A/D、D/A 介面設計，9. 簡單 PC 介面卡設計 (PIO 及 SIO) 介面，單晶片之設計與應用。
description.en: The experiment covers the basic architecture and application of microcomputer.The lab. work includes:1.The usage of PC2.The usage of microcomputer training machine3.Logic analysis4.The design and debug of assembly language5.ROM/RAM design6.I/O design and control 7.A/D, D/A design8.PC interfacing design9.Single-chip microcomputer system design

name.zh: 微算機原理及應用實習

description.zh: 1. 集合，序列與函數 2. 基礎邏輯 3. 關聯式 4. 計數（排列，組合）5. 圖與樹（基礎圖論）6. 遞迴式與演算法 7. 有向圖
description.en: 1.Sets Sequences and Function2.Elementary Logic3.Relations4.Counting5.Graph and Tree6.Recursion Trees and Algorithms7.Digraphs

description.zh: 1. 通訊工程簡介 2. 調幅與調頻 3. 傳輸與接收系統 4. 衛星通訊簡介 5. 數據通訊簡介 6. 光纖通訊簡介 7. 電話系統簡介 8. 行動通訊簡介
description.en: 1.Introductions2.Amplitude and Frequency Modulations3.Radio Transmitters and Receivers4.Introduction to Satellite Communications5.Introduction to Data Communications6.Introduction to Fiber-Optic Communications7.Introduction to Telephone System8.Introduction to Cellular System

description.zh: 瞭解微算機及介面設計之基本觀念與應用，內容包含：1. 微算機概論，2. 中央處理單元架構、程式規劃及記體模式，3. 微算機指令集及定址模式，4. 組合語言程式設計，5. 硬體介面概論，6. 記憶體介面 (ROM 及 RAM) 介面，7. 輸出入介面、中斷處理及直接記憶體存取，8. 微算機系統概述及發展系統簡介。
description.en: 1.Introduction to microcomputer2.Central processor unit 3.Microprogramming set4.Assemblylanguage programming5.Interfacing circuits6.ROM/RAM interface7.I/O operations8.Interrupt and direct memory access

description.zh: 本課程將結合理論說明與示範實習，使同學對雷射基本原理及光電科技應用有一完整的認識，內容包括：1. 光電工程概論，2. 基礎光學，3. 電射發光原理，4. 雷射光的調製，5. 光電科技應用概論。
description.en: The course covers bath lectures and lab exercise1.Introduction 2.Fundamentals of optics3.Laser principles4.Electrooptic modulation of laser beams5.Applications of electrooptic techniques

description.zh: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
description.en: The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in learning how to process, and decipher the readings that serve as springboards for reading skills development, vocabulary building, language analysis, and thought-provoking discussions. The readings include a variety of viewpoints on global topics centered around social issues, the environment, psychology, business, and technology.  Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

name.zh: 進階英文閱讀與聽講練習

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 瞭解計算機之硬体組織與資料結構等基本原理及其應用，並介紹各種程式語言特性，內容包括：1. 計算機簡介：介紹計算機之演進及計算機之種類與特性，2. 計算機系統簡介：介紹計算機系統的組成及軟硬体系統所含概之內容，3. 資料的表示法與數字系統：介紹數系及文數字表示法，4. 輸出入裝置及儲存体：介紹各種輸出入設備及資料儲存体，5. 程式語言與程式設計：介紹各種程式語言結構，及撰寫之方法，6. 資料結構：介紹資料在記憶体內之各種排列方法以節省記憶空間及提高存取效率，7. 作業系統：介紹各種管理電腦資源的系統軟体及其作業方式，8. 檔案與資料庫：介紹各種檔案的類型及資料庫之基本架構，9. 資料通訊與計算機網路：介紹資料通訊之種種特性及電腦網路之結構與類別，10. 人工智慧：介紹人工智慧基本概念及基本功能
description.en: This introductory course covers the fundamentals and applications of computers.Contents include:1. Introduction to computer2. Introduction to computer system3. Data representation and number system4. Input/Output and storage device5. Programming language and design 6. Data  structure7. Operating systems8. File and database systems9. Data communication and computer networks10. Artificial intelligence

description.zh: 瞭解工程系統中常用數學之原理及應用，內容包含：1. 常微分一階、二階及高階方程式之解法，2. 拉普拉斯 (Laplace) 變換及其在電路上之應用，3. 向量分析及其在電磁學上之應用。
description.en: 1.Ordinary differential equations of the first order2.Linear ordinary differential equations of the second order3.Laplace transforms4.Vector analysis and its application to electormagnetics

description.zh: 介紹電子零組件之組成，特性以及其應用，使學生具有實用電路之分析模擬與設計應用之能力，內容涵蓋：1. 半導体物理，2. 基本主動元件 (二極体，雙極性電晶体，場效電晶体)，3. 放大器電路，4. 邏輯 (數位) 電路，5. 積体電路。
description.en: 1.Semiconductor physics 2.Diode 3.Bipolar Junction transistor 4.Field-efferct 5.Operatonal amplifier 6.Digital logic circuit 7.Integrated circuit

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.  This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
description.en: The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in learning how to process, and decipher the readings that serve as springboards for reading skills development, vocabulary building, language analysis, and thought-provoking discussions. The readings include a variety of viewpoints on global topics centered around social issues, the environment, psychology, business, and technology.  Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

name.zh: 進階英文閱讀與聽講練習

description.zh: 各學院指定向度學分規定如下：機電學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。工程學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。管理學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、自然與科學向度課程 4 學分。設計學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。人社學院：社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、自然與科學向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。修完學院指定向度課程 12 學分，剩餘 6 學分可在人文與藝術向度、社會與法治向度、自然與科學向度及創新與創業向度自由修滿，達到通識畢業 18 學分。
description.en: The dimension credits stipulated by each college are as follows：College of Mechanical and Electrical Engineering：4 credits for the humanities and art curriculum, 4 credits for the Social and Rules of Law curriculum, and 4 credits for the innovation and entrepreneurship curriculum.College of Engineering： 4 credits for the humanities and art curriculum, 4 credits for the Social and Rules of Law curriculum, and 4 credits for the innovation and entrepreneurship curriculum.College of Management： 4 credits for the humanities and art curriculum, 4 credits for the Social and Rules of Law curriculum, and 4 credits for the nature and science curriculum.College of Design： 4 credits for the humanities and art curriculum, 4 credits for the Social and Rules of Law curriculum, and 4 credits for the innovation and entrepreneurship curriculum.

name.zh: 學院指定向度 - 社會與法治
name.en: College designated dimension curriculum：Social and Rules of Law

description.zh: 各學院指定向度學分規定如下：機電學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。電資學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、自然與科學向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。工程學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。管理學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、自然與科學向度課程 4 學分。設計學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。人社學院：社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、自然與科學向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。修完學院指定向度課程 12 學分，剩餘 6 學分可在人文與藝術向度、社會與法治向度、自然與科學向度及創新與創業向度自由修滿，達到通識畢業 18 學分。
description.en: NA

name.zh: 學院指定向度 - 自然與科學
name.en: College designated dimension curriculum：Nature and Science

description.zh: 本課程之目的在訓練學生，使學生熟悉經常使用之統計方法與理論，能利用已知之資料整理、分析未知之現象，打好修習其他相關學科之基礎。課程內容包括：機率理論、推定、假設檢定、迴歸分析、變異數分析等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to train student and to provide a background in the theory and methodology of general statistical issues. Topics include probability theory, inference, hypothesis testing, regression analysis and variance analysis.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在訓練學生，使學生熟悉經常使用之統計方法與理論，能利用已知之資料整理、分析未知之現象，打好修習其他相關學科之基礎。課程內容包括：機率理論、推定、假設檢定、迴歸分析、變異數分析等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to train student and to provide a background in the theory and methodology of general statistical issues. Topics include: probability theory, inference, hypothesis testing, regression analysis and variance analysis.

description.zh: 使學生建立邏輯量化思考，並了解管理科學解決問題之方法及應用，且有能力利用電腦工具協助分析經營管理問題，達成最佳化決策。
description.en: To build the quantitative logic thinking about the decision problems. The course is designed to introduce the fundamental techniques and methods of operations research. The related software will be utilized to aid in building and solving models. The topics to be covered: linear programming, what-if analysis, dual theory, transportation and assignment.

description.zh: 本課程旨在使學生瞭解各種製造的方法和程序，工具機之基本功能。其內容包含有鑄造、精密鑄造、塑膠加工、熱加工、冷加工、工具機基本元件、金屬切削、工具機的操作、粉末加工及測量。
description.en: This course is intended to provide a comprehensive study of the Modern manufacturing processes and machine tools .The course is designed principally to provide the following topics:1. engineering of materials2. forming of materials 3. traditional casting processes4. broaching and sawing5. turning and boring6. drilling and reaming7. milling and grinding8. machine tools 9. nontraditional machining

description.zh: 介紹資料庫系統之基本概念，熟悉基本指令及操作方法，使之能輕易建立資料檔案，並可對其資料進行擷取、添加、刪除、修改、編輯、排序、建立索引及產生標準報表列印等，且開發一套簡易應用軟體。
description.en: This course introduces the basic concepts of database system.  The students can understand the operation process in order to develop the data file.  In addition, the retrieval, add, delete, modify, edit and sorting of data files are also provided.  Finally, the students can develop a DBMS for themselves.

description.zh: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
description.en: The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in learning how to process, and decipher the readings that serve as springboards for reading skills development, vocabulary building, language analysis, and thought-provoking discussions. The readings include a variety of viewpoints on global topics centered around social issues, the environment, psychology, business, and technology.  Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

name.zh: 進階英文閱讀與聽講練習

description.zh: 這個課程設計的目的，在於讓學生熟悉專業人員應具備的相關倫理與法律議題，學生不僅將重新思索在專業職涯與生活中倫理所扮演的主要角色，並且探索專業人員在面對道德與人際關係兩難時的倫理運用與法律原則。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to make students re-think the main character between professional jobs and living ethics, and discover the principles of ethics and laws when the professional faces the dilemma of morality and interpersonal relationship.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 本課程著重介紹電腦輔助製造技術的概念與實作。內容包括 NC 基本概念，一般機械零件之 NC 與 APT 程式製作，複雜曲面零件之 NC 程式製作，CAM 系統實習，群組技術電腦輔助製程規劃，電腦輔助製程規劃系統實習，電腦輔助生產規劃。
description.en: This course has been prepared for the comprehensive of Computer-aided manufacturing, with emphasis on the essentials of CNC technology and programming. Through the projects practice, the students are able to adapt to the techniques of CAM.

notes: A 節設計 306；BC 節設計 B03*

description.zh: 本課程藉由家具相關設計競賽活動或產學合作計畫案，讓學生實際演練家具設計程序及創新方法。本課程同時配合家具材料、家具結構與實習、家具製圖、電腦輔助家具設計等課程，期能習得家具創新設計與產品工程的能力。
description.en: The course through furniture design contest or industry-academy cooperation project, let students practice the design procedure and creative methods. The course coordinate the other courses: furniture construction and practice, furniture drawing, computer aided furniture design etc, expect getting the capability of creativity design and product engineering.

description.zh: 探討家具製造之最新技術，側重量產設備及其與產品工程的關係。介紹木材加工原理及最新量產設備之性能，以便依據家具特徵如組件形狀，材料性質，及產量多寡等考量，提出有效率的加工計畫（製造流程）。講授家具製造作業程序（從原料接受、備料、細作、裝配以迄塗裝、包裝、發貨等其間之種種細節），特別是以計量的觀點來看家具製造問題，以避免發生瓶頸，製造系統整体概念之培養，尤為重點。
description.en: Survey of furniture manufacturing technology emphasizing mass production equipment and its relationship to furniture product engineering. This course provides students with an understanding of the principles of wood machining processes and the capabilities of modern production woodworking equipment. Students learn to develop efficient process plans (machining sequences) based on product characteristics such as part geometry, material composition, and production volume. Emphasis is on operations, and the integration of many types of equipment into a manufacturing system. This course specially requires the students to view the manufacturing process in quantitative terms.

description.zh: 解說大型相機多重焦距調整和影像形狀的修正及變形功能，如何配合造型設計及啟發造形創意，使學生熟悉大型相機操作方式及攝影技巧，由忠實表現學生自己設計成品的表面材質感。形狀。體積。色彩等等，再深入到表現。特色。機能。價值感等發揮實用攝影行銷及展示的功效.
description.en: Through the detailed explanations of multiple focusing adjustments and image correcting methods of the view camera (large format camera) to help students master the operation of the camera and many other photo taking techniques. The students shall be able to take picture of their own designing product (showing the right material quality, surface texture, the form, volume, weight and color).Furthermore, the students are requested to learn, to make full use of their knowledge as to show the character, function, value and uniqueness of their product in the picture for the purpose marketing promotion and exhibition.

description.zh: 本課程以越南語教學為主，培養學生的聽、說、讀、寫能力，以達到溝通的目的，增進學生對越南文化的認識與興趣，提供學生越南語的基礎知識，越南經貿、觀光文化及越語字母拼音教學，讓學生在學習越語的同時，深入了解越南文化，協助學生拓展東南亞的就業版圖。
description.en: This course will help students have basic communication skill, basic knowledge of Vietnamese (including alphabet, phonetic and grammar) and better understanding Vietnam culture.

description.zh: 本課程以培養學生家具視圖、製圖及空間想像能力，並以電腦繪圖進行家具設計、開發。透過電腦授課方式，以電腦設計軟體（AutoCAD）之學習，習得平面、三視圖、立體圖、剖面圖等之基本繪圖法，進而學習家具三視圖、家具剖面圖、家具結構圖和尺寸標註等之家具工程製圖畫法。
description.en: This course is to help students to develop skills on recognizing and Furniture drawing, as well as AutoCAD. Furniture engineering drawing includes Cross-sectional view, Structure drawing and Dimensioning.

description.zh: 本應用試作技術課程之試作技術，進行家具相關設計圖面實體模型之材料加工、組裝實作。
description.en: This course is to help students to develop skills on recognizing and Furniture drawing, as well as AutoCAD. Furniture engineering drawing includes Cross-sectional view, Structure drawing and To practice product model making techniques. Based on furniture product working drawing, design students can practice model making techniques with different materials and processing methods.

description.zh: 本課程講授參數式 3D 模型建模之技能，透過 3D 參數建模軟體將家具各零組件繪製，及組裝圖的繪製，目的在於培養學生具有數位化表達能力，以利於家具設計時造型之編修、工程檢討與設計管理。
description.en: The course is introducing the 3d modeling skill. Through learn the furniture part and assembly design drafting to develop the ability of digital design. It can take advantage of a Digital Prototyping workflow to design and build better furniture in less time.

name.zh: 電腦輔助 3D 家具設計

description.zh: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
description.en: The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in learning how to process, and decipher the readings that serve as springboards for reading skills development, vocabulary building, language analysis, and thought-provoking discussions. The readings include a variety of viewpoints on global topics centered around social issues, the environment, psychology, business, and technology.  Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

name.zh: 進階英文閱讀與聽講練習

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 先修課程：4401011 或負責教授同意介紹結構體在受到張力、壓力、剪力、扭力及彎曲等外力狀態下之變形，分析應力，應變及變形，莫耳圓，壓力容器，樑，柱。
description.en: Introduction of the deformation, Strain and stress of structure (Beam, Column, Pressure vessel) under several different loading condition equations, Compression, Shear force, Torsion and Bending moment.

description.zh: 先修課程：4401011 或負責教授同意力、質量與加速度，質點運動學，質點動力學，功與能，衝量與動量，剛體運動，剛體系的動力學。
description.en: Relations of Forces、Masses and Acceleration, Kinematics of Particles, Dynamics of Particles, Work and Energy, Impulses and Momentum, Kinematics of Rigid Bodies, Dynamics of Systems of Rigid Bodies.

description.zh: 電之基本概念，直流基本電路，電場與磁場，電磁效應，交流之基本概念，交流基本電路，電機基本原理，變壓器，三相感應電動機，單向交流電動機，同步電機，直流電機之分類及特性，直流電機之控制，伺服電動機之分類及特性，電機之維護。
description.en: Introduction to Electricity, DC Circuit Analysis, Electric Field and Magnetic Field, Magnetic Effect, AC Circuit Analysis, Principles of electrical Machinery, Transformers, Three-phase Induction Motor, Single-phase Induction Motor, Synchronous Electric Machinery, DC Electric Machinery, Control of DC Motor, Maintenance of Electric Machinery.

description.zh: 本課程引入程式設計的觀念與方法，程式設計語言以 C 語言為基礎，於熟習基本程式語法後，再導入 C++ 程式語言。內容著重邏輯思考與程式設計能力之訓練，同時輔以程式設計過程所應注意之程式結構、偵錯、可攜性、軟體工程的基本概念，使修習者得以奠定程式設計之基礎。
description.en: This course introduces to the students the basic computer programming concepts.Syntax and semantics of the C and C++ programming languages will be introduced.Topics cover the methods for analyzing problem statements, designing computersolutions, effective methods of program design using structured programming notionsof sequence, selection, and iteration structures.

description.zh: 先修課程：微積分或負責教授同意常微分方程式，線性常微分方程式，拉普拉氏轉換，級數及傅立葉級數，線性代數及矩陣，積分定理。
description.en: Ordinary Differential Equations, Laplace Transforms, Power Series, Linear Algebra, Matrices.

description.zh: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
description.en: The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in learning how to process, and decipher the readings that serve as springboards for reading skills development, vocabulary building, language analysis, and thought-provoking discussions. The readings include a variety of viewpoints on global topics centered around social issues, the environment, psychology, business, and technology.  Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

name.zh: 進階英文閱讀與聽講練習

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 冷凍空調概論、基礎知識與定義、空氣熱力學、基本冷凍循環與應用分析、壓縮理論及壓縮機性能分析、冷凍空調系統組成 - 壓縮機、冷凝器、冷媒控制器、蒸發器、冷凍介質－冷媒、二次冷媒吸收劑及冷凍油、冷媒管路及配件、空調處理過程及空調維護分析。
description.en: Refrigeration & air conditioning Introduction Fundamentals & definitions Psychrometrics Basic refrigeration cycles & application analysis Compression cycle theory & performance of compressors Compression system compositions- compressor, condenser, refrigerant controls Cooling mediums- refrigerants, secondary refrigerants, absorbents, refrigeration oils. Refrigerant piping & accessories. Air conditioning processes & cycles analysis.

description.zh: 1. 瞭解電路元件之基本特性及其組合電路之分析方法，內容包含： (1) 電路元件：電壓及電流源，主動元件， (2) 電路特性：歐姆定律，柯希荷夫電壓與電流定律等， (3) 一階及二階電路：電路之微分方程描述及各種輸入信號之響應， (4) 穩態分析與頻率響應：分析電路之頻域， (5) 電腦輔助電路分析：如使用 SPICE 工具。 2. 瞭解線性與非線性電路的組成與分析法，內容包含： (1) 交流激勵電路：交流穩態分析，功率計算及相電路， (2) 三相電路：Ｙ與△型轉換及功率分析， (3) 變壓器電路：互感應及電壓電流的變換， (4) 頻率響應分析：極點與零點，轉移函數， (5) Fourier 級數，轉換及應用， (6) Laplace 轉換及應用。
description.en: The course covers the synthesis and analysis of bath linear and nonlinear circuits.Contents include: 1.Introduction to linear circuit analysis, 2. Resistive circuit, 3. Kirchhoff laws, 4. Thevenin and Norton theorem, 5. First and second order circuit, 6. Node and loop analysis, 7. Steady state response and analysis, 8. SPICE tool, 9.AC circuit :AC steady-state analysis, phasor analysis, 10. Three phase circuits, 11. Transformer circuits, 12. Frequency response, 13. Fourier series, Fourier transformation and application, 14. Laplace transformation and application.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹工程上、物理上系統解析的相關數學工具，內容包括：1. 常微分方程式：一階，二階，及高階常微分方程，2. 拉譜拉斯轉換，3. 特殊函數。
description.en: This course intends to introduce the mathematical principles and practices that today's engineers need to know. The course contents are 1.Ordinary Differential Eqs: 1st order, 2nd order and higher order ODEs. 2. Laplace transform, 3. Special function.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.  This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
description.en: The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in learning how to process, and decipher the readings that serve as springboards for reading skills development, vocabulary building, language analysis, and thought-provoking discussions. The readings include a variety of viewpoints on global topics centered around social issues, the environment, psychology, business, and technology.  Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

name.zh: 進階英文閱讀與聽講練習

description.zh: 各學院指定向度學分規定如下：機電學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。電資學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、自然與科學向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。工程學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。管理學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、自然與科學向度課程 4 學分。設計學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。人社學院：社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、自然與科學向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。修完學院指定向度課程 12 學分，剩餘 6 學分可在人文與藝術向度、社會與法治向度、自然與科學向度及創新與創業向度自由修滿，達到通識畢業 18 學分。
description.en: NA

name.zh: 學院指定向度 - 自然與科學
name.en: College designated dimension curriculum：Nature and Science

description.zh: 修完「學院指定向度課程」12 學分後，剩餘 6 學分可在人文與藝術向度、社會與法治向度、自然與科學向度及創新與創業向度自由修滿，達到通識畢業 18 學分。
description.en: After completing 12 credits “designated by the college”, the remaining 6 credits are open for selection form these curriculums: humanities and art, social and legal, nature and science and innovation and entrepreneurship, until a total of 18 credits of the general curriculum are completed for graduation.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在訓練學生，使學生熟悉經常使用之統計方法與理論，能利用已知之資料整理、分析未知之現象，打好修習其他相關學科之基礎。課程內容包括：機率理論、推定、假設檢定、迴歸分析、變異數分析等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to train student and to provide a background in the theory and methodology of general statistical issues. Topics include: probability theory, inference, hypothesis testing, regression analysis and variance analysis.

description.zh: 本課程的重點在於闡述管理學之基本概念，主要的內容涵蓋四個領域：(1) 瞭解管理學之理論與相關學者之研究報告；(2) 討論企業界管理應用實務案例；(3) 探討多國化管理之趨勢與差異及 (4) 如何落實管理理論研討與趨勢。另外一有管理相關功能實務應用之討論與介紹。
description.en: The purpose of Management has four distinct objectives:(1) to introduce a new management paradigm；(2) to effectively combine the basic concepts of management and organizational behavior into a single volume, including the management functional and departmental descriptions；(3) to discuss business management applications in practice and (4) to effectively implement the management basic ideas. The planning, organization, decision, leadership and monitoring among variety culture will be covered and discussed in the class as well.

description.zh: 讓學生了解投資的基本觀念，課程內容主管要介紹證券 (股票、債券)、期貨、選擇權的投資，以及證券的評價模式和 CAPM 等訂價模式說明。驟。
description.en: The course helps stdents to understand the knowledge of investment. It includes security. Future option and CAPM Models.

description.zh: 介紹資料庫系統之基本概念，熟悉基本指令及操作方法，使之能輕易建立資料檔案，並可對其資料進行擷取、添加、刪除、修改、編輯、排序、建立索引及產生標準報表列印等，且開發一套簡易應用軟體。
description.en: This course introduces the basic concepts of database system. The students can understand the operation process in order to develop the data file. In addition, the retrieval, add, delete, modify, edit and sorting of data files are also provided. Finally, the students can develop a DBMS for themselves.

description.zh: 本課程將邀請專家學者以專題演講方式，介紹電力工程、電力電子工程之最新科技與應用。研究生亦被安排報告其研究計畫與進度。參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、及舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: This course will introduce the latest technologies and applications to the power and power electronics engineering. Speakers are the Well-known scholars and specialists. Graduate students will also be arranged to report their graduate studies. The participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, and further oral presentation. Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

description.zh: 本研究討論課程之目的在使研究生學習控制工程、通訊工程、計算機工程之最新科技。受邀演講之著名專家學者透過廣泛的討論分享其研究結果與經驗，選修此課程之研究生亦須就其研究主題進行正式報告。
description.en: The seminar course is designed for graduate students to learn the latest technologies in the areas of control, communications and computer engineering. Renowned researchers and scholoars are invited to share their research results and experience through extensive discussion. Furthermore, all students in this course are required to make formal presentations on their specialized topics.

description.zh: 神經網路之簡介、直傳式神經網路、監督式學習、非監督式學習、回傳式神經網路、神經網路之結構分析、學習方式分析神經網路之應用。
description.en: Introduction to Networks, Feedback Neutral Networks ,Supervised Learning, Unsupervised Learning, Recurrant Neural Networks, Structure Analysis of Neural Networks, Analysis of Learning Methods, Applications of Neural Networks.

description.zh: 1. 二極體電路分析與設計 2. 電晶體電路分析與設計 3. FET 電路分析與設計 4. 放大器頻率響應分析及頻率補償 5. 功率放大器分析與設計 6. 回授放大器分析與設計 7. 差動及運算放大器分析與設計 8. 震盪器分析與設計 9. 主動濾波器分析與設計
description.en: 1. Diode circuit Analysis and Design2. Transistor circuit Analysis and Design3. Transistor circuit Analysis and Design4. FET circuit Analysis and Design5. Amplifier Frequency response Analysis and Componstaion6. Power Amplifier Analysis and Design7. Feedback Amplifier Analysis and Design8. Differential and Operational Amplifier Analysis and Design9. Oscillator Analysis and Design10. Active Filter Analysis and Design

description.zh: l 本課程所為研究所課程，內容包括狀態控間分析，頻域分析，現代數位控制理論分析及控制器設計，應用實例介紹。
description.en: l This course is designed mainly for senior-graduate students. The objective of this course is to introduce some fundamental concepts of digital control, such as state space approach, frequency domain approach, and modern control theory. The design and applications of the digital controllers are also included.

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機電系統產品介紹與討論、Seminar 心得等。可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Mechatronics in Industry, Seminars.

description.zh: 機構與機械元件設計基礎，古典動力學基礎，近代機械加工，電機機械，電機驅動與設計，光電及感測基本原理，機電系統匹配，專題實作及實驗等機電相關課題
description.en: Mechanisms and machine elements, classical dynamics, modern machining methods, electric machines and drivers, sensors, special topics and labs of machatrocics system.

description.zh: 本課程旨在闡述專案工程規劃與控制之系統架構，主要介紹各種專案規劃與控制之方法及專案管理方法，內容包工程專案管理方法，專案工期規劃與控制，專案成本控制方法，專案資源管理，專案風險整合管理，專案品質管理，及專案人力及目標管理等介紹。
description.en: 英課名：Investigation engineering control        System framework of investigation engineering         control.        Investigation plan and period procedure arrange.        A method that rate of progress control.        Natural resources to allocate and the most suitable         schedule.        Cost accounting and cost control.        Complete cost/System control of time limit for a           project.

description.zh: 首先介紹我國及美日等國的防災體制、組織權責、運作機制，並比較其優缺點。接著討論防災資訊、通訊及新興科技在災害防球上的應用。介紹各類天然及人為災害的理論及特性，如地震、颱風、淹水、坡地災害、土石流、施工災害、環境污染、工業災害、全球氣候變遷等。從減災、整備、應變、復原重建四個時序來探討防災計畫緊急應變計畫標準作業程序的內容與要點。
description.en: This course first introduces the disaster prevention systems,jurisdiction and responsibility, and operation mechanism of several countries including Taiwan,Japan and the  United States of America. The application of computer information, communication and advanced technologies for disaster prevention will also be discussed. The characteristics of various natural and man-made disasters, such as earthquakes, typhoons, floods, slope failures, debris flows, contruction incidents, environmental pollution, industrial hazards, and global weather changing will be introduced. The major contents of disaster prevention plans, emergency response plans and standard operation procedures will e discussed corresponding to the disaster mitigation, preparedness, response and recovery.

description.zh: 本課程之內容主要訓練學生獨立思考，培養學生對土木防災之認識，進而學習土木工程在防災上的應用，並進行專題報告、專題演講及研究小組討論。
description.en: This course is trying to train independent thinking, to cultivate understanding precaution of civil engineering for students. This course is also learning the application of precaution of civil engineering. In the class we have case study, seminar, and group meeting.

name.en: Special Topics of Disaster Prevention and Civil Engineering

description.zh: 專題報告，專題演講，研究小組討論 Case Study, Seminar
description.en: Case Study, Seminar

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。技術的關鍵特性和技術之生命週期，企業核心技術、來源和取得，技術的管理與風險，國家科技政策之影響，企業與技術生存之道，全球創新產品之開發，全球創新產品的技術策略與戰略，未來趨勢和走向。
description.en: Technological Innovation: Process, Content, and Types, Organization

description.zh: 介紹各種潔淨且高效率的先進車輛動力系統的型式及其工作原理並分析技巧。項目包含車輛能源所面臨的一些問題及可能的解決方案、優良動力源的特性、電動系統、複合電動系統、複合氣動系統、氫燃料電池動力系統、金屬燃料電池動力系統、各種替代性燃料的特性及優缺點、太陽光電輔助動力系統等。
description.en: This course introduces various kinds of clean and high-efficiency vehicular power systems, their operation principles, and analytical skills.  Topics include: problems and possible solutions the vehicular power system faces, characteristics of a good vehicular power system, electric power system, hybrid electric power system, hybrid pneumatic power system, fuel cell power system, metallic fuel-cell power system, substitutive fuels, and solar-energy auxiliary power system.

name.en: Special Topics on Clean Power System

notes: ◎車輛四、車輛所、職車輛所合開

description.zh: 本課程之目標為增進研究生之英文閱讀能力與寫作技巧。介紹英文科技論文的慣用語法、用字與閱讀技巧，並分析撰寫英文報告與學術論文之章法與組織要領。
description.en: Objective of this course is to improve reading ability and writing skill for graduate students.  This course introduces grammar, terms and phrases that are frequently used in English technical articles.  Structures of English essay and thesis will also be explained.

description.zh: 本課程主要目標為將數學方法應用在工程問題，課程內容有常微分方程，線性代數，向量微積分，及偏微分方程式等之簡介，訓練同學數學應用於工程計算及研究。內容包括數值方法，機率理論及數學機率等。
description.en: The main target of this course is to intoduce mathematical methods ot engineering applications; the course will cover areas in differential equations and vecto calculus. This course will also train students in applying mathematics to engineering calculations and research, such as unmerical methods and statistical methods.

description.zh: 介紹空調系統節能的理論與實用技術。內容包括：空調元件能源秏損分析，系統搭配之操作性能及總體熱效率評估，耗能因素改善方法與技術，節能設備之原理與設計技術。
description.en: The course is prepared for the theory and technology of ventilation energy conservation. The topics are: energy loss analysis of system components, survey of system cop and overall efficiency, improving methods and technology, and the fundamentals and design technology of energy conservation devices.

description.zh: 本課程使學生充分瞭解燃料電池專業學科基礎知識，並進一步啟發及增進學生未來能源科技發展知能。燃料電池是一種電化學的發電裝置，其運作原理係利用電化學反應將燃料內之化學能直接轉換為電能，因其在能量轉換過程中並不經過熱機過程，因此能量轉換效率較高。本課程之授課綱要可分為以下幾項：燃料電池系統簡介、燃料電池效率及開迴路電壓、燃料電池工作電壓、質子交換膜燃料電池、磷酸燃料電池、鹼性燃料電池、直接甲醇燃料電池、固態氧化物燃料電池、燃料電池的燃料供應、燃料電池電力傳輸、燃料電池系統分析。
description.en: This course enables students to fully understand the basics of professional disciplines of the fuel cell, and to further inspire and enhance the knowledge of students about future energy technology. Fuel cell is an electrochemical power generating device. It can directly convert the chemical energy of fuel into the electrical energy via the electrochemical reaction. Because it does not go through the process of thermal engine in the energy conversion process, and therefore a higher energy conversion efficiency. Teaching outlines of the course can be divided into the followings:Introduction to fuel cell system, Efficiency and open voltage, Operational fuel cell voltages, Proton exchange membrane fuel cell, Phosphoric acid fuel cell, Alkaline fuel cell, Direct methanol fuel cell, Solid oxide fuel cell, Fueling fuel cell, Delivering fuel cell power, Analysis of fuel cell system.

description.zh: 本門課主要簡介各項再生能源系統之原理與未來發展，內容包括以下﹕各種再生能源系統之應用與分析，燃料電池之應用與分析，生質能之應用，及新能源之應用效益分析。
description.en: This course is an introduction to the principles and future development of renewable system that includes the applications and analysis of different types of renewable energy, fuel cells, and bio-energy, analysis on the benefits of new energy applications.

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程為訓練學生具有敏銳的觀察能力及細密的思考能力，以發現技職教育的相關問題，並擬定完善可行的研究計畫，遂行研究工作，經客觀分析程序，並作成研究論。課程內容括技職教育研究概論、研究設計、研究方法、取樣與量測、資料處理、報告撰寫。
description.en: This course is a survey of research methodology that is relevant to the technological education. It discusses how to design quantitative research, collect, and report the data. It also highlights the difference between quantitative research and qualitative research.

description.zh: 本課程訓練學生熟悉電腦系統並應用電腦套裝軟體，作為研究分析之基礎，以進行教育研究工作，包含 SPSS、ERIC 及其他相關軟體。
description.en: This course emphasis the applications of computer in the educational research.

name.zh: 電腦在教育研究的應用

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討當代輔導理論、技職教育學生特質，以及各種重要之學生問題如生涯規劃、職業輔導等輔導的原理與方法。
description.en: The course is designed to explore the theories and practice of Counseling for vocational and technical school students. The contents conclude the principles of counseling, characters of students, and the various techniques of counseling.

name.en: Guidance for Vocational and Technical Schools’ Students

description.zh: 本課程在探討技職教育行政理論包括組織、領導、決策、溝通、效能研究等及其相關實務之研究。期培育學生分析當前技職教育行政問題，並研訂技職教育的改善措施。
