description.en: The aims of the course are to explore the theory and practice of educational administration, especially the educational organization, leadership, decision making, communication, etc. Students are expected to apply related theory to analyze VTE issues after the class.

notes: 日夜合開，共同 302 教室

description.zh: 課程內容包括：生涯理念介紹、興趣、性格、價值觀探討、生涯決定因素、生涯技巧、生涯角色調適、生涯選擇與規劃技巧、生涯訪談、生涯高原調適、性別和職業歧視、雙生涯家庭、就業準備等主要生涯的研究與實作。
description.en: In-depth study of research in career development and guidance. Topics include an introduction to career idea, the exploration of interest, personality, and view of value, decision making of career, techniques of career development, adjustment of career role, choice and planning of career, interview, adjustment of career highness, adjustment of changing role, discrimination of gender and job, a family of two career parents, job preparation.

description.zh: （一）瞭解學校人力資源發展與管理之定義、內涵與功能；（二）培養進行學校人力資源發展與管理之基本能力。課程內容包括：學校人力資源發展與管理之定義與內涵、人力資源管理與學校效能、學校人力資源發展之需求評估與規劃、教職員工甄選、教職員工的工作動機、教職員工專業發展、教職員工的績效評量、薪資與獎勵及創造高生產力的工作環境等。
description.en: The course aims to (1) understand the definition, essence, and function of human resources development and management in schools, (2) cultivate the fundamental capability of developing human resource development and management in schools. It covers the definition and essence of human resources development and management in schools, human resource management and effective schools, assessing and planning of human resource development in schools, selecting staffs, motivation of personnel, professional development for educational personnel, evaluating employee performance, compensation and rewards, and creating productive work environments.

name.zh: 學校人力資源發展與管理
name.en: Human Resource Development and Management in Schools

description.zh: 探討網路教學與學習之相關原理，以及實務應用。內容包括有網路學習之優點、特性、限制、科技、媒體、平台、教材、教師角色與管理、學生角色與任務、實際案例、未來趨勢等。
description.en: To explore theories and practical application Web-based instruction and learning including WBL advantages, characteristics, limitations, technology, media, platforms, materials, teacher roles and management, student roles and tasks, practical cases, and future trends etc..

description.zh: 本課程將探討數位學習國內、外發展現況和不同領域進行分析包含數位學習新興趨勢，並就國內外發展狀況、我國現階段的推動及發展策略進行介紹。
description.en: The course is designed to examine future trends and research in e-learning. It will also explore the issues on the development of e -learning and practical issues.

description.zh: 探討數位化測驗與評量之相關原理、設計、以及實務應用。內容包括有數位化測驗與評量之理論基礎、優點、特性、限制、科技、設計與發展、系統、教學管理、實際案例、未來趨勢等。另外尚包括數位化另類評量，如電子化學習檔案、數位化檔案評量、數位化概念圖、電腦化同儕互評等。
description.en: To explore theories, design and practical application of digital test and asessment including their theortical fundamentals, advantages, characteristics, limitations, technology, design and development, system, instructional management, practical cases, and future trends etc...Moreover, digital alternative assessments such as e-portfolio, digital portfolio assessment, digital concept map, and computer-based peer assessment are also included.

description.zh: 管理心理學係運用行為科學的方法，事實及歷程，以處理人們在工作中的行為及心理的一門科學。本課程希望讓學生了解管理心理學如何影響他們的生活與工作，並能有效地運用管理技巧來處理企業中的人與事。
description.en: Administrative psychology is a science, which makes use of the method, fact, and process of the behavior science to handle people's behavior and minds in their work. This curriculum is expected to make students understand how administrative psychology affect their life and work, and how to use the management skill to effectively deal with the personnel and matter in the enterprise.

description.zh: 研究生依據個人基礎：透過個別化指導，就其興趣對技職教育學制領域，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作以發展研究能力。
description.en: An individualized study program is planned to develop the skills and research for graduate students and guided by a professor. Exploration of current issues, theories, and research in technical- vocation education schooling system.

name.zh: 獨立研究 -- 技職學制

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討高分子在溶液及固態時的物理化學現象及其應用。內容包括�溶液熱力學？高分子的微結構及定性。�溶液熱力學探討統計熱力學、晶格理論、Flory-Huggin 理論、Flory-Krigbaum 理論、相分離、θ- 溫度、滲透壓、GPC 測分子量、高分子膠體。? 高分子之微結構包括有高分子之形狀、自由旋轉分子鏈距離、光散射、中子散射、排拒體積、碎形、霍氏光譜及核磁共振儀在高分子微結構之分析。
description.en: The course is to investigate the physical phenomena of macromolecules in the solution and solid state. It includes the solution thermodynamics and chemical microstructure of polymer chains.The solution thermodynamics is to study lattice theory, statistical thermodynamics, Flory-Huggin theory, Flory-Krigbaum theory, phase separation, θ-temperature, Osmometry, GPC, and polymer gels.Light scattering and Neutron scattering are used to characterize the polymer microstructure. Polymer radius of gyration, freely rotating chains, excluded volume, fractal, and scaling are also discussed. Finally, spectroscopy methods are used to study polymerization models and microstructure.

description.zh: 本課程包含材料的結構鑑定和材料的性質分析。材料的結構鑑定方法有：元素分析、吸收光譜法、振動光譜法、核磁共振光譜法、質譜法、x - 射線光譜法和電子顯微鏡法。材料的性質分析包含：材料熱性質 (DSC, TGA, TMA,DMA) 和材料機械性質 (伸張、壓縮、剪力強度等)。
description.en: The materials of the course include structure identification and property analysis of materials. Methods of structure identification  of materials are : elemental analysis, absorption spectroscopy, vibration spectroscopy, nuclear magnetic resonance spectroscopy, mass spectrometry, x-ray spectroscopy and electron microscopy. Metheds of property analysis of materials are : thermal properties of materials (DSC,TGA,TMA,DMA) and mechanical properties of materials (tensile, compression and shear strengths).

name.en: Analysis and Identification of Organic Materials

description.zh: 本課程主要探討各種高分子之聚合方法及動力學之研究，如逐步聚合、遊離基連鎖聚合、乳化聚合、離子連鎖聚合、連鎖共聚合反應、開環聚合、立體規則高分子之合成，未終止的游離基聚合方法。從分子量的分佈，結構物性之關係，作高分子聚合之最佳化設計，並且探討這些聚合方法如何應用在最新的科技上，如光電材料、複合材料。
description.en: This course is to elucidate the polymer synthesis and Kinetics studies. The synthesis includes step polymerization, free radical chain polymerization, emulsion polymerization, ionic chain polymerization, chain copolymerization, ring opening polymerization, sterospecific polymerization and living free radical polymerization. The synthesis scheme is optimized with the structure-properties relationship and molecular design. The potential application of these methods in high-tech materials, such as optoelectronics, and composites, will be elucidated.

description.zh: 此課程屬於高等無機化學特論，針對研究所學生有志於從事應用研究或投入化學工業而開設，有機金屬不只是化學家重要的研究工具也是化學工程師在設計反應的利器。課程內容包括：主族有機金屬、過渡元素之有機金屬化合物、硼族有機金屬、銅銀金之有機金屬、18 價電子原理、s, p 受體予體、有機錫
description.en: The advanced course for inorganic chemistry is designed for graduates who plan to initiate their academic research in the chemical field or work in chemical plants. Organometallics provides not only the powerful tools for chemist in their research but also for chemical engineers in the design of their reactors.  The course covers the following topics: (1) Main-group organometallics (2) Organometallic compounds of the transition elements (3) Organometallics of the boron group (4) Organometallics of Copper, Silver and Gold (5) The 18-Valence-Electron (18-VE) Rule (6) s, p donors and acceptors (7) Organotin

description.zh: 本課程論述工業生產演進與全球綠色設計方法、趨勢，以及規範與法規需求，定義出創新、高品質和優秀的設計。引導學生多元領域學習，在建築設計中提出兼具環境、社會與經濟平衡之構想，藉以奠定我國未來勞動力市場的循環建築創新能量。
description.en: This course discusses the evolution of industrial production and global green design methods and trends, as well as the requirements of regulations and regulations, and defines innovation, high quality and excellent design. Guide students to study in multiple fields, and put forward the concept of environmental, social and economic balance in architectural design, so as to lay the energy of circular architectural innovation in China's future labor market.

notes: 建築三與職建都所合開

description.zh: 本課程主要在論述計畫於都市發展過程的干預以及維護環境永續發展之分派與管理角色，其內容包括：    一、 規劃、規劃師與計畫    二、 1800 年到 1900 年的都市發展    三、 都市計畫的先驅著    四、 戰後規劃的開創    五、 國土與區域計畫    六、 都市與都市區域計畫    七、 歐美的都市計畫    八、 未來聚落的都市規劃
description.en: This course is mainly to discuss the role of planning as a form of intervention in the development process, and introduce the role of planning in the allocation and management of a sustainable environment. Thus the course including:    1. Planning, planners and plans    2. The origins: urban growth from 1800 to 1940    3. The seers: pioneer thinkers in urban planning, from        1880 to 1945    4. The creation of the postwar planning machine, from        1940 to 1952    5. National/regional planning from 1945 to 1990    6. Planning for cities and city regions from 1945 to        1990    7. Planning in Western Europe, United States since 1945    8. Settlements into the 21st century

notes: 日職建都所與設計博合開

description.zh: 專題討論照明與視覺心理等課題，期能對於照明相關知識能有深刻了解，並能藉課堂的研討與文獻閱讀等方法提出見解。課程內容包括永續發展之綠色照明、照明與色彩、眩光之評價、光源之新發展、燈具之美、高齡者之照明環境、防災照明、視覺與輝度分布、照明耗能評估指標與基準、晝光利用、照明之控制、道路照明與安全、戶外照明與都市環境、光污染等。
description.en: The topic is discussed with lighting and visual psychology that expect to understand some knowledge about lighting, by the method of discussion and technical literature reading to provide an opinion about lighting. The course are including green lighting for sustainable development, lighting and color, the evaluation of glare, the new tendency of lighting source, the beauty of luminair, lighting for venerable age, lighting for fire control, visual and luminance distribution, evaluation index and base of lighting energy, the advantage of daylight, lighting control, road lighting and safety, outdoor lighting and urban environment, lighting pollution.

name.en: Traditional architecture of Taiwan in Special Topics

description.zh: 針對學生在建築設計及都市規劃基礎訓練之後，有異於前期以技術性思考，改以都市開發及宏觀政策及微觀個案財務之角度切入建築及都市開發之議題，以輔助學生建立都市開發與都市型態間關連性之整合概念。
description.en: After the technical approaches in urban planning and building design, the financial and political issues are to be taken into consideration in urban affairs. The micro- financial plan in developments and the macro- political issues in housing policy would be introduced to the urban planning practice.

name.en: The housing Development and urban Policy

description.zh: 本課程主要以歷史脈絡與觀點，鼓勵學生瞭解時空推移與聚落發展及計畫需求的差異，以加強其專業潛力及強化其能力以服務人群。課程內容主要包括：    一、 都市化的萌芽    二、 古典都市    三、 中世紀城鎮    四、 新古典城市    五、 工業革命    六、 都市對比    七、 生活條件提昇    八、 尋求好的都市    九、 重建都市與現代社會趨勢
description.en: The aim of this course is to encourage students to fulfill their professional potentials and expand their ability to serve the public by a historical context and perspectives. Its content including:  1. The dawn of urbanization  2. The classic city  3. The medieval city  4. The neoclassic city  5. The industrial revolution  6. The city of contrasts  7. Betterment of living conditions  8. Environmental improvement  9. Search for the good city  10. Rebuilding our city and modern social trends

description.zh: 本課程主要在教導學生探討基本室內環境品質與人體健康間的關係，使學生具備創造健康室內環境的相關知識及操作能力，主要授課要點如下：1. 以各種類型的建築室內環境為主題；2. 探討人為環境與人體健康之關係；3. 探討建築材料、構造與設備對室內環境各項因子之影響；4. 學習室內環境品質量測儀器之操作與判讀能力；5. 具備診斷與改善一般室內環境議題之相關專業知識及操作能力。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to discuss the relationship between Indoor Environment Quality and human healthy, and make sure our students can realize the knowledge of healthy environment and manage it.Contents：1. The indoor environment of different types of building.2. The relationship between the artificial environment and human health.3. Discuss the influence of the building material, construction and equipment on indoor environment.4. Learn to use the instrument to measure indoor environment quality.5. Learn to diagnose and improve indoor environment quality.

description.zh: 本門課之目的是讓學生熟悉研究方法設計。主題涵蓋研究計劃之準備及撰擬；主要研究方法，如調查研究法、相關研究法、實驗研究法、個案研究法、人種誌研究法，行動研究法，觀察研究法和內容分析研究法；質性和量化資料之搜集與分析；敘述統計和推論統計。
description.en: This course familiarizes students with the procedures of research in education and applied linguistics.  Topics will include the nature and process of research; survey research; experimental research; correlational research; case study; grounded theory research; ethnographic research; narrative research; action research; data collection and data analysis; descriptive statistics; and sampling and inferential statistics.

name.zh: 研究方法 - 應用語言學

description.zh: 「研究成果具有足以影響意見和行動的力量，因此有責任感的作者會以謹慎細心的態度撰寫之」。(MLA Handbook for the Writers of Research Papers, xiv). 本課程以人文學科領域通用的 MLA 系統為基礎，加強學生對論文撰寫規範的認識，並經由研究過程的實踐和論文的撰寫體認學術研究的目的及價值。課程開始時學生須選擇一較為廣泛的主題，學習如何抽絲剝繭，找出核心的問題，進一步釐清研究的重點所在，然後經過仔細研究搜尋，最後以論文報告呈現成果。透過此一過程，學生將體認到學術研究有嚴謹明確的規範，需經過一步一步的印證，方能寫出合乎專業水準的研究論文或報告。
description.en: "Because research has the power to affect opinions and actions, responsible writers compose their work with great care." (MLA Handbook for the Writers of Research Papers, xiv).This course will define for students the rules, practices, purposes, and value of scrupulous scholarship and careful documentation in accordance with the MLA system shared by a wide community of researchers world-wide.  Beginning with the selection of a general topic, moving toward a specific research question and then researching and documenting the answer to that question will be a step-by-step process with clear guidelines resulting in the student's knowledge of how to produce a paper acceptable to scholars world-wide.

name.zh: 研究方法 -- 文化研究應用
name.en: Research Methods in Applied Cultural Studies

description.zh: 本課程廣泛介紹社會語言學的各個次領域，目的在引導學生瞭解此領域早期的基礎研究與現代的關注議題。學生可藉此認識英語在社會上的運用以及各種社會變因對於語言運作的影響。修完本課程後，學生有能力辨認現代英語的不同語體、解釋語言使用所牽涉到的社會因素、運用社會語言學中適切的研究方法完成語言研究，並能將社會語言學的概念應用到語言教學。
description.en: This course provides a comprehensive overview of sociolinguistic subcategories with the goal of introducing students to both early foundational work and current issues in this field. It provides students with valuable knowledge in the use of the English language in society and the effects of intricate social variables on language operation. Upon completion of this course, students will be able to identify the social varieties of English spoken in the present world, to explain the social factors involved in language use, to use appropriate methodology in sociolinguistics to conduct linguistic research, and to apply sociolinguistic knowledge to language teaching.

description.zh: 不同文化之間的對話需要故事的講述。了解一種文化的故事有助於人們了解這種文化並與其人民交談。有時，一種文化會借用另一種文化的故事，或者寫一個關於彼此文化碰撞的故事。(例如，關於亞洲的美國故事，或關於美國的亞洲故事)。為了幫助學生與來自其他文化的人們談論重要的思想，本課程研究跨文化共享故事以及一種文化講述其他文化的故事。
description.en: Conversation between different cultures requires the description of stories.  Knowing a culture’s stories helps one to understand that culture and talk with its people. Sometimes a culture borrows a story from another culture or writes a story about its encounter with that other culture.  (For example, American stories about Asia or Asian stories about America).  To help students talk about important ideas with people from other cultures, this course examines stories shared across cultures and stories one culture tells about another.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study, Seminar, Group Meeting.

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion.

description.zh: 主要內容包含：企業研究的本質、研究流程、研究問題與假設、文獻評論、資料收集、操作性定義、測量、理論架構模型化、研究設計、量化與質化研究、個案研究法、資料分析與解釋、研究報告撰寫。
description.en: The course mainly discusses concepts of business research methods. The contents will include following topics：（1）the nature of business research, （2）elements of research and research process, （3）research problem and hypothesis,（4）literature review, （5）research design, （6）research proposal, （7）case study, （8）analysis and the interpretation of data, （9）quantitative and qualitative research,(10) research report.

description.zh: 本課程包含 2 大部份，服務與創新管理及智慧財產權與科技法律。 服務與創新管理旨在了解服務與創新管理之意義、方法與現況，內容包含服務之本質、創新之意義、服務與創新管理之方法、科技之應用、服務與創新管理現況介紹等。智慧財產權與科技法律旨在了解如何以智慧財產權來保護科技研發成果，內容包括智慧財產權法規介紹與專利運用策略實務。
description.en: This course contains two major parts, service and innovation management and Intellectual property and technology law. Service and innovation management is to demonstrate the definition, the methodologies and the state of the art of service and innovation management, including the nature of service, innovation, the tools for service and innovation management, technology application and current development of service and innovation management. Intellectual property and technology law is to demonstrate understanding how to protect R & D achievements with intellectual property rights. This course includes intellectual property laws and patent strategies practice.

name.en: Introduction to Services and Technology Management

description.zh: 本課程旨在教導學生一個簡潔、廣泛又清楚的工業設計研究方法的知識及技能架構，課程包括二大部份；第一部份探討工業設計研究計畫的準備及撰擬，第二部份除比較分析主要的工業設計研究方法外，也同時探討其中一種研究方法在工業設計專業領域的應用實例。
description.en: This course is a survey of research methodology that is relevant to the Industrial Design field. It focuses on conducting an industrial design research, collect, and report the data. This course also highlights the difference among that mainstream research methodology in Industrial Design field.

description.zh: 設計相關專題，以文獻研讀，邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Topical studies in history, theory, and criticism of design. Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses. The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation. Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

description.zh: 永續發展是妥善規劃與管理自然資源之最高指導原則，因此本課程﹙一﹚依此宗旨討論水資源保育、固廢管理與空氣污染控制；更將以實際例將面向擴及科技與社經整合層次，以期落實理論於實際應用之中。
description.en: This is intented as a brief introduction to the subject of the substainable development of natural resource. Main subject are water conservation, solid waste management and air pollution control. Many overall regional case studies will be discussed. It must be technologic, economic and social environmental change or a new factural data are developed

description.zh: 專題報告，專題演講，研究小組討論。
description.en: Seminar  report ， seminar  speech ， seminar  discussion。

description.zh: 1. 物件導向程式設計特性介紹 2. 視窗圖形界面設計 3. SQL 語言的使用與資料庫連結 4. 智慧型演算法 5. 工程實例應用
description.en: 1.An introduction to object-oriented design 2.Windows GUI design 3.SQL and Database connection programming 4.Intelligent Algorithms 5. Applications of engineering problems

name.zh: 物件導向程式設計與應用

description.zh: 本課程旨在以實例探討，培養學生具備從事學術工作所需之研究能力。課程內容主要包括：研究問題定義與假設、研究規劃、資料收集、文獻評論、理論方法、研究倫理、案例探討，研究報告撰寫等。
description.en: The aim of this course is to help students develop the ability for conducting academic research through the study of practical problems. The contents of this course include defining research problems and hypothesis, research design, data collection, literature review, methodology, research ethics, case studies, and writing up.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 本課程說明如何利用質量及動量守恆建立可以描述速度、應力及壓力等流體系統物理量間關係之統制方程式。其內容包括：線及角動量守衡、應力張量、平滑近似理論、非穩態流動、邊界層近似法、線性穩定度理論及紊流系統。
description.en: We will learn how fundamental principles such as conservation of mass and momentum lead to equations that govern or describe the interrelationships of velocity, stress, pressure, and so on. Content includes macroscopic balance for linear and angular momentum, the stress tensor, lubrication approximation, unsteady flow、the boundary layer approximation, linear stability theory, and turbulent flows.

description.zh: 反應工程是在商業規模之考慮下對化學反應開發利用之相關工程活動。其目的在成功的設計和操作化學反應器，並使化學工程在工程專業中成為一個獨特的支系。此高等反應工程是延續大學部己學習在均相中有關之簡單觀念及理論，並推展到非均相較複雜系統之設計及操作上。學生在修習此課後，對於較複雜之反應器有清晰及整體之概念。
description.en: Under commercial scale consideration, chemical reaction engineering is that engineering concerning the exploitiaton of chemical reactions Its goal is the successful design and operation of chemical reactors and it sets chemical engineering apart as a distinct branch of the engineering profession. This aduanced chemical reaction engineering is a continuative study of simple idea and principle for homogeneous systems and extended to heterogeneous and more complex systems for design and operation. After study in this course, the student can obtain clear and unified coucept of complex reactor systems.

description.zh: 本課程將從石油談起，介紹煉油工業主要產品、生產製程及技術，並將介紹供應石化產業基本原料的輕油裂解工場、媒組工場以及其衍生之各種烯烴與芳香烴工業。隨著環保意識高漲，石油工業發展面臨，工安、環保、節能減碳、水資源、化石能源永續性發展等嚴峻挑戰以及面對產業轉型之石化高值化，也是本課程之目標。
description.en: Topics covered: 1. Characteristics of crude, petroleum product and its manufacture.2. Processes technology in petroleum refining & petrochemical manufacture 3. Petrochemicals and its application4. Overview of Taiwan petrochemical industry 5. Industrial safety, environmental concern, energy conservation and sustainability issue in regard to fossil fuel6. High value added & rejuvenation of Taiwan petrochemical industry

description.zh: 研究期刊內容，針對學生之學習，提出研究心得閱讀報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion. Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 加強學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion. Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 1.X 光之本質 2. 晶体幾何及倒置晶格 3. 晶體立體投影 4.X 光繞射原理 5.X 光繞射實驗方法 (繞射儀，Laue 照相法，粉末法) 6.X 光繞射之應用 (包括晶體結構之鑑定，晶格常數之量測，相圖測定，序化一非序化轉換及化學成分分析等)
description.en: 1.Properties of X-Ray 2.Crystallography and Reciprocal Lattice 3.Projections of Crystals 4.Principles of X-Ray Diffraction 5.Experimental Methods (Diffractometer Methods, Powder Photographs and Laue Pholtographs)6.Applications of X-ray Diffraction (Orientation and Quality of Single Crystal,  Structure of Polycrystalline Aggregates, Determine of Crystal Structure and Precise Parameter Measurements, Chemical Analysis, Phase Transformations etc.)

description.zh: 本課程主要針對非材料系背景之研究生開設， 對各種材料（金屬、陶瓷、高分子、複合材料）之基本原理，性質及應用，做概要性的介紹。內容包括材料之晶體結構與晶體缺陷，固體材料之原子擴散，相圖與相變化，材料製程及應用，材料之物理性質（光性質、電性質、磁性質及熱性質）.
description.en: Special topics in 1.The structure of crystalline solids. 2.Imperfections in solids. 3.Phase transformation and phase equilibrium. 4.Strengthening mechanism of materials. 5.Metal alloys 6.Ceramics 7.Polymers

name.en: Special Topics of Materials Science and Engineering

description.zh: 本課程是設計給研究所的理、工科學生作為研習管理的入門課程 (實務研討)，內容大體上包括有管理的基本理論、管理資訊系統、創新性技術對傳統的挑戰、科技法律概念、科技發展的專利地圖與迴避設計、科技知識管理、個案討論等等。在今天快速變動與競爭激烈的經營環境中，屬於無形資產之一的科學技術往往被認為是企業最不容易評估以及最不容易管理的課題，從歷史眼光看，大凡一家公司能夠將本身的技術管理的好並且能即時掌握競爭對手的最新技術動態，通常多能成就一番非凡事業。
description.en: The course is designed as a preliminary management study for graduate school  students majoring in science and engineering. It is focused on issues related to: Fundamental Principles of Management, Management Information System, The Challenge of Innovative Technologies to Tradition, The Concept of Technology Law, Patent Mapping and Design -Around of Research & Development, Knowledge management of Technology and Case Discussions, etc. In today's fast moving and keenly competitive management environment, the evaluation and management of the scientific technology, one of the intangible assets, have been considered the ultimately difficult issues in every business enterprise. From the viewpoint of history, provided that an enterprise not only can properly manage their own technology but also can get the latest information of their competitors' technologies, it would always accomplish notable achievements.

description.zh: 在科技發展快速的年代，有些人認為產業和市場需要更多新的法律規範，也有些人認為舊有法律需要鬆綁。但無庸置疑地，法律在科技、產業與市場的發展中，扮演著一個攸關重要的角色。基於此，本課程嘗試以設計案例討論，鼓勵不同背景的學生，經由案例分析得到綜合性的知識、從中了解科技發展如何影響法律變遷，並進而學習專業的法律策略。
description.en: In an age of rapid technology advancement, some people might insist more laws are necessary to regulate the industry and the market, on the contrary, others might think de-regulation is the best approach to encourage the free flow of the market. Nonetheless, it is beyond question that law and regulations play an vital role in the technology-driven economy today. Therefore this course is designed to help students from various backgrounds to engage in the group discussions on assigned cases. Students are expected to learn how the technology development shapes the legal environment and learn how to analyze the legal strategies.

name.zh: 科技發展與法律策略：案例研析
name.en: Technology Development and Legal Strategy: Case Study

description.zh: 本課程將介紹申請專利的相關規定，以及辦理其他有關專利事項，例如：申請分割、申請改請、專利權讓與、提起舉發等等，必須符合之程序要件；另外也將介紹台灣之新型專利相關之申請與審查作業。
description.en: In this course, we will focus on the practices of the patent application procedures and related regulations. In addition, utility model patent system in Taiwan is also presented.

name.zh: 專利程序審查與新型專利
name.en: Patent application procedures and utility model patent

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於從科學哲學層次、研究方法層次、與實際操作層次探討設計研究的本質，內容包括界定設計研究問題、選用適當的量化或質性研究方法與特定工具、研究結果詮釋、案例解析、以及論文寫作等，俾使同學具備研究之基礎觀念以及進行創作或理論論文寫作之能力。研究方法一強調量化研究，課程內容包含研究的基本概念、文獻探討、研究問題、研究變項、研究假設、研究設計、資料蒐集與分析、研究工具、研究樣本、研究倫理與研究論文撰寫等。教學以課堂講授與論文研討與發表為主要方式，並以隨堂測驗、報告與分組討論與發表為評量依據。
description.en: The aims of this course are to explore the nature of design research at the three various levels of scientific philosophy, research methods, and pr92tical execution. The contents involve the introduction of defining the design problems, selecting the quantitative or qualitative research methods and specific instruments, interpretation of research results, case studies, as well as writing a thesis. This research methods one focus on quantitative research that content details includes fundamental concept of research, literature review, research problem, research variables, research hypothesis, research design, data collection and analysis, research instruments, research samples, research ethics and writing up. The te92hing methods include lectures, paper discussion and presentation based on the course assessment of assigned project, panel discussion and individual/group presentation.

description.zh: 本課程規劃的目標為以互動設計的理論為基礎，實務導向為原則，使學習者能將學術界的理論與產業界的實務加以結合以充實對於互動設計具有全面性的了解。學習的內容包含互動設計系統構成要素、理論與實務基礎、互動設計方法與技術、科技支援與應用、認知心理、情境設計以及電腦支援協同合作等單元，各單元並包含不同互動設計個案的研討，使理論能與實務進行驗證。課程亦安排至相關領域業界的參訪，以加深對於互動設計實務的印象與了解。
description.en: The course aims to develop broad understanding on inter92tion design for students, based on theory and pr92tice course structure. Course topics include essential f92tors of inter92tive system, inter92tion design theory and pr92tice, inter92tion design methods and techniques, technical support and application, cognitive psychology, scenario design and CSCW. Course also incorporates case studies and company visits to enhance the understanding of integrating theory and pr92tice.

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於研討互動設計、互動媒體、互動藝術之相關研究專題，以文獻研讀、論文研讀討論以及個案研究為重點，藉由密集討論、書面報告以及設計專題之之研究與實作，學生可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的體驗，並具備研究、分析、實作之能力。本所以結合電子資訊、機電、人文、設計與藝術等各領域的學生，以整合培育互動媒體設計專業人才，因此，本課程之另一主要學習目標為建構一多元領域交互學習的環境，以專題導向式為學習模式，可分別組合具設計、藝術、資訊、機電等專長的研究生，協同完成互動媒體設計專題的研究，或是透過互動媒體設計個案研討、互動媒體設計專題創作的方式進行。教學將以課堂講授、論文研討與發表以及專題實作為主，並以報告、分組討論與發表以及實作作品為評量方式。
description.en: This course is to explore the fields of inter92tion design, inter92tive media and inter92tive art and focus on the literature study, paper discussion and case studies. With panel discussion, research report and design pr92tice, graduate students can be able to learn the ability of research, analysis and pr92tice by effectively exchange opinions and personal experience. The aim of graduate of inter92tive media design is to integrate different disciplines from computer science, mechatronics, human-culture and design and art so as to foster the professional of inter92tive media design. Therefore, one of the aims of this course is to construct multi-disciplines learning environment which perform a topic-oriented study model. This study model formulates the graduate students of design, art, information and mechatronic disciplines to collaborate an inter92tive media design project. It may execute inter92tive media design by working with the form of case study or design creation.

name.en: Special Topics on Inter92tive Media Design (I)

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於介紹使用者經驗設計之理論與研究方法。藉由本課程的學習，學生能習得互動設計過程中所需要之關鍵概念 - 以使用者經驗為中心之設計。課程以人 - 機 - 境之架構為基礎進行相關知識之講授，並透過相關研究案例之研討、方法之操作以及設計研究之進行了解其原理。課程內容包含人物誌、使用者經驗與需求、互動環境、使用者研究以及認知心理基礎等。教學將以課堂講授、文獻閱讀以及研究方法操作等方式進行，並以報告繳交、分組討論與發表為評量方式。
description.en: This course is focused on introducing the theories and research methods of User Experience Design (UXD). In this course, students can understand the key element, UX, of interactive design. This course is set up under the structure of Human-Machine-Scenario theory, and executed through research case studies, method simulation and design research. The contents include personas, user experience and requirements, interactive scenario, user research and cognitive psychology. The course is preceded by means of lecturing, literature review and research conducting. Students are evaluated by reports, group discussion and presentation.

description.zh: 本課程將透過介紹及研讀創新服務的標竿案例，以了解創新服務的本質與實質效益。學生將透過共同研討與分組實作的的方式，針對不同場域及技術的創新服務，透過資源整合的方式，提出具體的創新服務專案，並提出其評估的方法。
description.en: This course will provide the student basics knowledge and practical benefits of the innovative services through benchmark case introduction and study. Students will collaborate to each other to propose practical innovation service project proposal in the aspect of resources management, technology applications, service mechanism and associated assessment methods  in various domains.

description.zh: 本課程旨在透過案例的企劃，協助學生從 Web 的設計領域，跨入到 Mobile App 的領域當中，可以充分發揮 iPhone 和 Android 的平台特色，做出真正具備使用者經驗的 App (應用程式)。課程以實際分組討論結合 Paper Prototype 的方式，以 UCD（User-Centered Design）的精神，分組進行工作坊形式的體驗教學，企劃出具有創意並可行的應用程式。課程所談的 App 應用程式企劃，以 iPhone 和 Android 為主。
description.en: This course is to plan for application programming with concentration on user experience from PC design to mobile devices such as iPhone and Android. Curriculum and instruction characterizes paper prototype, cooperative learning, and workshop. Criteria for program evaluation are innovation, feasible and user-centered design.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹領導的藝術，以使學員瞭解中華傳統文化的觀點如何能增進組織治理的領導績效。課程主要涵蓋的內容包括：(1) 領導的基本概念；(2) 中華傳統文化的領導法則；(3) 領導的案例研究；(4) 領導的實踐。
description.en: This course introduces the art of leadership to the students helping them to understand how the concept of Chinese traditional culture can enhance the performance of leadership in organizational governance. Four major topics will be covered: (1) The basic concept of leadership; (2) the leadership principles of Chinese traditional culture; (3) case analysis of leadership; (4) leadership practices.

notes: (群組 2) 組織領導與人力資源管理

description.zh: 本課程教導學生對製造業與服務業進行精實化管理的策略與技巧。課程內容包含：造成大型企業倒閉的商務環境改變與組織內的問題；科技提昇與電子化管理對企業的衝擊；精實化企業中有效及具競爭力營運管理的要素；精實化管理的發展策略與技巧。探討競爭優勢與生產服務系統模式、經營模式之關連，包括大量客製化、競爭優勢階段性、 發展競爭優勢作為、 豐富顧客價值。本課程將使學員熟習各項品質管理的理論基礎與發展趨勢，強化理論研究與實務應用能力。首先，課程涵蓋基礎統計使學員具備研究方法與分析技術能力，了解收集、統整和分析資料。其次，討論量化的六標準差管理相關工具及專案推行流程，以系統化思維探討問題並提出有效可行的解決對策，持續提升品質及客戶滿意。最後，介紹制度面及組織管理面的全球品管概念，闡述創造魅力品質之重要理論模型及影響服務品質關鍵因素。
description.en: This course covers the strategies and techniques of managing a lean business in manufacturing and in service. The linkages between competitive advantages and production systems, competitive advantages and business models will be discussed first. Then, topics include mass customization, competitive advantage stages, developing competitive capability and maximize customer value. This class will help students familiarize themselves with the trend of theoretical basis of the quality management and strengthen their ability in both theoretical research and practical application. First, the course covers basic statistics so that students will be acquainted with research methods and analysis techniques. Second, the six sigma management tools will be reviewed and the process for its implementation will also be addressed. Finally, the system- and the organization-level quality as well as the Kano Model for attractive quality will be discussed.

name.zh: 企業精實與全球品質管理
name.en: A Lean and Mean Business and Global Quality Management

description.zh: 世界各區域經濟快速發展，面對高度競爭的趨勢，數位轉型是項關鍵議題。本課程將使 EMBA 學生了解數位轉型與優化相關趨勢，並透過一些成功案例探討數位轉型對企業產生之效益，希望透過本課程之研討，EMBA 學生可以將成功案例經驗及所學應用至所屬公司或企業。
description.en: With the expeditious development in regional economic activities and more competition across countries, enterprise digital transformation is an important topic. The aim of this course is to comprehend the latest digital transformation issues and potential benefits to enterprise. Case studies and experience sharing are critical in this course.

name.zh: 企業數位轉型與優化研討
name.en: Seminar on Enterprise digital transformation and optimization

description.zh: 隨著新冠肺炎的疫情，電子商務迅速地蓬勃發展，經營數位行銷的需求，已經是每個公司所必需的。從新產品的開發、行銷、到售後服務均受影響。網路電子商務已經成為傳統行銷實體通路以外的一個新興通路。使得電子商務明顯的成為未來商業發展的主流。因此，如何經營數位行銷已是現代企業具有競爭力重要課題。這個課程幫助企業在充分瞭解顧客信息的基礎上，針對客戶喜好，針對性地進行產品行銷，幫助企事業單位在激烈的市場競爭中取得競爭優勢。
description.en: Digital marketing is the conducting of business on the internet, not only buying and selling but also servicing customers and collaborating with business partners. This course will introduce the digital marketing by the way of concept, theory and case study. This course will study how to develope the business on the internet.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹大數據分析緣起與理論基礎，大數據分析與企業經營間之獲利關聯，並輔以大數據分析案例讓學員對於大數據應用有更深層的認識與啟發。
description.en: The big data opportunity, extracting insight from an immense volume, variety and velocity of data, in context, beyond what was previously possible, will be addressed in this course. Applications for big data analytics could include smarter healthcare, multi-channel, finance, computer log analysis, homeland security, traffic control, telecom, search quality, manufacturing, trading analytics, fraud and risk, retailing, among others.

name.en: Big Data Analytics and Industrial Applications

description.zh: 本課程專注在探討全球組織經營策略與領導決策之關鍵議題，聚焦在不同時空的國際經營環境中，企業經營者如何因應政府的政策與財經情勢改變，能夠快速回應與彈性應變的領導思維與決策。透過本課程將能夠理解高階主管面對政經環境的調整能有效因應變化，並且提升領導才能與創造市場優勢之創新能力。
description.en: The course focuses investigate the global organization's management strategies and leadership decision of the key issues. It is focusing in the different time frames and fierce international environment, how changes in policy of governments and situation of economic. Business executives will be able to quick to respond with the elastic strain of the global strategy perspective and leadership thinking. This course will be able to understand top managers can achieve the decision making of leadership, and improve the leadership knowledge and innovation capabilities in market competition.

name.zh: 全球組織經營策略暨領導決策
name.en: Global Organization's Management Strategies and Leadership Decision

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹人力資源與組織管理的進階理論與實務，內容包括了 (但不限於) 人才任用、訓練與發展、績效評估、薪酬管理、組織設計、領導、工作激勵、以及工作團隊運作等等重要議題。課堂上並討論上述理論對於管理實務上的意涵。
description.en: This course introduces many advanced topics of human resource management, organization theory, and organization behavior. Topics include (but not limited to) staffing, training and development, performance appraisal, compensation, organization design, leadership, work motivation, workgroup functioning. Implications for managerial practice will be discussed in this class.

notes: (群組 2) 組織領導與人力資源管理

description.zh: 由於產業環境辦化及科技創新速度，影響企業之營運模式。本課程旨在針對因應產業 / 工業 4.0 調整，課中會針對企業經營模式變革與產業 / 工業 4.0 產業生態鏈變革探討。 除了理論解析外，本課程並輔以企業實務個案研討。
description.en: Due to the change of industry environment and the speed of technological innovation, the business models of enterprise are impacted. The purpose of this course will study the transform of business model and the impact of Industry 4.0 on the ecosystem of industry. In the course, besides the theory will be included, the business practices case will be also covered.

name.zh: 經營模式與智慧化企業

description.zh: 新創事業面臨許多的挑戰，包括：避孼與大企業競爭，找到存活的依據、從無到創立強勢品牌、創立或擴張自有市場 / 消費者據點等。本課程旨在啟發修課同學創業的興趣並協助修課同學思考新創事業如何平衡有限資源以迎向挑戰。 新創企業已發展成熟的企業是不一樣，主要是因為新創事業的資源有限，創業家必須同時兼顧許多面向並回應顧客所需。本課程旨在協助修課同學思考創建企業應注意的各種面向評估自己的創能力。 課程包含了三大部份，第一部份為創新與創業概念啟發；第二部份在辨別市場機會與發展市場；最後第三部份為新創事業行銷管理。行銷活動能夠將企業的產品及服務傳遞給顧客；並將產品、服務及企業本身的資訊帶到市場上；將顧客資訊回饋給企業。創業行銷管理能夠幫助創業者向潛在投資者及企業夥伴銷售創意以獲得資源，也讓創業家透過創新的商業手法來充分利用稀少的資源。
description.en: Managers must have excellent leadership skills in order to A start-up company has lots of challenges, such as: niche market located and brand diffusion. The course intends to encourage the participant to become an entrepreneur and handle with these challenges. A start-up company is different from well-developed one due to limited resources. Usually, to response customer’s requirement, the entrepreneur must take multiple criteria into consideration simultaneously. The course includes three parts. Part I build students’ concept about innovation and entrepreneurship. Part II is about market identification. Part III is about marketing management of a start-up company. The efficient marketing activities enable business to approach customer’s requirement, to bring their customer product (or services) and get customer’s feedback. Also, the marketing management helps entrepreneur to reach their potential investor to obtain more resources.

description.zh: 本課程上半學期以 R 語言為工具，處理分析金融交易資料於股票期貨與選擇權等商品，包含理論模擬與實務分析。
description.en: In this course, we use R language as a tool to deal with the analysis of financial data in the stock, futures and options and other commodities, including theoretical simulation and practical analysis.

description.zh: 本課程的主旨在研討資訊管理的發展及新趨勢，內容包含資訊策略管理、資料庫管理、網路管理、電腦硬體技術、系統分析、軟體工程、管理資訊系統、決策支援系統、商業智慧、資訊倫理、資訊安全、知識管理、社會網絡等。
description.en: The focus of this course is on research and discussion of the developments and novel trends of information management. The topics include information strategy management, database management, network management, computer hardware developments, system analysis, software engineering, management information systems, decision support systems, business intelligence, information ethics, information security, knowledge management, social networks, and so forth.

description.zh: 本課程以哈佛個案教學方法進行，在每個個案討論當中，同時由行銷管理、財務管理、科技管理、生產管理領域老師教授。可以讓學生在學管理工功能之外，還可以學習這些管理功能的整合，學期末並有分組個案競賽，促進團隊互動與學習。
description.en: The Integrated Management Case Studies would be taught by case methods from Havard Business School’s cases. Every case will be taught from Marketing, Financing, Technology Management, and Operation Management areas faculty. This course focus on the integration of management functions. The case contest will be hold on the final week to encourage team building and learning.

notes: 碩一必修，北科附工 304 室

description.zh: 世界各區域經濟快速發展，面對高度競爭的趨勢，數位轉型是項關鍵議題。本課程將使 EMBA 學生了解數位轉型與優化相關趨勢，並透過一些成功案例探討數位轉型對企業產生之效益，希望透過本課程之研討，EMBA 學生可以將成功案例經驗及所學應用至所屬公司或企業。
description.en: With the expeditious development in regional economic activities and more competition across countries, enterprise digital transformation is an important topic. The aim of this course is to comprehend the latest digital transformation issues and potential benefits to enterprise. Case studies and experience sharing are critical in this course.

name.zh: 企業數位轉型與優化研討
name.en: Seminar on Enterprise digital transformation and optimization

notes: (群組 3) 工業與科技管理，北科附工 304 室

description.zh: 本課程上半學期以 R 語言為工具，處理分析金融交易資料於股票期貨與選擇權等商品，包含理論模擬與實務分析。
description.en: In this course, we use R language as a tool to deal with the analysis of financial data in the stock, futures and options and other commodities, including theoretical simulation and practical analysis.

notes: (群組 6) 財金管理，北科附工 302 室

description.zh: 本課程以哈佛個案教學方法進行，在每個個案討論當中，同時由行銷管理、財務管理、科技管理、生產管理領域老師教授。可以讓學生在學管理工功能之外，還可以學習這些管理功能的整合，學期末並有分組個案競賽，促進團隊互動與學習。
description.en: The Integrated Management Case Studies would be taught by case methods from Havard Business School’s cases. Every case will be taught from Marketing, Financing, Technology Management, and Operation Management areas faculty. This course focus on the integration of management functions. The case contest will be hold on the final week to encourage team building and learning.

description.zh: 讓學生瞭解製造業與服務業行銷的觀念和趨勢。主要包括以下課題：（1）消費者行為（2）市場區隔（3）產品策略（4）行銷通路（5）網路行銷（6）促銷（7）關係行銷。
description.en: The course teaches the student marketing concepts and trends. The topics will be covered: (1) consumer behavior, (2) marketing segmentation, (3) product strategy, (4) marketing channels, (5) online marketing, (6) relationship marketing.

description.zh: 策略管理主要是幫助製造業與服務業高階管理者作決策。一般而言，這門課程主要協助學員們具有策略思維與整合能力。學員可在策略管理學習過程活學活用，更能融合所學應用於管理決策中。此門課也採用適當的製造業與服務業個案研討來幫助學員學習、研讀與熟悉策略管理的運作，以達成此門課的目標。授課主題包括研討策略管理的本質與整體架構，瞭解組織所處環境 ， 分析外部環境之時機和危機， 剖析內部組織之優劣勢 ， 探討企業不同層次之應對策略，整合策略的執行與治理等。
description.en: Strategic management deals with the decision making in manufacturing and service industry at the top management level. Generally, this course provides students with strategic thinking and knowledge integration. With case studies in manufacturing and service industry, this course also helps students learn, study, and understand the process of strategic management well to achieve the goals of the course. Topics in this course include the essence and whole framework of strategic management, in what circumstances an organization has been, analyses on the opportunities and threats of external environment, the strengths and weaknesses of internal organization, application strategies of companies at different levels, implantation on integration strategies and so forth.

description.zh: 本課程設計為讓初學者了解並能分析在現今市場環境下，企業所面臨的財務問題。課程涵蓋企業資本評價的基本模型，包含企業金融資產的定價模式、實體資產評價與投資專案分析、資本結構分析，以及其他企業在資金管理與財務規劃預測的相關議題。目的在讓參與者對『財務決策對公司表現和價值的影響』有更深刻的認識。
description.en: The course develops theoretical framework for understanding and analyzing major financial problems of modern company in market environment. The course covers basic models of valuation of corporate capital, including pricing models for primary financial assets, real assets valuation and investment projects analysis, capital structure and various types of corporate capital employed, derivative assets and contingent claims on assets. It provides necessary knowledge in evaluating different management decisions and its influence on corporate performance and value.

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於建構產業分析之思維架構及洞悉市場發展之研究能力，以因應市場之快速變遷，並介紹學生瞭解總體經濟與產業景氣分析，公司經營財務報表分析，投資標的評價與技術分析。透過研究方法之介紹及預測手法之教導並輔以個案實作以達其效。
description.en: The objective of the course is to construct the infrastructure of industry analysis and to build up the research capability for changing market development. The fundamental analysis of macro economy and business cycle, financial statement analysis and investment valuation methods are also studied. By introducing the methodologies and forecasting tools, the case study is implied in this class.

description.zh: 課程重點：(1) 藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2) 使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3) 熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4) 透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
description.en: This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through reading materials appropriate to their levels; (2) to develop reading skill by giving explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as analysis of basic writing skill; (3)to  familiarize students with useful expressions in conversation and build up their confidence in cross-cultural communication; (4)to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

description.zh: 國文，是運用本國語言文字，蘊釀於欣賞文藝作品，充實文化內涵，增進思維能力與人文素養的一門課程。本課程分為大一上學期 2 學分，大一下學期 2 學分。大一上學期的授課內容，以文學名篇為範圍；希望藉此擴建學生深入品味文學趣味的能力，鍛鍊靈活的語文敏感度，默契文學創意，甚而嘗試創作。大一下學期的授課內容，以思想名篇為範圍；希望藉此啟發學生透轍分析各家學說思想，漫步哲人的宇宙天地，跟隨哲人的心路歷程，進而念茲在茲，從容內化，共饗取之不盡用之不竭的先驗與風範。
description.en: "Chinese" is the course where we make full use of our native languages to enjoy literary works, to enrich our cultural taste, to develop our thinking and even to elevate human cultivation.This four-credit course is set for the freshman students: with 2 credits in each of the two semesters of the school year. In the first semester, the course covers important articles in literature, in the hope for the student learners to cultivate better ability to taste literary works when they have more vivid sense on the language. With fuller knowledge on what literature is about, they are expected to try creative writings. For the second semester, the course is mainly focused on the writings on thoughts. It is our expectation that throughout the reading and analysis of various great schools of philosophy, the student learners are given the opportunity to explore the huge minds of philosophers, who will thus be imitated and followed. Through the internalization, the students might benefit themse

description.zh: 1. 工程倫理內容包含：(1) 工程倫理概述 (2) 衝突與抉擇 (3) 守則與解說 (4) 個案分析。2. 工業安全內容包括工業安全衛生組織，事故調查分析，工廠設備安全要領，工業衛生和衛生設備。
description.en: This course offers :1.Engineering Ethics (1)Description of engineering ethics (2)Conflict and selection (3)Rule and explanation (4)Case study for student studied.2.Industrial Safety:Topics covered are organization of industrial safety, analysis of Accident ,industrial health and facilities.

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1. 極限與連續，2. 導數及其應用，3. 不定積分與定積分，4. 超越函數及其反函數，5. 積分法則，6. 不定型與瑕積分，7. 定積分的應用，8. 空間幾何與向量微積分，9. 偏導數，10. 重積分。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration.

description.zh: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
description.en: The course is designed for the students with engineering background. The theme of this course is to encourage students to participate in the discovery of laws and wonder of nature, and to solidate the foundation for the particular courses of study for different departments. The contents of this course include mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, electromagnetics, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.. The lecturers will emphasize or abridge certain contents based on the individual needs of departments. For this course, there will be 3 credits for each of two semesters,  and 3 lecture hours per week.

description.zh: 課程重點：(1) 藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2) 使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3) 熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4) 透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。

description.en: The course is designed for the students with engineering background. The theme of this course is to encourage students to participate in the discovery of laws and wonder of nature, and to solidate the foundation for the particular courses of study for different departments. The contents of this course include mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, electromagnetics, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.. The lecturers will emphasize or abridge certain contents based on the individual needs of departments. For this course, there will be 3 credits for each of two semesters,  and 3 lecture hours per week.

description.zh: 瞭解組合邏輯與序向邏輯電路之分析，設計及簡化之方法，內容包含：１. 數系：數位系統所使用之各種數系及其轉換之方法２. 布氏代數：了解布氏代數的基本運算法和定律，及認識基本邏輯   及邏輯閘３. 布氏代數之簡化：介紹各種布氏代數之簡化方法４. 組合邏輯：據布氏代數及邏輯閘，計分析各種組合邏輯電路５. 可程式邏輯陣列：介紹ＰＬＡ，ＰＡＬ，ＦＰＧＡ等之設計方法６. 正反器：介紹各種正反器電路及了解其基特性７. 同步與非同步序向電路：介紹各種同步與非同步序向電路分析與   設計之方法 ８. 遞迴網路：介紹遞迴網路之設計方法９.ＶＨＤＬ：介紹如何使用ＶＨＤＬ語言設計數位電路
description.en: The course covers the analysis,design and simplification of bath combinational and sequential systems.Contents include:1.Number systems and codes2.Booolean algebra3.Simplification of Boolean algebra4.Combinational logic5.Programmable logic array6.Flip-flops7.Synchronous and asynchronous sequential circuits8.Recursive networks9.VHDL

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.  This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 課程重點：(1) 藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2) 使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3) 熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4) 透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。

description.zh: 大學入門是針對大一新生所開授之全校性課程。用以協助學生：(一) 認識高等教育的理念、目的與價值 (二) 有效學習 (三) 涵養正視困境並妥適因應能力。藉以實踐自我鍛鍊，自我掌握，自我經營並建構宏觀視界的高等教育宗旨。
description.en: "First step to achieving the goals of universities" is a campus-wide course provided for all of the first-year students at this school. The course is designed to help first-year students to achieve the following aims and objectives:(1) understanding the basic idea, goals, and fundamental value of higher education at college level;(2) learning proper study attitudes and methods effectively;(3) cultivating the required abilities and skills of responding appropriately to setbacks and difficult situations in order to acquire self-knowledge, self-control, and self-management, so that they may construct the knowledge and imagination that are needed in planning for grand visions of achieving the goals of higher education.

name.en: First step to achieving the goals of universities

description.zh: 各學院指定向度學分規定如下：機電學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。電資學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、自然與科學向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。工程學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。管理學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、自然與科學向度課程 4 學分。設計學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。
description.en: The dimension credits stipulated by each college are as follows：CMEE：4 credits for the humanities and art curriculum, 4 credits for the Social and Rules of Law curriculum, and 4 credits for the innovation and entrepreneurship curriculum.EECS：4 credits for the humanities and art curriculum, 4 credits for the nature and science curriculum, and 4 credits for the innovation and entrepreneurship curriculum.College of Engineering：4 credits for the humanities and art curriculum, 4 credits for the Social and Rules of Law curriculum, and 4 credits for the innovation and entrepreneurship curriculum.College of Management：4 credits for the humanities and art curriculum, 4 credits for the Social and Rules of Law curriculum, and 4 credits for the nature and science curriculum.College of Design： 4 credits for the humanities and art curriculum, 4 credits for the Social and Rules of Law curriculum, and 4 credits for the innovation and entrepreneurship curriculum.CHASS：4 credits for t

name.zh: 學院指定向度 - 人文與藝術
name.en: College designated dimension curriculum：Humanities and Art

description.zh: 各學院指定向度學分規定如下：機電學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。電資學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、自然與科學向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。工程學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。管理學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、自然與科學向度課程 4 學分。設計學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。人社學院：社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、自然與科學向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。修完學院指定向度課程 12 學分，剩餘 6 學分可在人文與藝術向度、社會與法治向度、自然與科學向度及創新與創業向度自由修滿，達到通識畢業 18 學分。
description.en: NA

name.zh: 學院指定向度 - 自然與科學
name.en: College designated dimension curriculum：Nature and Science

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1. 極限與連續，2. 導數及其應用，3. 不定積分與定積分，4. 超越函數及其反函數，5. 積分法則，6. 不定型與瑕積分，7. 定積分的應用，8. 空間幾何與向量微積分，9. 偏導數，10. 重積分。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration.

description.zh: 介紹經濟學基本概念及分析方法，包含供給與需求、市場均衡分析、效用與消費者選擇、生產與成本、國民所得與經濟福利、凱因斯所得理論、貨幣理論、綜合供需均衡分析、國際貿易理論。
description.en: This course introduces the basic concepts of Economics and analytical techniques.  Which includes supply and demand, marketing balance analysis, production and cost, GNP and economic welfare, international trade theories, and so on.

description.zh: 介紹會計學之基本觀念， 會計循環 - 包括分錄、過帳、試算、結算及財務報表之編製。逐一說明財務報表各個項目，最後並介紹財務報表之分析。修畢本課程之後能瞭解會計學之基本原理，會計資料處理及財務報表產生之整個過程，以及簡單之財務報表分析技術，並為未來之企業及財務相關課程打下良好基礎。
description.en: This course introduces the basic concepts of accounting.  All the necessary processes are included as well the financial report analysis.  After being taking this course, the student can understand the accounting concepts, accounting data process, generation of accounting report and techniques for analyzing the financial report.

description.zh: 主要敘述工業管理的發展、沿革及新趨勢，內容包含：工業組織、人事管理、工廠規畫、成本分析與控制、工業設備、研究發展、生產管理、物料管理、品質管理及工業安全等，期使學生對工業工程與管理整體作業有一概括性的認識。
description.en: This course will mainly introduce the past history, development and future trend of industrial engineering and management. It concludes industrial organization, personnel management, factory planning, cost analysis and control, R&D, production management, materials management, quality management and industrial safety.

name.en: Introduction to Industrial Engineering and Management

description.zh: 課程重點：(1) 藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2) 使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3) 熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4) 透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
description.en: This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through reading materials appropriate to their levels; (2) to develop reading skill by giving explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as analysis of basic writing skill; (3)to  familiarize students with useful expressions in conversation and build up their confidence in cross-cultural communication; (4)to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

description.zh: 國文，是運用本國語言文字，蘊釀於欣賞文藝作品，充實文化內涵，增進思維能力與人文素養的一門課程。本課程分為大一上學期 2 學分，大一下學期 2 學分。大一上學期的授課內容，以文學名篇為範圍；希望藉此擴建學生深入品味文學趣味的能力，鍛鍊靈活的語文敏感度，默契文學創意，甚而嘗試創作。大一下學期的授課內容，以思想名篇為範圍；希望藉此啟發學生透轍分析各家學說思想，漫步哲人的宇宙天地，跟隨哲人的心路歷程，進而念茲在茲，從容內化，共饗取之不盡用之不竭的先驗與風範。
description.en: "Chinese" is the course where we make full use of our native languages to enjoy literary works, to enrich our cultural taste, to develop our thinking and even to elevate human cultivation.This four-credit course is set for the freshman students: with 2 credits in each of the two semesters of the school year. In the first semester, the course covers important articles in literature, in the hope for the student learners to cultivate better ability to taste literary works when they have more vivid sense on the language. With fuller knowledge on what literature is about, they are expected to try creative writings. For the second semester, the course is mainly focused on the writings on thoughts. It is our expectation that throughout the reading and analysis of various great schools of philosophy, the student learners are given the opportunity to explore the huge minds of philosophers, who will thus be imitated and followed. Through the internalization, the students might benefit themse

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 讓學生瞭解木材機器加工原理及最新工業用木工機器之種類，並使學生熟悉家具製造技術，特別是製造家具需要用到的各種設備之加工能力，及其作業特性和刀具要件等方面之知識與實務。 介紹家具製造過程中所需之各種機器設備之種類及其加工性能。不論及機器本身之設計問題，而側重於機械之應用；不研究一種機器所能做出之各種巧妙的加工方法，而在討論量產作業時，如何利用最合適之機器及加工方法所應採用之標準操作方式。
description.en: Survey of furniture manufacturing technology emphasizing mass production equipment and its relationship to furniture product engineering. The course is directed toward the efficient use of equipment in the production of large lots. In addition, the course does not concern itself with ingenious ways to do a maximum variety of operations on one machine; however, it is interested in presenting the best machine and method for standard production operations.

description.zh: 包括製作模型所需用之各種機械設備操作、使用工具、紙模型、工業油土等之加工技術。
description.en: Training students to operate some basically equipment such as bench work, sheet metal, machining, and welding machines safely and correctly, giving them the primary skills in model making.

description.zh: 本課程講授家具工程製圖技術及相關知識，著重在家具工程製圖與一般工程製圖的主要差別，其能讓學生將所設計的家具產品以圖面表達其細部結構與工程要件。
description.en: English Description	This is the lecture of furniture engineering drawing technique and related knowledge, It emphases on the main difference between furniture engineering drawing and normal engineering drawing. The aim is for students to present the detailed construction and main parts of their furniture design product by drawing.

description.zh: 探討木材之物理及機械性質對於家具構造與製造品質之影響，並讓學生瞭解材料之組織構造以熟識家具用材之鑑定。終其目標在使學生認識材料進而善用材料。 介紹以木質材料為主之家具材料。內容含蓋木材之外觀特徵，組織構造，材料鑑識及其物理與機械性質對於家具構造和製造品質其間之關係等。
description.en: The macrostructure and microstructure of wood. Identification and uses of common Softwoods and Hardwoods. Physical and mechanical properties in relation to wood processing. Properties of other wood based materials such as particleboard, fiberboard, plywood, laminated wood related to their use in furniture manufacture also included.

description.zh: 介紹人體之形態特徵、心理期望、動作行為等人因知識，研究人因資訊應用於工業設計實務上之設計方法或準則以獲得具安全、效率與舒適之產品或環境設計。
description.en: Basic Knowledge for Ergonomic

notes: 設計 205，上限 30 人，限工設系學生選修

description.zh: 教導學生認識色彩之成因及視覺現象、色彩系統之認識及色彩心理之種種現象。
description.en: Basic understanding about color. Including light, visual perception, color names, color order systems.

description.zh: 讓學生習得 3D 材質編修電腦軟體之技能，俾能將工業設計產品進行材質模擬與色彩計劃。
description.en: The study of materials edit computer software which could apply materials simulation and color plan on industrial design products.

description.zh: 本課程提供學生與家具實務界交流的平台，邀請家具相關領域的專家進行專題演講，並提供相互研討交流的機會，藉此使同學瞭解家具產業界現況及未來學習的發展方向。
description.en: This course provides students a platform for interacting with current furniture industry, through giving speeches from furniture relative field of industry experts. And provide opportunities for mutual discussions and exchanges. Thereby enabling students to understand the development of the furniture industry's current status and future direction of learning.

name.en: Practice Forum of Furniture  and Design (I)

notes: 設計 B01，配合 USR 課程

description.zh: 課程講授家具結構之專業知識與應用技術，理論與實務並重。內容包括開發流程、產品工程、基本力學、木材特性、複合板特性、木材接合、機械扣件、框類家具結構特性、板類家具結構特性、層板家具結構特性等。
description.en: This course is introducing the knowledge and technique of furniture construction, both theory and practicing. The contents include R&D procedure, product engineering, basic mechanics, characteristics of wood, characteristics of composite board,, wood joints, mechanical fasteners, characteristics of frame type furniture, characteristics of panel type furniture, characteristics of shell type furniture etc.’

description.zh: 課程重點：(1) 藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2) 使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3) 熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4) 透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。

With fuller knowledge on what literature is about, they are expected to try creative writings. For the second semester, the course is mainly focused on the writings on thoughts. It is our expectation that throughout the reading and analysis of various great schools of philosophy, the student learners are given the opportunity to explore the huge minds of philosophers, who will thus be imitated and followed. Through the internalization, the students might benefit themse

description.zh: 依據提供服務準則，工程師們須以誠實公平公正正當和奉獻保護公共健康，安全及幸福。工程師們必須以專業標準的行為履行最高的倫理準則。本課程以（1）工程倫理概述（2）衝突與抉擇（3）守則與解說（4）個案分析，提供學生瞭解及研析。
description.en: Accordingly, the services provided by engineers require honesty, impartiality, fairness, and equity and must be dedicated to protection of the public health, safety and welfare. Engineers must perform under a standard of professional behavior that require adherence to the highest principles of ethical conduct. This course offers (1).Description of engineering ethics (2).Conflict and selection (3).Rule and explanation (4).Case study for student studied.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。

With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
description.en: The course is designed for the students with engineering background. The theme of this course is to encourage students to participate in the discovery of laws and wonder of nature, and to solidate the foundation for the particular courses of study for different departments. The contents of this course include mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, electromagnetics, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.. The lecturers will emphasize or abridge certain contents based on the individual needs of departments. For this course, there will be 3 credits for each of two semesters,  and 3 lecture hours per week.

description.zh: 計算機系統之基礎觀念介紹及應用。主要內容包括：1. 計算機系統簡介 2 . 資料的表示法、數字系統、邏輯 3. 周邊裝置及儲存體 4. 程式語言與程式設計 5. 作業系統 6. 檔案與資料庫
description.en: This introductory course covers the fundamentals and applications of computers,including, 1.introduction to computer systems, 2.data representation, number systems,and logic 3.peripherals and storage, 4.programming languages and programming 5.operating systems 6..Files and database system

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意材料一般性質之介紹，化學對材料性質的影響，原子在晶體內的堆積方式及 X 光繞射，固體內原子排列的不規則性和原子擴散，固體傳導電子的特性，凝固的各種物理性質，相金屬和有關的各種機械性質，鋼鐵材料及其應用。
description.en: General Properties of Materials, Chemical Effects to Material Properties, Atomic Packing Types in Crystals and X-ray Diffraction, Imperfections of Atomic Arrangement in Solids and Atomic Diffusion, Conduction of Electrons in Solids, Solidification, Physical Properties, Metals and their echanical Properties, Ferrous Materials and their Applications.

description.zh: 課程重點：(1) 藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2) 使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3) 熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4) 透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。

In the first semester, the course covers important articles in literature, in the hope for the student learners to cultivate better ability to taste literary works when they have more vivid sense on the language. With fuller knowledge on what literature is about, they are expected to try creative writings. For the second semester, the course is mainly focused on the writings on thoughts. It is our expectation that throughout the reading and analysis of various great schools of philosophy, the student learners are given the opportunity to explore the huge minds of philosophers, who will thus be imitated and followed. Through the internalization, the students might benefit themse

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1. 極限與連續，2. 導數及其應用，3. 不定積分與定積分，4. 超越函數及其反函數，5. 積分法則，6. 不定型與瑕積分，7. 定積分的應用，8. 空間幾何與向量微積分，9. 偏導數，10. 重積分。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration.

description.zh: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
description.en: The course is designed for the students with engineering background. The theme of this course is to encourage students to participate in the discovery of laws and wonder of nature, and to solidate the foundation for the particular courses of study for different departments. The contents of this course include mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, electromagnetics, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.. The lecturers will emphasize or abridge certain contents based on the individual needs of departments. For this course, there will be 3 credits for each of two semesters,  and 3 lecture hours per week.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.  This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 課程重點：(1) 藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2) 使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3) 熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4) 透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
description.en: This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through reading materials appropriate to their levels; (2) to develop reading skill by giving explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as analysis of basic writing skill; (3)to  familiarize students with useful expressions in conversation and build up their confidence in cross-cultural communication; (4)to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

description.zh: 大學入門是針對大一新生所開授之全校性課程。用以協助學生：(一) 認識高等教育的理念、目的與價值 (二) 有效學習 (三) 涵養正視困境並妥適因應能力。藉以實踐自我鍛鍊，自我掌握，自我經營並建構宏觀視界的高等教育宗旨。
description.en: "First step to achieving the goals of universities" is a campus-wide course provided for all of the first-year students at this school. The course is designed to help first-year students to achieve the following aims and objectives:(1) understanding the basic idea, goals, and fundamental value of higher education at college level;(2) learning proper study attitudes and methods effectively;(3) cultivating the required abilities and skills of responding appropriately to setbacks and difficult situations in order to acquire self-knowledge, self-control, and self-management, so that they may construct the knowledge and imagination that are needed in planning for grand visions of achieving the goals of higher education.

name.en: First step to achieving the goals of universities

description.zh: 國文，是運用本國語言文字，蘊釀於欣賞文藝作品，充實文化內涵，增進思維能力與人文素養的一門課程。本課程分為大一上學期 2 學分，大一下學期 2 學分。大一上學期的授課內容，以文學名篇為範圍；希望藉此擴建學生深入品味文學趣味的能力，鍛鍊靈活的語文敏感度，默契文學創意，甚而嘗試創作。大一下學期的授課內容，以思想名篇為範圍；希望藉此啟發學生透轍分析各家學說思想，漫步哲人的宇宙天地，跟隨哲人的心路歷程，進而念茲在茲，從容內化，共饗取之不盡用之不竭的先驗與風範。
description.en: "Chinese" is the course where we make full use of our native languages to enjoy literary works, to enrich our cultural taste, to develop our thinking and even to elevate human cultivation.This four-credit course is set for the freshman students: with 2 credits in each of the two semesters of the school year. In the first semester, the course covers important articles in literature, in the hope for the student learners to cultivate better ability to taste literary works when they have more vivid sense on the language. With fuller knowledge on what literature is about, they are expected to try creative writings. For the second semester, the course is mainly focused on the writings on thoughts. It is our expectation that throughout the reading and analysis of various great schools of philosophy, the student learners are given the opportunity to explore the huge minds of philosophers, who will thus be imitated and followed. Through the internalization, the students might benefit themse

description.zh: 各學院指定向度學分規定如下：機電學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。電資學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、自然與科學向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。工程學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。管理學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、自然與科學向度課程 4 學分。設計學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。
description.en: The dimension credits stipulated by each college are as follows：CMEE：4 credits for the humanities and art curriculum, 4 credits for the Social and Rules of Law curriculum, and 4 credits for the innovation and entrepreneurship curriculum.EECS：4 credits for the humanities and art curriculum, 4 credits for the nature and science curriculum, and 4 credits for the innovation and entrepreneurship curriculum.College of Engineering：4 credits for the humanities and art curriculum, 4 credits for the Social and Rules of Law curriculum, and 4 credits for the innovation and entrepreneurship curriculum.College of Management：4 credits for the humanities and art curriculum, 4 credits for the Social and Rules of Law curriculum, and 4 credits for the nature and science curriculum.College of Design： 4 credits for the humanities and art curriculum, 4 credits for the Social and Rules of Law curriculum, and 4 credits for the innovation and entrepreneurship curriculum.CHASS：4 credits for t

name.zh: 學院指定向度 - 人文與藝術
name.en: College designated dimension curriculum：Humanities and Art

description.zh: 各學院指定向度學分規定如下：機電學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。工程學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。管理學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、自然與科學向度課程 4 學分。設計學院：人文與藝術向度課程 4 學分、社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。人社學院：社會與法治向度課程 4 學分、自然與科學向度課程 4 學分、創新與創業向度課程 4 學分。修完學院指定向度課程 12 學分，剩餘 6 學分可在人文與藝術向度、社會與法治向度、自然與科學向度及創新與創業向度自由修滿，達到通識畢業 18 學分。
description.en: The dimension credits stipulated by each college are as follows：College of Mechanical and Electrical Engineering：4 credits for the humanities and art curriculum, 4 credits for the Social and Rules of Law curriculum, and 4 credits for the innovation and entrepreneurship curriculum.College of Engineering： 4 credits for the humanities and art curriculum, 4 credits for the Social and Rules of Law curriculum, and 4 credits for the innovation and entrepreneurship curriculum.College of Management： 4 credits for the humanities and art curriculum, 4 credits for the Social and Rules of Law curriculum, and 4 credits for the nature and science curriculum.College of Design： 4 credits for the humanities and art curriculum, 4 credits for the Social and Rules of Law curriculum, and 4 credits for the innovation and entrepreneurship curriculum.

name.zh: 學院指定向度 - 社會與法治
name.en: College designated dimension curriculum：Social and Rules of Law

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1. 極限與連續，2. 導數及其應用，3. 不定積分與定積分，4. 超越函數及其反函數，5. 積分法則，6. 不定型與瑕積分，7. 定積分的應用，8. 空間幾何與向量微積分，9. 偏導數，10. 重積分。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹計算機系統之基礎觀念以及應用。主要內容包括：1. 計算機系統簡介 2 . 資料的表示法、數字系統、邏輯 3. 周邊裝置及儲存體 4. 程式語言與程式設計 5. 軟體工程與系統開發工具 6. 資料結構與演算法 7. 作業系統 8. 檔案與資料庫 9. 資料通訊與計算機網路 10. 人工智慧 11. 新興技術介紹
description.en: This introductory course covers the fundamentals and applications of computers. The major topics covered in this course are: 1.Introduction to computer systems 2.Data representation, number systems, and logic 3.Peripherals and storage 4. Programming languages and programming 5. Data structures and algorithms 6. Software engineering and system development tools 7. Operating systems 8.File and database systems 9. Data communication and computer networks 10. Artificial intelligence 11. Emerging techniques

notes: ◎資財一甲、一乙合開 / 科研 243 教室

description.zh: 介紹程式語言基本資料處理的概念， 包含基本輸入與輸出、程式的流程控制、函數的應用等指令之撰寫、程式之編輯、編譯、聯絡與程式之執行，並發展一套應用程式。
description.en: This course introduces the basic data processes of C++ language. They include input/output, program process control, application of functions, program editing and execution, and so on.

description.zh: 本課程主要使學生能強化會計學的基本觀念，並以國際會計原則 (IFRS) 為架構，熟悉會計流程與財務報表之編製。課程內容包含會計恆等式與財務報表的介紹、借貸法則、會計處理程序 (分錄、過帳、試算) 與調整、結帳與會計循環的完成、買賣業會計、存貨的會計處理、現金、應收帳款、不動產、廠房與設備、無形資產、負債、股東權益、以及投資活動的會計處理，最後則是現金流量表的編制，與財務報表的運用與分析。
description.en: This course is an introduction to the basic concepts and standards underlying financial accounting systems. Several important concepts will be studied in detail, including: cash, accounts and notes receivable, inventory, marketable securities, equity investments, PPE, intangibles, debt, equity issuance, and dividends. The course emphasizes the construction of the basic financial accounting statements - the income statement, retained earnings statement, statement of financial position, and statement of cash flows - as well as their interpretation. Financial accounting focuses on providing information that is relevant and useful for external users. This course expands your knowledge of understanding of the basic language and conceptions of accounting. The basic accounting concepts that will help you solve problems and exercises designed to transaction recording and financial statement preparation.

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study.Seminar.Group meeting.

description.zh: 可穿戴式應用已成了全球科技產業的新寵兒之一。因此，漸漸地，穿戴式裝置已成為人們生活用品的一部分。本課程討論可穿戴式系統導論、無線感測網路導論、生醫資訊模組設計、可穿戴式教學平台之設計、情境感知遠距監控與定位救援手仗之設計、非視覺型之不穩步態偵測分析設計、自行車玩家生醫資訊守護神設計、遠距醫療照護系統設計、與客製化谷歌智慧型眼鏡設計。本課程主要達成跨領域的高度整合應用訓練課程。
description.en: Wearable applications have been become one new darling of the global technology industries. Hence, gradually, the wearable devices have become part of people's daily necessities. This course will discuss the topics of “Introduction of wearable system, Introduction of wireless sensor network, Design of Bio-information module, Design of wearable teaching platform, Design of Context-Aware Tele-monitor and Position-rescue Staff, Detection Analysis and Design for Unstable Gait with Non-vision Base, Bicycler-Player Bio-information Guardian, Design of Tele-Medicine care system, and Design of customized Google Smart-glass”. This course is highly integrated applications to achieve interdisciplinary training.

description.zh: 1. 傳輸線 2. 散射參數 3. 微波主動元件 4. 寬頻放大電路 5. 低雜訊放大電路 6. 功率放大器 7. 高穩定振盪器 8. 壓控振盪器 9. 鎖相迴路 10. 混波器
description.en: 1.Transmission line2.Scattering parameters3.Microwave active components4.Wideband amplifier5. Low noise Amplifier 6.Power amplifier 7.Highly-stable oscillator8.Voltage-controlled oscillators9. Phase-locked loop10. Mixers

description.zh: 1. 電力電子元件的規格 2. 電力電子元件特性 3. 元件與電路佈局 4. 元件特性與雜訊 5. 元件特性與損失 6. 元件的選用與電路系統
description.en: 1. Device Specification 2.Device Characteristics 3. Component And Layout 4. Circuit Noise 5. Device Loss 6. Device Selection and Circuit Implementation.

description.zh: 1. 變頻器 2. 電力轉換器 3. 直流截波器 4. 電源供應器
description.en: 1. INVERTER 2. CONVERTER 3. DC CHOPPER 4. POWER SUPPLY

description.zh: 1 設計的基本概念 2 架構、資料型別與運算子 3 組合與循序邏輯 4 函式 / 程序與屬性 / 組態 5 階層式設計 6 功能與時序模擬 7 設計合成 8 狀態機設計 9 管線式處理 10. 記憶體設計 11. 特殊應用積體電路設計與實作
description.en: This course both provides the digital logical concepts and trains the student how to use the computer-aided design tools to simulate and to implement the advanced FPGA system. The contents of this course are listed as following: 1.Design concepts to logic circuits 2.Structure, data type and operator 3.Combinationa-circuit and Sequential-circuit 4.Function/process and task/attribute 5.Architectural design 6.Functional and timing simulation 7.Synthesizer 8.State machine design 9.Pipelined process 10.RAM and ROM 11.ASIC design and implementation.

name.zh: 高等 FPGA 系統設計

description.zh: 研究生須要具有整合、分析資料與創新思維、寫作能力以完成碩博士論文。本課程主要包括：一、 良好研究特質，二、 研究規劃， 三、學習方法， 四、 創新思維方法 五、 寫作方法， 六、 簡報方法， 七、 研究實務練習
description.en: Graduate students need to integrate information and innovative insights to successfully achieve a master or Ph.D degree. The course includes:1. Characteristics of good researchers. 2. Research planning. 3. Learning method. 4. Innovative thinking.5. Writing method. 6. Present method.7. Research design practice

description.zh: 1. 需求面管理與節約能源 2. 負載管理策略與成效評估 3. 負載監控與需量控制管理 4. 汽電共生及其他能源應用 5. 配電自動化與配電管理實務
description.en: 1.Demand-side Management and Energy Conservation2.Load Management Strategy and Impact Evaluation3.Load Control Technology and Demand Control Management4.Cogeneration and Other Energy Applications5.Distribution Automation and Distribution Management Technologies

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
