description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: (1) 向量分析 (2) 靜電場理論：庫倫，高斯定律，電位能，電場能量與功，介電質電場現象，電容 (3) 拉普拉斯方程式，電像法、邊界值問題 (4) 靜磁場理論：畢沙瓦特，安培定律，磁位能，磁場能量與功，強磁性材料特性電感 (5) 電磁感應與馬克斯威爾方程式。
description.en: Course Title:ElectromagnetismDescription:This is an introductory course of electromagnetic bias onits Engineering applications. The course is divided into five parts(1) the static electric field, (2) the steady electric current, (3)the static magnetic field, (4) the quari-stationary electromagneticfield and, (5) Maxwell equations and their applications.Besides, the course also introduces some of the optical technology.

description.zh: 1. 合金製程簡介 2. 成份改變製程　a. 合金熔煉 - 感應電爐、真空感應電爐  b. 合金精煉 - 電弧爐、  c. 電渣重熔精煉、真空電弧精煉、電子束精煉、電漿精煉 3. 合金結構改變製程　a. 凝固控製與快速凝固　　b. 方向性凝固　　　　　c. 熱處理控制 - 均質化、強化處理　　d. 鍛造、晶粒控制　　　　　　　4. 合金形狀改重製程鍛造、軋壓、擠形、粉末冶金 5. 未來合金製程之發展及電腦之應用
description.en: This course is a special topics of  Processes of Structural Alloys.

description.zh: 本課程介紹有限元素分析法基本原理及其在各種工程問題上之應用。包含有限元素分析法之基本觀念，利用變分原理建立有限元素模式，形狀函數及等參數元素，一維問題：桿、桁架、樑及骨架等，二維問題：平面應力應變及板殼問題。三維問題：一般實體，有限元素分析之計算機程式處理，有限元素分析於動態問題之應用，相關有限元素分析套裝軟體簡介
description.en: Introduction to the finite element method and its application to engineering problems.  Topics include Variational Formulation and Finite Element Formulations, 1-D, 2-D and 3-D Element Shapes, Numerical Integration, Applications to dynamic problem and Introduction to Commercial Finite Element Programs.

notes: ◎日職車輛所、能源所、機電博和能源車輛外生班合開

description.zh: 21 世紀的工業設計師已不能再靜待市場研究及產品企劃人員提供產品設計規範，而應以使用者代言人、及企業產品開發整合者身分，主動參與產品策略與企劃，並以視覺化技術協助相關人員作橫向溝通。因此，「產品創新設計策略與企劃」課程主要目標在教導學生以「前瞻性的視野」，透過創新設計的步驟與方法，策劃出符合企業技術及經營體質，並且能滿足市場及使用者使用情況需求的產品。本課程將以理論、方法、案例研討及個案研究方式進行。
description.en: The function of industrial design in the 21st  century, will no longer waiting for the product definition from the marketing and product planning, It will become a integrator and visualizer during the product innovation strategic phase, and concerning to the user's needs.          	Product Innovation Strategy will guide the enterprise looking beyond their current operation to match their technologies and the distinct competencies with emerging the user and the market needs.The contents of this topic will include theory, methodology, and practical case study.

notes: 工設三四與日職碩合開；一教 1F

description.zh: 藉由國內外設計競賽主題與產學合作設計案進行實際演練，著重於資料蒐集、商品分析、創新構想與成果表達之進階能力養成，期讓學生在國內外設計競賽舞台上展現光芒，在產學合作中習得實務經驗並獲致產業界肯定。因此本課程旨在以實際演練達成兼具創新性與商品化專業設計能力養成。
description.en: Advanced Integrated Design educates students to identify and resolve design problems - innovatively and with sensitivity to the social, physical and ecological environment. Students learn to analyze and solve diverse design problems from technical, aesthetic, social and ecological viewpoints. Students are given the resources to identify, expand and test personal and professional development through an intensive exploration of design ideas. Innovation is stressed, along with the ability to refine formal design issues. There are numerous opportunities for students to work with industry through corporate-sponsored studio projects and design competitions.

name.zh: 進階整合設計研究與實務專題 (四)
name.en: Advanced integrated design research and practice project(IV)

description.zh: 1. 體認永續在設計之重要性 2. 熟悉永續之理論、知識、方法與應用 3. 解析綠色設計、生態環保、節能減碳 4. 綜合永續設計與工業設計實務
description.en: This course will assist in laying a basic foundation of knowledge for using 'sustainable design' assessment tools and rating schemes to inform the design process. The course will also enable students to engage in self-directed studies such as research and continuing development of professional careers.

description.zh: 本課程之目的係透過對文化之研究與解析，作為產品設計發展之元素，藉由設計專題之應用，開發出具文化意涵之商品，以培養學生對各種文化之解析能力，與設計之創新技能。
description.en: The aim of this course is via the research and analyze the culture, which to be the element of the development of product design. Through the application of design project to develop the cultural product. It could train the students the ability of analyzing the every cultures and the innovation skill of design.

notes: 日職合開；於 11/3 起改為設計 B01

description.zh: 本課程探討以人為本的設計思考與以系統化為基礎的計算思維，如何用以問題解決、系統設計與人類行為理解，包括同理心觀察的人類學方法、創意發展的比喻與類比思考方法、邏輯思維方法、巨大複雜系統設計與評估的工程思維方法，以及複雜性、智能、心理、人類行為的理解的科學思維方法。
description.en: This course is to explore some special topics about the approaches of human-centered design thinking and system-based computational thinking to problem solving, systematic design, and understanding human behavior, including the methods of empathy observation, metaphor and analogy, logic, complex systems, artificial intelligence, and psychology.

name.zh: 設計思考與計算思維專題
name.en: Special topics in design thinking and computational thinking

notes: 日職合開；設計 603；職碩上限 15 人；MOST

description.zh: 本課程著重於環境污染物之微量監測與分析內容，此包括有機有毒物、重金屬之儀器分析原理、化學理論及分析方法。修習本課程宜有化學基礎。
description.en: The course introduces monitoring and analysis for environment pollutants. It focuses the micro quantity analysis based on chemical theory. Modern instruments with high sensitivity will be also discussed.

name.en: Monitoring and Analysis for Environmental Pollutants

description.zh: 能源在日常生活中以很多型態呈現，大量的能源使用於汽車動力、食物與用水加熱、產品製造、發電及其他不同事務。使用傳統能源會排放空氣污染物，因而引起鄰近地區、區域、跨國境空氣污染問題，甚至是全球的環境衝擊效應。本課程將檢視能源使用現況及其衍生的環境議題，並且探討能源使用之趨勢。傳統能源 (如煤、石油、天然氣、核能等)、及再生能源 (如太陽能、水力、風能、地熱能等) 及能源效率等內容，都將於課程中介紹
description.en: Energy enters our everyday lives in many ways. Prodigious amounts of energy are used to power automobiles, heat food and water, manufacture products, generate electricity, and perform various other tasks. The use of traditional energy will emit air pollutants that may result in regional air pollution problem as well as global effects. In this course we will look at the current energy situation, its environmental implications, and try to determine the patterns of energy use. We will look at energy use as coal, petroleum, natural gas, nuclear energy, and renewable energy, such as solar energy, hydroelectric

description.zh: 以都會區空氣品質為範圍，配合污染源類別﹙粒狀物，SOx， NOx， VOC， THC 及 O3﹚，本課程從逸散性、固定污染性、移動污染性等不同方向，以講述空品之規劃與管理等問題。此包括 PSI 指標與空品特性分析，及減目標與管制策略之研訂等。
description.en: The course gives a brief introduction to planning and management for air quality. The main contents are focused on fugitive pollution, stationary, and movable sources. Index of pollution standard will be also discussed in the course.

name.en: Planning and Management for Air Quality

description.zh: 1. 可程式控制器 (PLC) 概論 2. PLC 指令說明與應用 3. PLC I/O 介面 4. A/D、D/A 介面 5. PLC 與電腦連線 6. 分散式控制系統 7. 中小型 PLC 網路系統 8. PLC 選用 9. PLC 網路監控系統 10. PLC 應用實習 5~7 個
description.en: 1. Introduction to PLC (Programmable Logic Controller)2. PLC Instructions and Applications3. PLC I/O Interfaces4. A/D and D/A Interfaces5. PLC and PC Communications6. Distributed Control System7. PLC Network8. PLC Selection9. Monitor Control System10. Laboratory work: 5~7 experiments

notes: * 限未修過可程式控制器應用與實習同學修課，綜科 322

description.zh: 本課程探討的主題是以設計管理的角度，探討如何經營設計品牌與應用網路媒體以協助產品的廣告與行銷目的，進而增加曝光與產品銷售的機會。課程內容包含：電子商務的定義與架構、產品品牌定義與設計、產品照片攝影、產品影片拍攝、頻道經營與直播、線上募資活動等。課程中除了理論與技術教學，也會輔以案例研討方式，加強學生理解，以達到最佳的學習效果。
description.en: In this course, we discussed how to manage design brands and online media application to assist product advertising and marketing purposes from the perspective of design management, thereby increasing the product exposure and sales opportunities. The course content includes definition and structure of e-commerce, product brand definition and design, product photo photography, product video creation, channel management and live broadcast, online fundraising activities, etc. In addition to theoretical and technical teaching, the course will also be supplemented by case studies to strengthen students' understanding and achieve the best learning effect.

description.zh: 照明設計基本原理之介紹，以期學生能獲得照明設計之正確觀點與知識，內容含燈具與光源之關係、光的材料特性與色彩、測光法與光源資料之解釋，以及照明對人生生理與心理上的影響。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to introduce the softwares and hardwares of lighting. (including lightion equipements. lighting design, transmission system, and distribution system) and how to maintain these equipments.

description.zh: 本課程藉由實地場域踏場及在地對話，導入設計思考與實踐能量，學習如何協助地方擴展並升級形象。課程中可藉由形象設計等手法了解如何提升城市文化的在地體驗，深化地方共同體的歸屬感。修課學生可實際體驗形象塑造之程序及手法，包含參與線上線下設計工作坊、試打樣與製作之程序，可串接未來展示與社造等設計研究相關活動。
description.en: This course introduces design thinking and practical energy through field visits and in-situ dialogues and learns how to help expand and upgrade the image of a place. In this course, I will teach image design and other design methods to understand how to enhance urban culture's in-place experience and deepen the local community's sense of belonging. Students can experience image-building procedures and techniques, including participating in online and offline design workshops, trial proofing and production procedures, and connecting with future exhibition and social design research-related activities.

notes: 日職合開；職碩上限 7 人；USR；設計 207

description.zh: 本課程在使學生認識嵌入式系統，瞭解其系統架構，並學習嵌入式系統之硬體與軟體之設計技術。內容包含：(1) 嵌入式系統介紹 (2) 嵌入式系統應用 (3) 嵌入式系統硬體 (4) 嵌入式系統軟體架構 (5) 中斷處理 (6) 記憶體管理 (7) 週邊應用 (8) 即時作業系統。
description.en: This course let students to understand the embedded system and learn the skill to design the hardware and software of embedded system.  The contents of this course are: (1)Embedded System Introduction, (2)Embedded System Application, (3)Embedded System Hardware, (4)Embedded System Software Architectures, (5)Interrupts, (6)Memory (7) Peripherals, (8)Real-Time Operating System.

name.zh: 嵌入式系統設計與應用

description.zh: 本課程以論文研討方式學習 "機器學習" 理論之基本概念與應用及各種演算法。課程內容包含概念式學習、決策樹、圖型理論、神經網路、貝氏網路、案例式學習及支持向量機等方法。經由這門課，學生能對現代機器學習技術及其應用有基本的了解。
description.en: This is a graduate seminar-based course that provides an overview of many algorithms in machine learning and its applications. In this course, we will take an interdisciplinary look at current research topics in machine learning covering Concept Learning, Decision Tree, Graphical Model, Neural Network, Bayesian Network, Instance-based Learning, and Support Vector Machine. Through the course, students can have the basic ideas and intuition behind modern machine learning methods.

description.zh: 本課主旨在培養學生職場英語文溝通能力，如提案、企劃案提寫、時事討論、公司產品行銷、書信寫作，希冀能夠藉由本課程之修習，加強學生進入職場前的競爭力。
description.en: This course is designed to provide students with a firm foundation in business communication skills. Students will learn how to present a proposal, start a discussion, and promote company products in English. It is hoped that by the end of this course, students are equipped with sufficient knowledge of general and business English.

notes: 本課程為未通過英文畢業門檻之課程。

description.zh: 本課程教授商品化實務概念並由學生實際操作，如何以一貫作業完成市場銷售商品。由消費者洞察開始，教導學生如何從消費者行為找到需求，進而思考產品設計動機。設計過程中涵蓋專利，製造與營運思維，最後以實際商品設計呈現。
description.en: The purpose of this course is study the concept of commercialization and how to sale the products to marketing through the consistent process.It’ll ask student to find the consumer's requirements from observation, then think and confirm the design purpose. The design process will include patent, manufacture, operating thinking, and commodity design.

notes: 工設四與日職碩合開；合開總上限 15 人；USR；設計 603

description.zh: 1. 微波傳輸線 2. 微波元件 3. 微波材料 4. 微波量測 5. 微波傳輸轉換 6. 微波耦合 7. 微波濾波器 8. 微波天線
description.en: 1.Microware Transmission Lines2.Microware Elements3.Microware Matericals4.Microware Measurements5.Microware Transitions6.Microware Couplers7.Microware Filters8.Microware Antennas

description.zh: 1. 無線通訊系統簡介 2. 蜂巢式行動通訊系統概念介紹 3. 無線電通訊的傳播原理 4. 行動通訊之調變技術 5. 行動通訊之多工技術 6. 天線﹑多元性與系統分析 7. 行動通訊之數位與語音編碼 8. 無線網路系統 9. 行動通訊之現有規格與未來發展
description.en: 1.Introduction to wireless communication systems2.An Overview of cellular systems3.Mobile Radis Propagation(path loss,multipath     fasing,propagation models)4.Modulation techniques for mobile communications5.Multiple access techniques for mobile communications6.Antenna,dirersity and link analysis7.Channel coding and speech coding8.Wireless networking9.Wireless systems standards and further developments

description.zh: 本課程主要係介紹資料壓縮的原理以及當前幾項重要的壓縮標準。本課程內容將涵蓋以下主題 01. 霍夫曼編碼 02. 算數編碼 03. 純量量化與向量量化 04. 線性預測與預測編碼法（DPCM，ADPCM，JPEG-LS）05. 轉換編碼（KLT，DFT，DCT，DST 以及 Walsh-Hadamard 轉換）06. 分頻編碼法（G.722 Speech coding，MPEG audio coding）07. 小波編碼法（SPIHT，JPEG2000）08. 字典模式編碼法 09. 跑長編碼法 10. 主題探討
description.en: This course is mainly focused on the principles of data compression techniques as well as the state-of-the-art compression standards. The course content includes01. Huffman codes02. Arithmetic codes03. Scalar quantization and Vector quantization04. Linear prediction and Predictive coding（DPCM，ADPCM，JPEG-LS）05. Transform coding（KLT, DFT, DCT, DST, and WHT）06. Subband coding（G.722 Speech coding，MPEG audio coding）07. Wavelet-Based Compression（SPIHT, JPEG2000）08. Dictionary techniques09. Runlength coding10. Selected topics

description.zh: (1) 資料庫系統簡介，(2) 關聯式與實體關係資料模型，(3) 資料表正規化，(4) 結構化查詢語言，(5) 交易管理與並時控制 (6) 分散式資料庫管理系統 (7) 物件導向式資料庫 (8) 電子商務中之資料庫 (9) 資料庫管理 (10) 網路式資料庫專題－規劃與實作。
description.en: (1)Introduction to database systems,(2)Relational and E-R database models,(3)Normalization of database tables,(4)SQL (Structure Query Language),(5)Transaction management and concurrence control,(6)Distributed database management systems,(7)Object oriented databases,(8)Databases in electronic commerce,(9)Database Administration,(10)Web-based database project-design and implementation.

description.zh: 中文概述：本課程主要目標在介紹射頻積體電路設計之基本原理，使學生具有射頻積體電路設計之能力。其課程內容包含如下：1、被動 IC 元件的特性               10、低雜訊放大器之設計 2、MOS 元件介紹                   11、混波器 3、被動 RLC 網路                   12、射頻功率放大器  4、分散式系統                    13、回授系統       5、史密斯圖形及 S 參數             14、鎖相迴路      6、頻寬評估技術                  15、振盪器與合成器   7、射頻放大器之設計              16、結構 8、電壓參考及偏壓                  9、雜訊分析
description.en: This course is introduced the principle of Radio Frequency IC Design such that the students have the ability of Radio Frequency IC design. The contents of this course are1、CHARACTERISITICS OF PASSIVE IC COMPONENTS2、A REVIEW OF MOS DEVICE PHYSICS3、PASSIVE RLC NETWORKS4、DISTRIBUTED SYSTEMS5、THE SMITH CHART AND S-PARAMETERS6、BANDWIDTH ESTIMATION TECHNIQUES7、HIGH-FREQUENCY AMPLIFIER DESIG8、VOLTAGE REFERENCES AND BIASING9、NOISE ANALYSIS10、LNA DESIGN11、MIXERS12、RF POWER AMPLIFIERS13、FEEDBACK SYSTEMS14、PHASE-LOCKED LOOPS15、OSCILLATORS AND SYNTHESIZERS16、ARCHITECTURES

description.zh: (A) 部分：1. 基本 CMOS 邏輯閘設計，2.CMOS 基本邏輯閘時序模擬，3.CMOS 基本邏輯閘佈局，4. 數位電路功能分析與模擬，5. 階層式的電路組成，6. 中小型電路設計，7.VHDL 系統，(B) 部分：1. 認識 Cadence 系統， 2. 圖形編輯設備的操作練習，3. 零件庫介紹，4. 設計電路之輸入編輯，5. 電路模擬實習，6. 數位電路的晶片設計，7. 晶片製造專題。
description.en: (A)1.Basic CMOS logic design2.CMOS logic gate simulation 3.CMOS logic gate placement4.Analysis and simulation of digital circuit 5.Hierachy circuit6.VHDL system(B)1.Introduction to c cadence system2.Graphic editor practice3.module4.Input editor 5.Circuit simulation practice6.Special projects

notes: * 日職合開；總人數上限 50 人；綜科 502

description.zh: 1. P-N 接面 2. P-N 接面二極體 3. 接面場效電晶體 4. 金屬 - 半導體場效電晶體 5. 金屬氧化物半導體場效電晶體 6. 雙載子接面電晶體
description.en: 1. P-N Junctions2. P-N Junctions Diode3. Junction Field-Effect Transistor4. Metal-Semiconductor FET5. Metal-Oxide-Semiconductor FET (MOSFET)6. Bipolar Transistor

description.zh: 1. 簡介，2. 數位影像處理的基礎，3. 影像的轉換，4. 影像的增強， 5. 影像的復原，6. 影像的壓縮，7. 影像分割，8. 影像的表達及描述，9. 自動車導航，及醫學影像的處理和應用，10. 論文討論。
description.en: 1.Introduction 2.Principles of digital image processing3.Image transformation 4.Image enhancement5.Image reconstruction6.Image compreession 7.Image partition 8.Image description9.Applications 10.Papers study

description.zh: 1. 電腦網路概述 2. 階層結構 3. 路由與交換 4. 流量與擁塞控制 5. 媒體存取控制 6. 區域網路協定與標準７．網路互連８．效能評估
description.en: 1.Introduction to Computer Network2.Layered Structure3.Routing and Switching 4.Flow and Congestion Control5.Medium Access Control 6.Local Area Network Protocols and Standards7.Network Interconnection8.Performance Analysis

description.zh: 線性代數為工程類學科之基礎數學之一，著重於訓練學生矩陣運算及基本數學証明。課程大綱如下：1. 解聯立方程式 2. 矩陣運算 3. 行列式 4. 向量空間 5. 線性轉換 6. 特徵值及特徵向量 7. 選擇性題材，視時間充許教授下列之一：矩陣數值方法，Jordan form , 或線性規劃
description.en: As a basic mathematics in engineering,the course Linear Algebraemphasizes on the subjest of matrix computation(theory) and thetechnique of mathematical proving.The outline of the course includes the following:1.Systems of Linear Equations2.Matrices3.Determinants4.Vector Spaces5.Linear Transformations6.Eigenvalues and Eigenvectors7.Advanced Topics: selet one of the following if time permitted:  Numerical Techniques in Matrix operations,Jordan form,or     Linear Programming.

description.zh: 1. 無線通訊簡介 2. 無線通訊之現況與未來發展 3. 峰巢式行動電話概論 4. 無線傳輸簡介 5. 行動電話之技術 6. 無線通訊系統與標準 7. 衛星行動通訊及其應用 8. 第三代行動通訊重要技術之導論
description.en: 1.Understanding Wireless 2.The Current and Future Developments of Wireless   Communications3.The Cellular Concepts 4.Introduction to Mobile Radio   Propagation 5.Cellular Technologies 6.Wireless Systems and Standards7.Satellits Communications Technology and Its Implementaion 8.The Key Technologies of the Trird Generation Mobile   Communication Systems

description.zh: 瞭解程式語言所常用之各種資結構，１. 抽象資料類別及運算複雜度之概念，２. 靜態結構及其儲存法，３. 遞迴、堆疊、前序、中序、後序運算式，４. 佇列，５. 串列、鏈結串列，６. 樹、二元樹、平衡樹、堆積，７. 圖形，８. 排序，９. 搜尋、雜湊。
description.en: This course is mainly aimed at introducing the data  structures commonly used in programming languages, including: (1) the concept of ADT (abstract data type) and computational complexity, (2) static structures and their storage representations , (3) recursion, stacks, and prefix, infix, and posfix expressions, (4) queues, (5) lists and linked lists, (6) trees, binary trees, height balanced trees, and heaps,  (7) graphs, (8) soring, and (9) searching and hashing.

description.zh: 本課程教授系統分析之模擬方法應用於能源動力系統之穩態與動態分析 (malab)。內容包括能源系統個元件之特性分析與數學模型介紹，系統元件包括；壓縮機、渦輪機、熱交換器、與質子交換膜燃料電池系統。授課單元如下；1. 數值方法介紹 2. 能源系統元件數學模型與程式撰寫壓縮機   渦輪機   熱交換器 3. 能源系統分析範例；燃料電池系統分析流道 model、氣體擴散層 model、燃料電池質傳與電化學傳輸與程式範例
description.en: The course is a system analysis method for performing steady-state and dynamic system simulations of lumped component system (matlab). These methods are essentially a numerical analysis; the course teach student to set up various system composed of; compressor, turbine, heat exchanger, reformer and fuel cell system. Course lectures are listed as:1.Numerical method 2.System components modeling Compressor   Turbine   Heat exchanger3.Case study of energy system; fuel cell system analysisFlow modeling, GDL model, mass & charge transport and programing

description.zh: 人工智慧導論與應用，依序介紹機器學習、深度學習等人工智慧發展範疇與技術演進，並就問題思考精神、人類腦神經運作方式與數學達成之手段與技巧 ，作完整展開之介紹與討論 ，並依技術應用之發展、需求導引之趨勢、AI 能力之未來發展方向與應用展望，加以說明與討論。
description.en: Introduce machine learning, deep learning and other artificial intelligence development categories and technological evolution in order, and give a complete introduction and discussion on the spirit of thinking about problems, the operation method of human brain and the methods and techniques of mathematical achievement.   Following the progress of technology and application, the trend of driven demand, the future development direction on AI ability and the prospective application will be explained and discussed in depth.

name.en: Introduction and Application of Artificial Intelligence

description.zh: 介紹 C++ 語言基本資料處理的概念， 包含基本輸入與輸出、程式的流程控制、函數的應用等指令之撰寫、程式之編輯、編譯、聯絡與程式之執行，並發展一套應用程式。
description.en: This course introduces the basic data processes of C++ language.  They include input/output, program process control, application of functions, program editing and execution, and so on.

description.zh: 現代能源工程技術，決定製程成本，故如何統合有效率的能源管理技術是決定產品競爭力之關鍵，本課程主要內容為︰1. 能源成本控制 2. 區域型電力能管理策略 3. 能源系統的經濟性設計概念 4. 冷暖系統的檢測與分析 5. 總合能源操作的工程化資料收集 6. 新能源系統的生態模組化設計
description.en: At the completion of this course, students will be able to several factors:1. Compare and contrast the various forms of energy conversion.2. Examine the technologies used to convert chemical energy into mechanical energy.3. Apply the concepts of electrical converters.4. Evaluate the major types of energy storage.5. Determine how human values affect the success of energy conservation.6. Design of new energy system modules with ecology considerations.

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study.Seminar.Group meeting.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 本課程主要在讓學生藉由規劃與實施一項公益活動，以實踐企業倫理與社會責任，並藉以思考在推展企業倫理、企業社會責任與公司治理等理念時，如何能落實於企業的體制之中，以建立一個永續發展的企業價值體系。
description.en: This course is designed to enable students to implement corporate ethics and social responsibility by planning and implementing a public welfare activity. The students should think about how to implement corporate ethics, corporate social responsibility, and corporate governance concepts. In order to establish a sustainable enterprise value system.

name.zh: 企業倫理與社會責任實踐
name.en: Corporate Ethics and Social Responsibility Practice

notes: 109 級碩二必修。星期六上午 234，北科附工 302 室

description.zh: 本課程主要在讓學生藉由規劃與實施一項公益活動，以實踐企業倫理與社會責任，並藉以思考在推展企業倫理、企業社會責任與公司治理等理念時，如何能落實於企業的體制之中，以建立一個永續發展的企業價值體系。
description.en: This course is designed to enable students to implement corporate ethics and social responsibility by planning and implementing a public welfare activity. The students should think about how to implement corporate ethics, corporate social responsibility, and corporate governance concepts. In order to establish a sustainable enterprise value system.

name.zh: 企業倫理與社會責任實踐
name.en: Corporate Ethics and Social Responsibility Practice

notes: 109 級碩二必修，星期六 234，台北上課

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意基本觀念及其領域、非線性代數之數值解法、聯立方程式之數值解、多項式內外插、微分、積分、常微分方程、起始、邊界值問題之數值解法。
description.en: Fundamental Concepts and Its Scope, Numerical Solution of Nonlinear Algebraic Equations and Sets of Equations, Interpolating Polynomials, Numerical Differentiation and Numerical Integration, Numerical Solution of Ordinary Differential Equations, Numerical Solution of Boundary-ValueProblems and Initial-Value Problems.

description.zh: 近年來，網路社群迅速發展，電子商務經營已經是每個企業必要的市場競爭與顧客經營中，不可或缺的重要工具。因此，本課程中將以如何設計及管理其中的多媒體內容為課程主要內容。
description.en: The content of this course will teach  how to design the multimedia in the e-commerce.

description.zh: 本課程在探討學校行政理論的歷史背景、學校社會系統理論、學校科層體制、學校氣氛、學校領導、決策、溝通理論、學校效能等，並以技職學校作為討論主軸。
description.en: This course is to guide students to explore the historical background of the theories of school administration; theories of school social system; school departmental hierarchy; school atmosphere; school leadership; theories of decision and communication; studies of school efficiency. Students are expected to apply related theory to analyze VTE issues after the class.

name.en: Administration of Vocational and Technological School

description.zh: 組織行為是採用分析的方法，了解研究解個體行為在個人、團體、組織三個層次中的行為表現，並應用相關學理知識提高組織效能，尤其將焦點放在如何提高員工的生產力、降低離職率與曠職率，增加滿意度等四個變項上。
description.en: Organizational behavior (OB) is a field of research that investigates the impact that individuals, groups, and structure have on behavior within an organization, and then it applies that knowledge to make organizations work more effectively.  Specifically, OB focuses on how to improve productivity, reduce absenteeism and turnover, and increase employee citizenship and job satisfaction.

description.zh: 探討遊戲式數位學習之相關原理、設計、以及實務應用。內容包括遊戲式數位學習之優點、特性、限制、科技、媒體、設計與發展、系統、實際案例、未來趨勢等。
description.en: The course aims to explore advanced issues on game-based e-learning including its characteristics, advantages and limitations, technology and media involved, design and development, system and practical cases, and future trends, etc.

name.zh: 遊戲式數位學習專題研究

description.zh: 課程內容包括：技職教育的理論基礎、能力本位、建教合作、生計教育、職業輔導、技職課程與教學等理念與實務。
description.en: Course content include: theoretical foundations and developmental trends of technical and vocational education, competence-based instruction, cooperative education, career education, vocational guidance, technical and vocational education curriculum.

name.en: Theory and practice of Technical-Vocational Education

description.zh: 為了使訓練資源的更有效運用，本課程希望讓學生了解，企業內部在實施訓練之前，應客觀、嚴謹的加以評估，並追蹤其實施後的成效，以正確評估訓練的效益。
description.en: To make better use of the training resources, the curriculum expects to make students understand that any enterprise should objectively and carefully evaluate the training program before its employment, and keep track of its effect after its employment to make sure the effectiveness of the training program.

name.zh: 教育訓練實施與績效評鑑

notes: 日夜合開，共同 303A 教室【停開】

description.zh: 台灣的歷史從無文字傳統的原住民起，到 17 世紀西班牙、荷蘭海上競逐開始，漢人隨之移墾台灣，成為這塊土地最主要的住民。本課程的內容將依時間先後，將荷蘭西班牙殖民時期、鄭氏王國、清代台灣、日治時期與國民政府時期重要歷史大事、人物等依據講義講解，內容有政治、宗教、文化、經濟、社會等各層面的重要事件、人物以及歷史發展。
description.en: The history of Taiwan originated from the aboriginal culture in which no written languages were included. In the 17th century when the Spanish and the Netherlands were competing for the maritime power, the Hans immigrated into the island and became the main resident. The course will be taught in the temporal order: colonial periods under the Spanish and the Netherlands, Zheng's Kingdom, Taiwan under the Qing Dynasty, Taiwan under the Japanese Domination and Taiwan under the Nationalist Government. All the significant events and important figures will be discussed in class--on politics, religion, culture, economy and social development.

notes: 108 (含) 前：歷史核心；109：人文與藝術

description.zh: 本課程的設計以歷史趨勢的闡述及專題研究分析二方面同時進行。課程方面包括中、西歷史觀念的比較與中國歷代政治、經濟、社會、文化的歷史演進，藉以幫助學生認識時代之趨勢與意義。授課方式以口頭講述為主，討論及書面報告為輔，期使學生在短時間內，能對中國歷史有一簡要而清晰的了解，深化學生的歷史感。
description.en: Methodologically, the course is performed in two ways at the same time: interpretation of historical trends as well as the study and analysis of specific topics. The course will cover: comparison of historical concepts and the historical development of a long term of Chinese history in the fields of politics, economics, society and culture so that the students who take this course will sure understand better the trends and significance as the historical time spans go by. Class activities are made up of: lectures, student discussion and paper presentation. The students who take this course will have a brief but clear understanding of the Chinese history in a short time-thus embedding themselves with a deeper sense of history.

notes: 108 (含) 前：歷史核心；109：人文與藝術

description.zh: 新經濟與舊經濟的分野不是在有『e』還是沒有『e』，而是在有『i』還是沒有『i』，而『i』就是『Innovation，創新』。二十一世紀的『腦力經濟』最重要的戲規則就是『智慧財產權』，同時也是 WTO 會員國必須遵守的重要規範之一。課程內容主要包括三個最基本的智慧財產權課題：專利權，商標權，以及著作權；而為配合本校學生學科背景，本課程將較著重於『專利』方面的實務知識，並且講授『如何激發創意，以培養學生日後能好好應用『智慧財產權』的保護。
description.en: The difference between New-economy and Old-economy is not caused by having "e" or not having "e", but caused by owining "i" or not owning "i". where "I" means "Innovation:.  Intellectual Property is not only the most importance business rule of the :Brain economy era:, but also one of the most important agreements among WTO members.  This course includes the basic three subjects of Intellectual Property:Patent, Trademark, and Copyright.  In order to accommodate the learning background for most of NTUT students, the contents of this course will focus more on the practical practice of the Patennt.  In addition, it also includes the subject of "how to activate your creativeness:so as to make students can use what they learn, "Intellectual Property:, to protect their intellectual work.

notes: 108 (含) 前：法治核心；109：社會與法治

description.zh: 首先介紹歌劇中音樂的元素、本質及角色，欣賞各時期不同類型之歌劇作品，繼由「世界三大男高音」看歌劇曲目的走向，吸引新生代同學對歌劇之響往，帶領愛樂者進入歌劇欣賞的境界。
description.en: This one-semester course is designed to let students learn:  1.to approach to their first opera with open minds and open ears 2. to understand what opera is.  3. to know the essential elements of opera－composers and librettists,  singers, conductors, directors, as well as designs and expenses,...etc.. 4.to understand the development of opera 5.to appreciate opera through watching films of various kind 6.to be able to enjoy opera for the rest of their life.

notes: 108 (含) 前：社哲向度；109：社會與法治；四教 103

description.zh: 這 e 世紀時代的資訊交流是一個廣泛、多樣化與複雜的；究竟人們如何透過溝通表達意識與行為，卻變成非常重要。有效的溝通程度常視為學習溝通的指標，須視事實、竟見、感覺、嗜好和經驗進行徹底地交融與分享的結果。因此，本課程重視現代社會學習「溝通管理」的二項關鍵技術包括：有效溝通結合自我學習技巧和方法：商業知識與科技結合促成人的系統互動能力，配合多媒體傳輸工具完成學習個人與團體溝通效益。課程涵概主題：1. 溝通管理定義與本質元素。2. 溝通管理內涵分析。3. 學習個人溝通能力。4. 學習溝通程序。5.e 化自我學習技巧、方法與表達能力。6. 學習全球化溝通科技工具。7. 團隊溝通的策略與協同戰術。8. 塑造整體溝通文化。
description.en: The information exchange is wide, variety, and complicated in the e-era; how do people express their consciousness and behavior turn to become very important. Effective communication degrees usually are seen as the index of learning communication. It depends on thoroughly melting and sharing with fact, opinion, feeling, interesting and experience. Therefore, "Communication Management," in this course we emphasize on two key techniques of modern society learning including: effective communication with self-learning skill and method; Business knowledge and technology with interactive ability of human system. By using multimedia transmitting tools to complete self and group learning communication and get benefit.Course Subjects:1. Definition and essential element of Communication Management.2. Content analysis of Communication Management.3. Learn personal communication ability.4. Learn communication process.5. E-learning skill, method, and expression ability.6. Learn the technical tools

notes: 108 (含) 前：社哲向度；109：社會與法治

description.zh: 透過分析創新成功之實際個案，讓修課同學了解創新的本質。課程中將介紹不同類型的創新個案，包括：技術創新、產品創新、服務創新與管理創新。本課程也擬搭配邀請成功之創業顧問與談，提供實務經驗，分享創業者該有的認知以及創業的重要理念，當然也包括分享他們在邀創業過程中所面臨的各類挑戰。創業是每個人都曾經懷抱過的夢想，透過創新成功之個案的分析，可以了解到個案公司是如何有步驟的循序漸進。針對每個個案，我們要求每位同學於課前完成個案的閱讀，並於上課前交出本次課程的課前預習心得。我們希望每位參與的同學都能在討論時充分表達意見，遇有不清楚或不同意見時能夠勇於提出他們的看法。本課程擬營造出一種研究的環境，讓學生可以針對個案盡其所能清楚的提出建議並來說服同儕。
description.en: The course enable participant to realize the essential features of innovation via cases study. Various types of innovation cases are included, such as: technology innovation, service innovation and management innovation. We also plan to invites some successful constants to give participants talk and share their experiences, including the challenge and their resolving process.The real case study enables participants to understand the entrepreneurship and the steps to start a business. The participants are required to complete the case reading and a preview report is required in advance the class. We hope that every participant can propose their opinion and persuade others colleges of their viewpoints.

description.zh: 新創事業面臨許多的挑戰，包括：避孼與大企業競爭，找到存活的依據、從無到創立強勢品牌、創立或擴張自有市場 / 消費者據點等。本課程旨在啟發修課同學創業的興趣並協助修課同學思考新創事業如何平衡有限資源以迎向挑戰。新創企業已發展成熟的企業是不一樣，主要是因為新創事業的資源有限，創業家必須同時兼顧許多面向並回應顧客所需。本課程旨在協助修課同學思考創建企業應注意的各種面向評估自己的創能力。課程包含了三大部份，第一部份為創新與創業概念啟發；第二部份在辨別市場機會與發展市場；最後第三部份為新創事業行銷管理。行銷活動能夠將企業的產品及服務傳遞給顧客；並將產品、服務及企業本身的資訊帶到市場上；將顧客資訊回饋給企業。創業行銷管理能夠幫助創業者向潛在投資者及企業夥伴銷售創意以獲得資源，也讓創業家透過創新的商業手法來充分利用稀少的資源。
description.en: Managers must have excellent leadership skills in order to A start-up company has lots of challenges, such as: niche market located and brand diffusion. The course intends to encourage the participant to become an entrepreneur and handle with these challenges. A start-up company is different from well-developed one due to limited resources. Usually, to response customer’s requirement, the entrepreneur must take multiple criteria into consideration simultaneously.    The course includes three parts. Part I build students’ concept about innovation and entrepreneurship. Part II is about market identification. Part III is about marketing management of a start-up company. The efficient marketing activities enable business to approach customer’s requirement, to bring their customer product (or services) and get customer’s feedback. Also, the marketing management helps entrepreneur to reach their potential investor to obtain more resources.

description.zh: 西藥及中草藥是中華民族的傳統藥，也是中國藥學寶庫的重組成成分，中草藥包括中藥、草藥（即民間藥）以及少數民族地區使用的民族藥，在中國，使用中草藥防病治病已有數千年之歷史，寶鑑證明，中草藥療效確切，副作用較合成中藥少，力來深受群眾喜愛。當前，人類健康需要傳統醫藥之觀點正為越來越多之國家和人民接受，開發傳統要已成為當今藥物發展的潮流。同時，近年來科學研究成果表明，從中草藥發展出療效好，毒性低的新藥是一條成功的捷徑。因此，學習中草藥之人員日漸增加。本課程共分：西藥概論、中草藥概論、內科中草藥、兒科中草藥、男科中草藥、婦科中草藥、美容養生中草藥等。
description.en: The Drugs on Life is a two credit hours course and design especially for technology students. This curriculum emphasizes on the clinical applications and action mechanisms of various western and Chinese drugs. The curriculum trends will start from more details and bring a completely concepts. The subjects include neuropharmacology, autacoids, cardiovascular drugs, analgesics, anaethesia and drugs actiong on the central nervous system, chemotherapy of microbial disease and neoplastic disease, hormones and hormone antagonists, drugs acting on the blood and some Chinese drugs.

notes: 108 (含) 前：自然向度；109：自然與科學

description.zh: 大眾傳播與人類社會的關係，正隨科技的進步而日益擴大它的影響力。根據學者研究發現，人類的思想、態度與價值觀念受大眾傳播的影響日漸加深，大傳媒介不但塑造人的思想，同時也影響人們的行為及價值；然而從傳播的功能言，大眾傳播同時具有正面與負面的社會功能，故大眾傳播的發展與過程，殊值重視與探討。本課程兼顧理論與實例的探討，包括傳播特性與要素、大眾傳播的能及效果、新聞守門人理論等，並以實例分析新聞的公正客觀性、新聞自由與國家安全、媒體與選舉等傳播爭議性問題。修習本課程可培養學生閱讀新聞的正確性，不玫人云亦云，受媒體報導所擺佈；同時亦可增強學生人際溝通的技巧與能力。
description.en: With the advancement of technology, mass communication is enlarging its influence in human society.  According to  researches, the thoughts, attitudes and value judgements of humans are deeply affected by mass communication.  The media not only shape persons' thoughts, but also have an impact on their behavior and values.  Since mass communication has positive and negative social functions at the same time, its development and process are therefore worthy of paying much attention and exploration to us.  This course includes the study of the theory and practice of mass communication, such as characteristics and elements functions and effects, as well as the theory of the news gatekeepers.  It also uses stories to analyze disputed issues, for example, news objectivism, freedom of the press and national security, and media and election.  Learning this course, students will be not only capable of cultivating the ability to read a news correctl

notes: 108 (含) 前：社哲向度；109：社會與法治

description.zh: 人際關係是探討對自我的了解及對人的認知，包括性格、態度、魅力、溝通、壓力、挫折和情緒等重要課題的處理；幫助同學學習與各種不同品味、信念、立場與生活方式的人作有效率的溝通，開放的表達出自己的感覺與想法，以建立良好的合作關係，從而開發潛能、爭取更好的發展機會。
description.en: Interpersonal Relationship is to discuss about self-understanding and perception of other people, including how to handle key issues related to character, attitude, attractiveness, communication, pressure, frustration and emotion.  It helps students to learn effective communication, open their minds to express personal feeling and thought, and try to communicate with other people having different tastes, convictions, standpoints and ways of living so as to establish a harmonic and cooperative relationship and furtherly to develop personal potential and strive for better opportunity of development.

notes: 108 (含) 前：社哲向度；109：社會與法治

description.zh: 以視覺藝術為探討重點，研究藝術起源以及原始美術、民俗與大眾藝術分野。探究式覺元素和設計原理以及應用媒材、使用技巧，涵蓋素描、水彩、油畫、版畫、混合媒材、雕塑、建築，廣告、包裝、服裝設計、工業產品設計及攝影等。配合幻燈教學，使同學對於視覺藝術有整體性、概括性的認識，以奠定將來從事藝術鑑賞和研究創造之基礎。
description.en: The focus of this course is the exploration of visual arts.  Students will study the origin of art and the distinction among primitive art, folk and popular art. This course also provides students with visual elements, design principles, applied media material, and techniques including charcoal drawing, water-colored painting, oil painting, graphic art, compound material, sculpture, architecture, advertisement, packaging, fashion design, industrial design, and photography. Slide teaching is adopted to give students a comprehensive and general understanding on visual art in order to foster students to appreciate, study, and create art.

notes: 108 (含) 前：文化核心；109：人文與藝術；四教 103

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生成為具有深度文化視覺的科技人。從認識本土文化為起點，進而認識世界文化。引導學生如何探究文化現象，並且深入文化的精神境界，物質境界，瞭解文化價值與文化傳統，讓文化觀點充分融入個人的思維內涵。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to develop the cultural cultivation of our technology majored students. Starting with the culture of our own land and extending to world-wide culture. The teachers would guide the students to explore the phenomena of the culture, and try to find out both the spirit and the material of the culture. Through the understanding of the worth and the tradition of the culture, the students might merge the cultural cultivation into their personal thinking.

notes: 108 (含) 前：文化核心；109：人文與藝術；共同 606

description.zh: 本課程之目標為：充實生活技能、提升科技素養、豐富生活內涵、培養繼續進修之興趣與能力，以奠定終身學習及生涯發展之基礎。本課程之內容為：一、電腦基本概念，二、電腦功能與應用，三、資料處理，四、資訊管理，五、資訊網路，六、電腦的聲光世界，七、電腦的安全問題與防治，八、未來的資訊社會。
description.en: This course is designed to help student to learn another skill, better understand technology, enrich there live and inspire their interests for further study. The course includes: 1.basic knowledge of computer; 2.the application of computer; 3.data procession; 4.data control; 5.internet; 6.multimedia; 7.computer virus; 8. the world of information.

notes: 108 (含) 前：自然向度；109：自然與科學

description.zh: 此門課程主要在於瞭解社會學的意涵，並藉由跨領域的學習，讓不同學科能有對話的空間。課程涵蓋的範圍會兼顧理論與實用性，讓學生能思考當今的社會，理解到產生因素的多元性，並進而使個人眼界能更加開拓。期望學生於課程學習中能夠擁有更多對於整個社會的不同思維，以強化本身學科之所需，不但具有理論性深入的洞察力，也能引用到管理上實質的層面。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to understand sociology. It covers theory and practicability, and make students consider the current society, and understand the generated factors of diversity . Expect students' study can have more for the community as a whole different way of thinking, in order to strengthen their academic needs, not only has the theoretical depth of insight, but also on the substance applied to the management level.

notes: 108 (含) 前：社哲核心；109：社會與法治

description.zh: 本課程是為非專業學生所設計的哲學概論，介紹西洋哲學的起源、西洋哲學的問題，以及哲學與人生的關係。哲學的問題意識起自人類的自覺，人類意圖認識自己，為宇宙人生尋求解答，哲學的發生本自人類天賦的求知欲，即其本性中對於智慧的追求與愛慕。這種愛慕智慧的精神是希臘文明留給西方世界的遺產，對於知識能持客觀批判的精神，對於真理能存認真熱切的態度，對於人生能有超克苦難的修持。在國際化的世代，我們對西方的認識應更深入其精神層面，此乃本課程規劃的初衷。
description.en: This course is designed for student who is not disciplined in philosophy. As an introduction, we begin at the origin of western philosophy, the philosophical questions and finally, the relationship of human life and philosophy. Philosophy takes place when human being thinking of himself. Man by nature desire to know himself as well as the external world. And due to this love of wisdom, men can be critical to knowledge and be passionate toward truth. Eventually, grasping the sprit of western philosophy , we can view our life in quite a different view. In our time, facing the world of international, we should better understand the western culture, which is rooted in philosophy.

notes: 108 (含) 前：社哲核心；109：人文與藝術

description.zh: 本課程以培養學生尊重與欣賞不同族群、不同時空、不同價值觀所產生的音樂而設。藉由對音樂元素、本質的認知及介紹，欣賞各時期作曲家之代表作品，培養西方音樂的基本常識，建立音樂欣賞的專業態度。教學目標：1. 提高學生音樂欣賞的素養，充實其音樂生活的內涵，2. 激發學生對音樂的興趣，培育愛樂人口，增進社會祥和的原動力，3. 介紹古今中外音樂名家名作，啟發學生對音樂創作的認知與敬重，4. 建立學生對古典音樂、民族音樂、應用音樂及通俗音樂等不同類型音樂的正確認知與包容力，培養世界性的音樂觀。授課內容：1. 概論，2. 歌樂，3. 器樂，4. 儀式音樂，5. 舞蹈音樂，6. 戲劇音樂。
description.en: This course aims to cultivate students' ability to appreciate music of different ethnic groups, different time and place, different value systems. Through the introduction of basic music elements as well as the appreciation of the masterpieces of various composers, it is hoped that students will build up basic music knowledge about music and enhance professional music appreciation potentiality in music. The goals include: 1. Elevating students' capability in music appreciation 2. Inspiring students' interest in music with a view to improving our society into a harmonious world. 3. Introducing domestic and international famous composers' pieces 4. Touring of various forms of music: classical, ethnic, applied and popular music. Contents of this course include: 1.Introduction 2. Vocal music 3. Instrumental music 4. Ritual music 5. Dance music 6. Theatre music

notes: 108 (含) 前：文化向度；109：人文與藝術；共同 606

description.zh: 生命科學概論，重心放在人體生命科學，並強化醫學的角色。此外，中西醫結合的觀點，詮釋抗老、防癌。以身心靈養生的方式，強化預防醫學。並從人類疾病的本源性病因，根本探討。當然，如何增強免疫力，袪除自由基是主軸。在探究人體潛能、身心靈養生或疾病的本源性原因時，都必須重視「經絡」系統。總之生命是非常奧妙的，不僅只物質面，更要重視心靈層面，中西醫整合方向，必是廿一世紀的主流。
description.en: This course focuses on human life science and emphasizes the roles of medicine on improving the life quality of human beings. It also uses the point of view of integration traditional Chinese and western medicine to interpret how to prevent the aging of body and occurrence of cancers. This course also focuses on how to keep the body, mind and spirit in the best conditon in order to prevent the occurrence of human diseases. In addition, it deeply discusses the eseential etiology of human disease and teaches audiences how to enhance the body immunity and how to get rid of free radicals. The importance of meridian system of the human body and its relationships to human potentiality, body, mind spirit and diseses are also discussed. Life is marvelous. The completeness of life depends on the saisfaction of not only the material but also menetal and spiritual needs. Integration of the traditional Chinese and western medicine to improve the life quality of human beings is the main issue.

notes: 108 (含) 前：自然核心；109：自然與科學

description.zh: 本課程，擬引領修課同學們徜徉古今愛情文學作品；內容含括詩、詞、散文、小說、戲曲、視聽影像等，並以主題單元方式進行之。從中，仔細咀嚼或清澀曖昧、或清新動人、或可歌可泣、或刻骨銘心、或纏綿悱惻、或黯然銷魂的愛情文學作品；從中，與作品中所傳達的心情、心事、心聲產生共鳴，由此來發現：在塵世的繁華裡，情感的傳遞是沒有時空隔閡，是可以心心相映。鑑於修課同學正值青春年華、正將展翅翱翔，因此本課程除了鑑賞、品味古今愛情文學作品，並欲與吾人現實人生作一連結，由此思考愛情、婚姻、兩性、家國、社會、政治等議題，由此尋求愛情的本質與真諦。
description.en: The course to be taught to lead students know the love of ancient and modern literature; content encompasses poems, prose, fiction, drama, music, video works, etc., and will be conducted in a manner theme unit. From this, clear astringent taste ambiguous, fresh and moving, epic, unforgettable, deeply grieved and other types of love literature. In the process, the works convey mood, thoughts, aspirations, etc. to produce spiritual resonance. Thus to discover: In dust, there is no time and space to pass emotional estrangement, is matched heart.As the students is young, will start his life being so understanding of the course in addition to the love of ancient and modern literature, and our desire to make a real life connection. Thus thinking love, marriage, gender, home country, society, politics and other topics. Thus, the nature and essence of seeking love.

description.zh: 本課程以培養學生尊重與欣賞不同族群、不同時空、不同價值觀所產生的音樂而設。藉由對音樂元素、本質的認知及介紹，欣賞各時期作曲家之代表作品，培養西方音樂的基本常識，建立音樂欣賞的專業態度。教學目標：1. 提高學生音樂欣賞的素養，充實其音樂生活的內涵，2. 激發學生對音樂的興趣，培育愛樂人口，增進社會祥和的原動力，3. 介紹古今中外音樂名家名作，啟發學生對音樂創作的認知與敬重，4. 建立學生對古典音樂、民族音樂、應用音樂及通俗音樂等不同類型音樂的正確認知與包容力，培養世界性的音樂觀。授課內容：1. 概論，2. 歌樂，3. 器樂，4. 儀式音樂，5. 舞蹈音樂，6. 戲劇音樂。
description.en: This course aims to cultivate students' ability to appreciate music of different ethnic groups, different time and place, different value systems. Through the introduction of basic music elements as well as the appreciation of the masterpieces of various composers, it is hoped that students will build up basic music knowledge about music and enhance professional music appreciation potentiality in music. The goals include: 1. Elevating students' capability in music appreciation 2. Inspiring students' interest in music with a view to improving our society into a harmonious world. 3. Introducing domestic and international famous composers' pieces 4. Touring of various forms of music: classical, ethnic, applied and popular music. Contents of this course include: 1.Introduction 2. Vocal music 3. Instrumental music 4. Ritual music 5. Dance music 6. Theatre music

description.zh: 因是在大專教藝術欣賞的課程，我在設計課程上，即考慮雖同學們不是藝術本科學生，但秉持 "雖創作，但會欣賞的原則"，我的課程安排將從上古時代人類的美術創作活動進而引導解釋什麼是人類的美感經驗。讓他們明瞭東方藝術之同與不同，再介紹東西方的繪畫潮流，如西方：從文藝復興至寫實主義，印象主義，至超印象主義，東方：從漢的畫象磚開始至中國畫，書法之演進，中西繪畫之比較，內容是繁而多的。但我將用簡潔扼要的 "重點教學法", 寓教於樂的方式，讓同學不再懼怕 "Art'，甚至可以簡單的分辨出藝術品的年代，作者，及欣賞藝術作品的要領，這是我給此門課所訂的目標。另一個教學重點是：" 理論和實際併重 "。在每一單元中，我將設計一項簡的 [自己動手做] 大概祇花 20-30 分鐘讓學生體會和真正看見，明白，藝術家製造藝術品的過程。很希望能帶學生至博物院或美術館一趟，或至鶯砍參觀陶工廠。總之，一切課程計劃，乃配合學生之程度與興趣。
description.en: Because most students taking this course are not art major; therefore, I adhere to the principle of "Although not creation, appreciation will be instructed."  On course design, my class starts from the artistic creation of human beings in prehistoric time and further introduces the experience of beauty sensed by man and understand the similiar and difference of eastern and western art.  Moreover, I will introduce the fashion of priniting of eastern and western culture.  For example, the western culture: from the Renaissance to realism, impressionism and super impressionism.  Western culture: from a portrait stone of Han Dynasty to Chinese painting, the develpment of calligraphy and comparison of Chinese and western paintings. The teaching content is complicated, but I will simply it and highlight teaching way to let my students enjoy it.

description.zh: 古蹟、歷史建築和聚落為台灣地區文化資產的一部份，亦是台灣社會發展和多元文化交融的歷史見證。這些建築物表出各項的歷史價值與意義，其類型包括了史前遺址、荷西城堡、清代祠廟、墳墓、民居，以及日治時代以後的官署、學校、官舍住宅、土木設施等。本課程的目的，一方面希望讓修課同學對台灣各期建築歷史與形式風格特徵，能有清晰的架構與認識，以作為欣賞台灣古蹟的基礎；另一方面則是養成同學對身處文化環境的關心與歷史人文精神的培養。
description.en: Cultural property, historic building and settlement are the evidence of history development and multiple cultural interaction of Taiwanese society. The types of architecture include excavation, castle, temple, tomb, folk settlement before the Ching dynasty, and official building, school, house and civil engineering facility after the Japanese occupied period. This course hope to help students to understand the architectural history briefly, and get some basic skill about the formative characters of each period. Furthermore, it will train them to give more concern on the cultural environment of Taiwan.

description.zh: 本課程將使學生學習到氣象的一些基本知識，並應用於日常生活中。內容包括太空中的地球、天氣的要素、鋒面與風暴、世界的氣候、氣候變遷、天氣的觀測與分析、天氣預報、雲的種類、天象導覽、天氣觀察者指南等。
description.en: This course will let students learn the basic knowledge of the weather and use it to their life. The content includes the earth in the space, elements of the weather, fronts and storms, climate of the world, climate change, observing and analyzing the weather, types of clouds, field guide to the sky, weather watcher's resource guide.

description.zh: 海洋環境是人類賴以生存和發展的自然環境的重要組成 部分，包括海洋水體、海底和海面上空的大氣，以及與海洋密切相關，並受到海洋影響的沿岸和河口區域。海洋環境問題的產生，主要是人們在開發利用海洋的過程中，沒有考慮海洋 環境的承受能力，低估了自然界的反作用，使海洋環境受到不同程度的損壞。首先是向海洋排放污染物；其次是某些不合理的海岸工程建設，給海洋環境帶來的嚴重影響；第三是對水產資源的濫捕，對紅樹林、珊瑚礁的亂伐亂採，也危及到生態平衡。上述問題的存在已對人類生產和生活均構成了嚴重威脅。為此，海洋環境保護問題已成為當今全球關注的熱點之一 。本課題是當今全世界共同關心的課題之一，網路資訊眾多，從聯合國環境署（UNEP）、美國海洋大氣總署（NOAA）及 Green Peace Marine Conservation 等眾多推廣，培養學生的海洋倫理意識並與海洋生態保育的理念接軌是本課程目標。
description.en: The marine environment is an important part of mankind's survival and development of the natural environment, including marine waters, seabed and over the sea, the atmosphere, and is closely related with the ocean, and by the marine influence coastal and estuarine areas. Generation of marine environmental issues, people in the process of development and utilization of the ocean, without considering the capacity of the marine environment, underestimated the nature of the reaction, the marine environment are subject to different degrees of damage. The first is the discharge of pollutants to the ocean; followed by some unreasonable Coastal Construction, the serious impact to the marine environment; aquatic resources from over-exploitation, the indiscriminate logging Luancai mangroves, coral reefs, and also endangering the ecological balance. The presence of the above problems pose a serious threat to human life and production. For this reason, the issue of protection of the marine environ

description.zh: 本課程主要在從人生內在活動面向使學生明瞭宗教與人生的關係。首先探究人生的意義與特性，次則經由對宗教哲學，比較宗教學與宗教現象學的瞭解，來分析人生的問題。內容特別強調文化對人生的影響，宗教乃是深層文化原則所繫，同時人生問題也能引發宗教的適應與發展等等。
description.en: The purpose of the course is to approach of " Action Immanent ", enabling students to realize the relation of religions and life. First, to study the issues on the meaning and characteristics of life. Second,through the understanding of "Philosophy of Religion "、" Comparative Religion " and "Phenomenology of Religion ", to analyze the problems of life. Emphasis is on culture and the influence of life, as religion is a foundation supporting culture where problems of life can stimulate the adaptation and development of religion.

description.zh: 本課程的重點在於闡述管理學之基本概念，主要的內容涵蓋四個領域：(1) 瞭解管理學之理論與相關學者之研究報告；(2) 討論企業界管理應用實務案例；(3) 探討多國化管理之趨勢與差異 (4) 如何落實管理理論研討與趨勢。另外介紹現代管理相關功能實務應用案例。
description.en: The purpose of Management has four distinct objectives：(1)to introduce a new management paradigm；(2)to effectively combine the basic concepts of management and organizational behavior into a single volume, including the management functional and departmental descriptions；(3)to discuss business management applications in practice and ；(4)to effectively implement the management basic ideas. The planning, organization, decision, leadership and monitoring among variety culture will be covered and discussed in the class as well.

description.zh: 介紹日常生活中所經常遭遇到的案例使學生認識法律上之常識，培養學生珍惜法律上所賦予之權利，並及時行使庶免讓權利睡著了，致蒙受意外損害。並督促學生善盡法律上之責任，蔚為人人知法，人人守法的風尚，導致社會祥和。授課內容：按民法總則、債篇、物權、親屬、繼承各篇之順序，選擇與日常生活關係最密切之案例，逐一介紹，並對解決之道詳加說明。有觸及民間權益者，例如民間互助會，使用票據之常識，海峽兩岸婚姻，汽車肇事與保險責任及軍人及其家屬優待條例等均一併介紹。
description.en: This course-through carefully examining individual cases that often happen-helps understand more about legal knowledge so that they would cherish their endowed rights and protect themselves from being hurt. This course also encourages the students to serve the duty of laws in the hope that "All People Know The Laws and All People Follow The Laws." Thecontents: Introduction to General Principles, Provisions of Obligations, Family and Succession. Cases that have much to do with the daily life are picked up for discussion. Other topics like the mutual self-help funds, the use of checks, cross-strait marriages, vehicle accidents, insurance, bonus regulations on the military servicemen and their family are also included.

description.zh: 使用者導向之設計已成為大多數互動設計的依循主軸。他翻轉了以產品為導向的傳統，強調以使用者的偏好引領設計的價值。而這就是設計思考的方法導入互動設計中，利用其敏感性和方法，透過可行及可用的技術滿足使用者的需求，從而產生使用者價值並發展市場機會。研究建議，由世界級的設計公司 IDEO 所主導，設計思考與決策科學相結合，觸發了同理心設計與工程技術的融合。這不僅可以確保提出兼容實際性和創造性地問題解決方案外，而且在設計的開始便融入使用者導向的設計概念，將有助於創新設計與解決方案的提出。同時，在設計的初始階段導入資料應用與分析的方法，更能在設計中正確的整合敏感性，技術可行性，商轉可行性和使用者的需求。本課程主要的概念在於利用設計思考以使用者導向之設計方法，將使用者及其需求作為設計提案以及解決方案的啟始點，並整合分析設計對象，使用者所遭遇的問題，以及如何提高性能以及實現可擴展性等問題。並透過資料科學與工具的整合應用，導引資料分析人員與設計專業人員進行跨領域的整合，以建構未來設計創新的機會與願景。因此，本課程的主要目標是：1. 建構以用戶為導向之人本設計重要設計流程。2. 使用高品質的數據，可以創建設計工件，
description.en: As the user-center design is becoming the core of most interaction design (IxD), it has become a popular belief that it is no longer the product that leads but users and user preferences that's leading the game. This is where design thinking steps in, where IxD uses their sensibility and methods to match users' need in a way that is technologically feasible and viable enough to generate user value and tap market opportunity. Suggested by some studies, brought in vogue by the popular design firm IDEO, design thinking when combined with decision science results in an infusion of empathy with engineering. This not only ensures a practical and creative resolution of problems but also puts the user at the center of applications and at the starting point to develop new designs and solutions. Meanwhile, ensuring design in analytics projects from the initial stages can lead to the right blend of sensibility, technical feasibility, business viability, and consumer needs.The idea is, design th

notes: ◎日職合開，申請 PBL 教室，1 週【停開】

description.zh: 本課程介紹整合即時影像、即時音訊、實體裝置、及相關表演科技（如燈光控制、各類感應器應用等）之技術與應用實務，並藉由圖形化、物件導向程式設計系統，引導未有程式設計經驗的視覺設計者或輔助已有程式設計能力者，以更有效率的方式進行相關互動系統設計，藉以達成互動裝置、表演科技、與表演藝術之整合。
description.en: This course introduces the technology that help integrates real-time video, audio, installations, and associated performance arts technology (such as lighting control, the application of various types of sensors, etc.) into performing arts. Through a graphical, object-oriented programming system, the course is intended to help visual designers with no programming experiences or to assist experienced programmers to efficiently design the interactive systems that combine interactive installations, performance arts technology, and performing arts itself as a whole.

name.en: Interactive Installation and Performing Arts Technology

description.zh: 互動設計可視為三大傳統設計領域：平面設計、工業設計，與建築設計的延伸。在許許多多延伸出來的新設計領域如 UI、UX、響應式網頁、互動產品、智慧空間等等，圖像依舊是所有設計在發想、討論，與實現設計上所仰賴的根本工具。本課程以圖像為設計語言的架構下，介紹由圖像所發展出來的數位生產線，以模組技術介紹互動設計在設計發想、原型製作，以至到設計討論與提案所需要之圖像技術，並鼓勵學生以一設計提案來總結課堂之所學。
description.en: Interaction design can be considered as an extension of the long-established fields of architectural, industrial, and graphical design. Regardless what types of the recent emerging field of interaction design such as UI, UX, responsive website, tangible interaction design, or smart environment, the image remains as the visual language for design ideation to realization. This course introduces the concept of digital pipeline which is mediated on wide range of image related digital technologies. Through those modularized technologies, we can form a working pipeline to create a prototype for an interaction design proposal.

notes: ◎排光華 409 建議碩一選修，外 / 日 / 職碩，設計博班合開

description.zh: 藥膳在中醫理論指導下，將中草藥與實務相配合，運用傳統烹調技術和現代加工方法製成味、色、形俱佳的、更有保健和治療作用作之食品，其內容廣泛，迄今已有三千年之歷史。所謂藥食同源更是集中而深刻的體現了藥膳之重要性。本課程共分：湯膳概論、穀物湯膳、蔬菜湯膳、果品湯膳、畜肉湯膳、海鮮湯膳、藥草湯膳和美容養生湯膳等。
description.en: The Applied Nutrition of Life is two credit hours course and design especially for technology students. This curriculum emphasizes on the clinical applications and action mechanisms of various food cooking of Chinese drugs. The curriculum trends will start from more details and bring a completely concepts. The subjects include some Chinese food cooking contain Chinese herbal and some skill to how to select a good quality Chinese herbal.

notes: 108 (含) 前：自然向度；109：自然與科學

description.zh: 生態與環境保護是廿世紀的新課題，也是人類目前及未來所面臨的最大考驗。因為環境問題是超越國界的，因此環境的保護是每個人都必須瞭解的，也是每個人應盡的責任。本課程首先在了解生態環境與生活素質的關係，並了解環境污染問題的產生及其分類，再就台灣環境問題之所在分析其根源，最後了解台灣環境實施之現況後，並共同研究解決之道。
description.en: Introduction to Ecology and Environmental Protection is a brand new issue of the 20th century; also, it is the biggest challenge of all human beings and our offspring. Because environmental protection is an international issue, everyone got to realize its importance and take some action. This lesson is designed to help students understand the connection between our ecological environment and our living condition, the environmental pollution problems and their classification, the environmental problems in Taiwan, and the solution to Taiwan's environmental problems after the situation introduction.

notes: 108 (含) 前：自然核心；109：自然與科學

description.zh: 本課程為財務會計領域之進階課程，針對已具初級會計學之學生深入講授財務會計之理論、觀念、方法及程序。本課程全面納入國際財務報導準則 (IFRS)，內容包括：介紹財務報導觀念架構、主要財務報表編製、講解資產負債表中有關資產、負債、股東權益以及現金流量表與租賃會計等，修習本課程可使學生對 IFRS 有全面整體了解及運用之能力。亦有助於將來參加會計乙級、記帳士及公務人員高考等證照考試。
description.en: This course is an advanced course for financial accounting. It is to teach the financial accounting theory, concept, method and procedure for students with some basic accounting knowledge. The course covers all the materials to understand financial accounting based on IFRS. The course will help students for preparing advanced license examinations for accounting.

description.zh: 金融科技包含兩個字，金融與科技，是近年來新興的產業趨勢，影響的層面非常廣泛，不只是金融方面，更牽涉到新興科技與物聯網。本課程將從不同的角度分析金融科技的技術內容、應用領域及商業模式，並藉智慧財產權與國內外重要公司發展的得失做一介紹，希望達到了解並運用此新興科技的目的。
description.en: FinTech includes two words: Finance and Technology. It is a new trend of industrial field. It has influence on lot of technical fields, not only finance, but also emerging technologies and IoT. This course will analyze FinTech from different angles, such as technology contents, application fields and business models. It also will utilize intellectual property and experience of FinTech leading companies to obtain decent knowledge of this new field.

description.zh: 區塊鏈由比特幣為代表的 1.0，經過以太坊的智能合約為代表的 2.0，進入以設計超級帳本或結合物聯網、人工智慧的 3.0 階段。在各產業的應用也逐漸廣泛，已呈現多元研究及發展的面向，也代表產業型態將因為區塊鏈的發展而發生重大的變革。本課程在帶領學生了解區塊鏈的核心技術、特性，以及目前在各產業的應用實例，並透過從發行數字貨幣到撰寫智能合約的商業應用，看見區塊鏈未來的發展。
description.en: Blockchain is represented by Bitcoin 1.0, and after 2.0 represented by Ethereum's smart contracts, it enters the 3.0 stage of designing a super ledger or combining the IoT and AI. The application in various industries is gradually becoming more and more extensive, and it has presented a multi-faceted research and development orientation. It also represents that the industry type will undergo major changes due to the development of the blockchain.This course leads students to understand the core technology and characteristics of blockchain, as well as current application examples in various industries, and sees the future development of blockchain through the commercial application from issuing digital currency to writing smart contracts.

notes: ◎資財三甲乙合開 / 科研 240 教室

description.zh: 本課程中包含下列主題：1. 簡介；2. 電子商店的行銷策略；3. 電子商店的建 置；4. 電子商店的經營與管理；5. 電子商店的法律問題；6. 案例介紹；7. 結論。
description.en: In the course, the following topics will be discussed：1.Overview of EC；2.The marketing strategies of EC；3.How to install an EC；4.The management of EC；5.The current problems of EC；6.Cases study；7.Conclusion.

description.zh: 此課程係提供對不織布學之研究與理論有興趣的研究生。課程包括所有不織布製造方法與其在工業領域上之應用，包括有短纖維網、長絲網、濕式纖維網之製造方法；纖維網之物理強化方法，纖維網之化學強化方法；不織布、薄膜、梭織物與針織物之疊層方法；微細與超微細粒子在不織布上之應用；不織布之印染與整理加工；不織布在電子、航太、醫學材料及人工皮革上之應用。
description.en: This program is designed for graduate students who are interested in research and theoretical aspects of Non-woven materials. The course covers all aspects of Non-woven manufacturing methods, as well as their applications in industry. They include manufacturing methods of; fibrous web filament web wet method; physically bonded, chemically bonded or methods; lamination among the film, woven, knitted and Non-woven fabrics; use of fine and superfine particle in Non-woven industry; Printing and Finishing for Non-woven; use of Non-woven in electronics aerospace, medical materials and artificial leather..…etc.

description.zh: 本課程適合一般大專行銷管理之授課。其目的在尋求優良的產品行銷管理方法，以求企業之良好利潤。本課程授課內容在使學生瞭解行銷管理之觀念，產品設計、產品運銷、促銷及訂價。相關之授課內容包括：市場區隔、市場組織、購買行為、產品開發、零售、批發、促銷、廣告及訂價程序等。
description.en: The marketing course is suitable to college student. The purpose is to find good method of product marketing, in order to pursuit good profit of enterprise. The course contents' goal makes student understand the idea of marketing, product design, product transportation, promotion and price setting. The related course includes: market segmentation, market organization, the behavior of buying, product development, retailing, whole-saling promotion, advertising and price setting process.

description.zh: 電控技術在現代工業應用中扮演著不可或缺的角色。因此，本課程的目的在使學生了解電控技術，其內容包括 Matlab/Simulink 軟體平台介紹、電控系統建模、分析與設計。
description.en: Electrical control technology plays an important role in modern industrial applications. Therefore, the purpose of this course is to introduce the technology to the students. The content includes Matlab/Simulink software platform, and electrical control system modeling, analysis and design.

name.zh: 計算機在電控技術之應用
name.en: Computer Methods for Electrical Control Technology

description.zh: 本課程在研習類比積體電路設計，其課程目的在給予學習者了解目前類比 CMOS 積體電路分析與設計，並強調基礎與應用知識以符合工業界的需求，課程內容可包括下列主題。1. 類比設計概述 2. 基本 MOS 元件物理特性 3. 單級放大器 4. 差動放大器 5. 頻率響應 6. 雜訊分析 7. 回授 8. 運算放大器 9. 振盪器 10. 鎖相迴路
description.en: This course is concerned with the analog integrated circuit design. Its purpose is to deal with the analysis and design of analog CMOS integrated circuits, emphasizing fundamentals as well as new paradigms that students need to master in today's industry. The course covers the following topics. 1.Introduction o analog design2.Basic MOS device physics3.Single-stage amplifiers4.Differential amplifiers5.Frequency response6.Noise7.Feedback8.Operational amplifiers9.Oscillators10.Phase-locked loops

description.zh: 本課程為「電磁波」課程之延伸，以電磁波輻射特性之探討為主，可作為研究所「電波傳播」、「無線通訊系統」與「智慧型天線」等課程基礎。預修科目：電磁波、電波工程導論中文概述 1. 行動通訊系統中之天線基本觀念 2. 天線重要基本參數 3. 電磁波輻射特性 4. 線型天線 5. 微帶天線 6. 天線陣列設計 7. 天線量測
description.en: 1.General view of Antenna in Mobile System2.Fundamental Parameters of Antenna3.Radiation Characteristics of Electromagnetic Wave4.Linear Wire Antenna5.Microstrip Antenna6.Antenna Array Design7.Antenna Measurement

description.zh: 課程主要為介紹人工智慧概念和基本原理，學習 DNN/CNN/LSTM 的神經網路架構和學習方法，並舉資通訊技術應用實例說明，進而在雲端或非雲端平台實作人工智慧。課程內容包括：1. 人工智慧概念和基本原理 2.DNN 與深度學習 3.DNN 應用實例：5G 無線資源分配 4.CNN5.LSTM 6.LSTM 應用實例: 5G 極化碼解碼和 Federated Learning7.Attention 神經網路 8.CNN 和 Attention 應用實例：影片場景分段 9. 學習方法：監督式，非監督式，強化學習 10.Amazon 雲端平台 11.Amazon DeepLens 智慧鏡頭平台 12.Amazon Alexsa 智慧音箱平台 13. 分組實作
description.en: The goal of this course is to introduce ideas and principles behind artificial intelligence. We will teach the structure of DNN/CNN/LSTM neural network structure and learning methods, and implement artificial intelligence in cloud or non-cloud platforms. The course content includes:1.Ideas and principles of artificial intelligence2.DNN and deep learning3.DNN example: 5G wireless resource allocation4.CNN5.RNN/LSTM6.LSTM example: 5G Polar code decoder and Federated Learning7.Attention neural network8.CNN and attention example: video scene boundary detection9.Learning methods: supervised, unsupervised, reinforcement10.Amazon cloud platform11.Amazon DeepLens12.Amazon Alexsa13.Project implementation

name.zh: 人工智慧在資通訊技術應用實務
name.en: Artificial Intelligence in Information and Communication Technology Applications

description.zh: 本課程內容包括通風系統基礎，工業通風，排煙設計，空氣過濾、送風系統設計及安裝與測試，以系統設計為重點。
description.en: The contents of this course include the fundamentals of ventilation system, industrial ventilation, exhaust design, air filtration, air moving system design, construction and testing, the focus of this course is on the system design.

description.zh: 自動化應用基礎，自動化規劃設計︰1. 個體冷凍設備 2. 冷凍系統運轉操作 3. 冷凍倉儲管理自動化 4. 低溫冷凍應用自動化
description.en: Fundamentals and design of automation applications include:1. Unitary refrigeration equipment.2. Refrigerating system operation.3. Refrigerated warehousing management.4. Low temperature refrigeration application.

description.zh: 實驗是進行科學與工程研究不可或缺的工具，實驗方法的設計與實驗數據的分析更是決定實驗結果品質優劣的關鍵，本課程將介紹實驗過程所必須具備的各項知識，以數據的量測與分析為開始，並介紹量測各類物理量的感測元件，如壓力、溫度、流量及聲波等，以建立學生具備實驗量測的基礎。課程主要內容包含有基本量測、量測標準、量測單位、訊號讀取、資料簡報、數據的準確性與變異性、類比訊號量測、數位訊號量測、系統響應、感測器。
description.en: Introduction of Experiment and Measurement MethodExperiment is the essential tool for the research of science and engineering. The design of experiment and the analysis of data are the keys of the high quality of experiment. The course will introduce the materials of experiment and measurement. The procedures of measurement and the analysis method of data will be detailed investigated. And then the sensors to measure the interested physical parameters of pressure, temperature, flow rate and acoustic will be introduced. The technology of measurement and analysis of experiment will be built up in the course. The contents of the course are basic measurement, standards of measurement, dimension of measurement, access data, data presentation, accuracy and uncertainty of data, analog signal measurement, digital signal measurement, system response, and sensors.

description.zh: 熱交換器設計方法、單向對流熱傳計算、壓差計算、冷凝器與蒸發器分析、殼管式熱交換器分析、密集式熱交換器分析、濕盤管理論分析
description.en: Design methods, forced convection correlations for single phase heat exchange, pressure calculation, condensers and evaporators analysis, shell and tube heat exchanger analysis, compact heat exchanger analysis, wet coil analysis.

description.zh: 室內氣候、室外氣候、熱環境、空氣環境－汙染物、換新與通風、音環境、人體舒適度、室內空氣品質控制、潔淨室之規劃設計。
description.en: Indoor and outside air conditions, thermal environment, air pollutants, fresh air and ventilation, noise level, human confort, indoor air quality control, design of clean room.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹現今用各種結構系統〔耐震、免震（隔震）、制震（減震）〕的特性及耐震性能原理，由基礎力學理論配合應用實務設計做一統括整理解說。並從地震中建築物實際破壞狀況的解說到耐震診斷及耐震補強技術做一現況的解說與說明。
description.en: The earthquake-proof performance principle and the characteristic of the structural system (1.General structure 2.Base isolation structure 3.Virbration control,Damper) being used well now are introduced at this course, and lectures from the mechanics theory of the base to a aactual design. In addition, the destruction situation and the earthquake-proof diagnosis reinforcement in the building are explained due to the earquake.

name.en: The earthquake-proof performance principle and the character

description.zh: 本課程的目的是研究人與環境互動的關係，介紹環境心理學發展的過程及相關的理論。並藉由觀察與評估現有生活環境中的行為，增進我們對環境心理學中在理論與經驗上不同取向的瞭解。課程內容包括 1. 緒論 2. 研究方法及理論架構 3. 建成環境，由家環境到城市空間 4. 社會行為及實質環境 5. 自然環境與行為 6. 使用者用後評估 7. 結論
description.en: The purpose of this course is to explore the interaction relationships between human and environment, introducing the development and theory of environmental psychology. Via observing and evaluating the behavior of present living environment, enhance our knowledge about environmental psychology through various approaches to theories and experiences. The course includes:1. Introduction  2. Research methods and theory framework 3. The built environment from home environment to city space 4. Social behavior and the physical environment 5. The natural environment and behavior 6. Post-occupancy evaluation 7. Conclusion

notes: 日職建都所與設計博合開

description.zh: 本課程以建築專業回應社會需求為依歸。針對台灣原住民部落之返鄉青年之居住與生產模式提出各項議題討論。藉由社區總體營造與民眾參與等方式，以一學期的進程發展新的部落建築形式與配置計畫，並在永續發展與保育並重的前提下，提出實質開發與營造施工的前期規劃。
description.en: This course introduces the theories, principles, and methods of designing and construction for local social issues in Taiwan. In this year, Focuses on the Settlements of aboriginal people, through cases studies and design practice, the courses seeks to expand the students understanding to the major components of site planning. The topics also focus on six premises:1.theories in relation to site planning;2.design sequences of site planning;3.investigations and analyses of the sites;4.planning and designing methods and their evaluations;5.environmental impact assessment and countermeasures.

notes: 建築三、四與職建都所合開

description.zh: 科技日文主要是以培養閱讀日文科技期刊或論文能力為重點，俾充實大學理工系、所學生參考日文系列技術論文或工程手冊時之理解、翻譯與書寫方式。課程內容包含：    1. 論文閱讀練習    2. 翻訣技巧    3. 技術論文之書寫
description.en: This course will direct students to learn the ability of reading and writing Japanese journals, papers engineering instruction manuals or reference materials. This course include:1.  papers reading practice2.  translation skill3.  technical writing

description.zh: 此概論課程將介紹虛擬實境及擴增實境相關技術於工作環境及其設計之應用。課程中將介紹虛擬實境及擴增實境於不同工作環境及其設計之應用實例，旨在使學生了解如何將虛擬實境及擴增實境之技術運用在實際工作環境、產品及系統設計。
description.en: The introductory course gives an overview about VR (virtual reality) and AR (augmented) technology applied in different workspace and its designs. Various applications and examples of VR and AR applied in workspace design will be demonstrated. The goal of the course is to empower students in learning VR/AR applications and how to apply the techniques in actual work environments, product development and system designs..

name.zh: VR 與 AR 於工作環境設計概論
name.en: ntroduction of VR/AR in workspace and its design

description.zh: 本課程介紹資料分析與圖示的工具與方法，包括如何以精確的模式來描述資料、利用各種指標與圖形來探索給定資料的特性、特徵、或是規律性，並且可以根據所建立的資料模型來進行估計與預測。此外，我們也將探討如何產生各種機率分布的隨機樣本，以及各種最佳化問題求解。本課程將以 R 程式語言為工具。
description.en: This course introduces tools and methods for data analysis and graphics. The main topics include models that are used to describe data, indices and plots for exploring data characteristics and patterns, and estimation and prediction based on the data models. In addition, we discuss how to generate random sample from probability distributions and how to solve optimization problems. The selected tool for this course is R.

notes: 工管四甲乙丙合開【停開】

description.zh: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
description.en: The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in learning how to process, and decipher the readings that serve as springboards for reading skills development, vocabulary building, language analysis, and thought-provoking discussions. The readings include a variety of viewpoints on global topics centered around social issues, the environment, psychology, business, and technology.  Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

name.zh: 進階英文閱讀與聽講練習

description.zh: 課程重點：(1) 藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2) 使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3) 熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4) 透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
description.en: This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through reading materials appropriate to their levels; (2) to develop reading skill by giving explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as analysis of basic writing skill; (3)to  familiarize students with useful expressions in conversation and build up their confidence in cross-cultural communication; (4)to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

description.zh: 本課程將使學生熟悉專業筆譯的重要概念與原則。學生將習得翻譯學領域中各種跨學科的理論觀點（例如語言學與功能主義取向、言談與語域分析、翻譯規範、文化轉向、翻譯社會學以及翻譯科技等），並將理論知識運用於中英／英中翻譯實務上。學生將深入探討各種翻譯論點，並以此為基礎進行文本分析、釐清翻譯問題，以及構思合適之翻譯策略與技巧。
description.en: This course will acquaint students with fundamental concepts and principles of professional translation. Students will acquire a solid grounding in a range of ideas within translation studies (e.g. linguistic and functionalist approaches, discourse and register analysis, translation norms, cultural turn, sociology of translation, and translation technologies) and apply the theoretical knowledge to various English and Chinese translation activities. This course will also enable students to critically discuss the basic postulates of translation theories and use them in text analysis, the identification of translation problems, and the formulation of suitable strategies and techniques.

description.zh: 本課程將針對英語授課 (English as a medium of instruction, EMI) 及學科與語言整合教學 (Content and Language Integrated Learning , CLIL) 兩大領域範疇進行深入探究，本課程將探討不同主題包含：EMI/CLIL 不同的理論架構、EMI/CLIL 於不同學科上之應用、以及 EMI/CLIL 於不同教育階段的應用等主題，並透過課堂討論、小組活動、個案研究以及專題提案討論，提升學生對相關主題的知識建構與教學能力，建立其對 EMI/CLIL 主題於文獻探討之掌握及相關研究方法，並期將所學之知能應用在課堂教學中。
description.en: This course in an introductory course for English as a Medium of Instruction (EMI) and Content and Language Integrated Learning (CLIL). This course aims to cultivate students’ knowledge about EMI and CLIL and their applications in different disciplines across different educational levels. The elements of teaching subject areas in English will be discussed in class to equip students with the basic concepts and techniques for EMI and CLIL. Through various class activities such as lectures, discussions, case studies, group work, and larger projects, students will explore not only the theorical foundations for EMI and CLIL but also classroom pedagogy and methodological approaches related to EMI and CLIL. The promises and challenges of EMI and CLIL and emerging issues will also be discussed in this course.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意介紹雷射加工之理論及實務，注重製程參數之研究，教導學生如何掌握製程，以達到精密製造的要求。內容包括雷射輔助製造程序、雷射加工設備、雷射加工原理、系統分析、實驗設計、雷射加工實例。
description.en: Introducing theory and practice of laser material processing. Emphasizing the study of manufacturing factors. Letting the students know how to control manufacturing process, and fulfill the demand of precision manufacturing. The course content is : laser assisted manufacturing processes, facilities for laser material processing, the principles of laser material processing, system analysis, examples of laser material processing.

description.zh: 如何藉由商務模型的分析，建置數位化協同產品設計與開發環境，並說明資料管理、構型管隨著網路時代的來臨，不但造成數位化協同產品設計與開發觀念的興起，也造成數位化協同平台技術逐漸成熟，並且將同步工程觀念的實現更往前邁進一大步。本課程是從數位化協同產品設計與開發概念之介紹開始，使學生明白數位化協同產品設計與開發在現代製造業中的重要性，接著介紹理與工作流程管理等相關實務應用觀念。
description.en: Information and network technologies have promoted the traditional concurrent engineering to the next generation. The collaborative e-design and e-development concept has been more popular in industries. This course is introduced from the concept of collaborative product design and development to help students understanding the importance of collaborative e-design and e-development in modern industries. Furthermore, the business model analysis method is provided to construct the collaborative environment of e-design and e-development. In addition, some real cases of data management, configuration management, and workflow management are mentioned.

name.zh: 數位化設計與開發特論
name.en: Special Topics on e-Design and e-Development

description.zh: 機械手臂基礎理論，內容包含座標轉換、機械臂運動學、反運動學、動力學、軌跡規畫、機械臂設計、機械臂控制、機械臂的程式語言等。
description.en: It is a fundamental course concerning the theories of robotic manipulators. Topics contain frame transformations, manipulator kinematics, inverse kinematics, dynamics, trajectory planning, manipulator design, control of manipulators, robot programming languages.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意表面現象，介面反應等與近代高科技技術，如鍍膜工程，表面處理，腐蝕，磨潤，微機電，感測器，半導體技術等息息相關，且日益重要。表面分析是原子層次的相關研究，它包括振動，電子或離子頻譜分析，微技術等之應用。主要的項目包含，表面形貌觀察 (SEM, BSEM, AFM), 成份分析 ( 光譜分析，質譜分析，EDX ), 結構分析 ( XRD, AES, ESCA, XPS ), 鍵結分析 ( Raman 光譜，FTIR ), 表面粗糙度，膜厚，附著力，內應力等膜之特性分析。
description.en: Surface phenomena and processes occurring at interface are becoming increasingly important in a wide variety of industrial applications including the areas of films coating surface treatments, conclusion, triobology, microelectronics, sensors and semi-conductor technologies.  Accompanying this is an ever-growing need for surface characterization allowing better definition of processes occurring at a microscopic level.Surface analysis is the use of vibration, electron or ion spectroscopic and microscopic techniques for the study of material at the atomic level, it includesSEM, AFM, XRD, EDX, ESCA, XPS, AES, Raman Spectrum, and FTIR analysis.

description.zh: 1. 介紹計算機網絡和 Internet， 通信協議體結構， 分封交換 2. 應用層協議：HTTP，FTP，SMTP，DNS，P2P， 套接編程和 Web 服務器實現。3. 傳輸層協議：TCP，UDP4. 網路層協議：IP5. 數據鏈接層協議：Ethernet, LAN6. 無線和移動網絡
description.en: 1. Introduction to computer networks and the Internet. Protocolarchitectures (TCP/IP, OSI). Packet switching 2. Application Layer Protocols: HTTP, FTP, SMTP, DNS, P2P. Socket programming and Web server implementations. 3. Transport Layer Protocols: TCP, UDP 4. Network Layer Protocols: IP 5. Data Link Layer Protocols: Ethernet. Local area networks 6. Wireless and Mobile Network

description.zh: 冷凍空調概論、基礎知識與定義、空氣熱力學、基本冷凍循環與應用分析、壓縮理論及壓縮機性能分析、冷凍空調系統組成 - 壓縮機、冷凝器、冷媒控制器、蒸發器、冷凍介質－冷媒、二次冷媒吸收劑及冷凍油、冷媒管路及配件、空調處理過程及空調維護分析。
description.en: Refrigeration & air conditioning Introduction Fundamentals & definitions Psychrometrics Basic refrigeration cycles & application analysis Compression cycle theory & performance of compressors Compression system compositions- compressor, condenser, refrigerant controls Cooling mediums- refrigerants, secondary refrigerants, absorbents, refrigeration oils. Refrigerant piping & accessories. Air conditioning processes & cycles analysis.

description.zh: 法學概論，顧名思義是在介紹法律原理，以啟發學生法學研究的興趣。然而，法學涵蓋的層面甚廣，法學緒論的課程，只能大略介紹各種法律的共通原理，就繁駁的法律現象，作綜合的引說，俾使初學法律的人，不僅能粗知「實定法」的共通原則，還可藉此原則來培養法律見解和修養，執簡馭繁，因而體會法律的性質、內涵和理念。有關本課程的教授方式，擬先介紹法律的基概念及原理，並以答問之方式訓練學生邏輯反思的能力，同時輔以日常屢見之法律實例問題。如此，學生不僅可以可以學習正確的法律觀念和知識，並可培養縝密思辨的能力，將課堂上所習得的知識應用落實在日常生活中，以達保障並維護自己及他人權益之目的。
description.en: Introduction of Law is to introduce the theory of law and to promote students' interest to study law. Since the field of law is very broad but the time is limited, this course can briefly explain common principles of law, complex phenomena of law, etc. The main purpose of this course is to let students catch the concept of common principles of "lex scripta."  Also, this course aims to promote students' knowledge about law, thus cultivating their spirit of abiding by law.  This course will introduce the basic concept and theory of law first. Then students will be given logical training through discussion.  Besides, the general cases and problems of law will be covered as well. Through this course, students can not only get correct concepts of law, but learn to protect their/others' right.

notes: 108 (含) 前：法治核心；109：社會與法治

description.zh: 本課程之目的將探討酵素的功能及結構。針對醣類水解？水解各式各樣的多醣類做詳細探討。將目前已歸類的 96 家族中有晶體結構的家族中選出幾種家族做詳細的學習。從已發表文獻中來瞭解水解？可特定水解多醣類的特性。
description.en: This course will focus on glycoside hydrolases that hydrolyze various carbohydrates. Glycoside hydrolases have been classified to 96 families to date. The number of enzymes will be increase by time.

notes: ◎ 中英文授課   與高分所研究所合開 (上課時間四 ABC)

description.zh: 本課程為本校「智慧鐵道學程」的選修課程。課程開授之目標，是希望藉由課堂講授與實際場域參訪的方式，使修課學生能夠瞭解鐵道號誌系統的內涵。號誌系統是列車運行的控制系統。其功用必需兼顧整個鐵道運輸系統的「安全」、「迅速」、與「經濟」。由於號誌系統本身屬於跨管理、通訊與控制等專業領域的技術，因此，本課程是以同時段合院授課的方式、針對選讀學程之學生、邀請鐵道號誌系統專家、以業師的身份共同參與授課。本課程會要求修課同學於期末報告時，針對管理、通訊與自動控制等三部分提出號誌系統規劃與評估報告，並邀請鐵道號誌系統專家擔任評審。
description.en: This course is one of the optional courses for the Intelligent Railway Curriculum. The goal of this course is, via both in-class lecturing and field-trip visiting, to have participant students realize the contents of Railway Signal System. The signal system is the control system of train operation. To give consideration to safety, rapidness and economy of entire railway transportation system, this system will be required. Since the signal system is the technology including management, communication and automatic control, this course is a joint-lecture among departments inside our college with synchronized class hours. The industrial instructors for the participant students include experts on railway signal system from relevant fields in intelligent rail industry. In the student reports, they will demonstrate the railway signal system planning and evaluation report for the management, communication and automatic control.

name.zh: 鐵道號誌與行車控制系統
name.en: Railway Signal and Traffic Control System

notes: 與日間部機械三、四年級合開

description.zh: 課程主要為介紹實用型單晶片微處理機的基本原理，學習微處理器的整體架構，進而編寫程式控制晶片硬體及週邊應用模組電路，令學習者能利用小型微處理器達到自動控制系統應用之能力。課程內容包括：1. 單晶片微處理機架構簡介 2. 基本控制指令介紹 3. 實習板及開發環境使用 4.LED 閃爍控制及 LED 矩陣輸出實習 5. 發聲控制實習 6. 超音波模組控制實習 7.LCD 顯示控制實習 8. 紅外線控制應用實習 9.RFID 控制應用實習 10. 期末專題實習
description.en: The goal of this course is to introduce fundamental theories behind single-chip microcontroller. We will also teach the structure of microcontroller and how to use basic instructions to control the hardware and I/O module circuits. The lab content includes:1.Introduction to single-chip microcontroller2.Introduction to basic instructions3.Experiment board and IDE4.LED flash control and LED matrix practice5.Speaker control practice6.Ultrasonic sensor module practice7.LCD display practice8.Infrared sensor module practice9.RFID module practice10.Final Project practice

name.zh: 微處理機及自動控制應用實務

notes: * 日職合開；綜科 306；總人數上限 40 人

description.zh: 1. 集合，序列與函數 2. 基礎邏輯 3. 關聯式 4. 計數（排列，組合）5. 圖與樹（基礎圖論）6. 遞迴式與演算法 7. 有向圖
description.en: 1.Sets Sequences and Function2.Elementary Logic3.Relations4.Counting5.Graph and Tree6.Recursion Trees and Algorithms7.Digraphs

description.zh: 此課程旨在說明決策理論之基本觀念，及其在真實世界裡相關決策問題之分析。使學生具備了解並建構決策問題，建構並推估決策之不確定性，以及建構並評估效用模式之能力。
description.en: This course provides an overview of the basic concepts of decision theory and their applications on the real-world decision problems. Students will learn about the problem identification and modeling, the modeling and estimation of the associated uncertainty, and modeling and evaluation of the utility function.
