description.zh: 公司治理已成為廿一世紀企業組織架構調整之重大議題，如何經由管理策略及法制設計使台灣企業經營回歸股東長期價值及利益，為政府、交易所與公會等自律機關、及企業經營者必須面對之問題。在法制上，獨立董事監察人、審計委員會之設置、公司自律守則之擬議、股東會之運作，均衝擊我國公司法、證券交易法及交易所規則現行管理架構及規範；在實務上，上市櫃公司如何順利接受公司治理之理念及管理規範，以提昇公司營運的外在評價與體質。
description.en: The corporate governance had been the enterprise framework adjustment of the main issue of the 21 century. How do the manage the corporate strategy and system of the law to make the profit for the shareholder, government and enterprise. The main purpose of the course to help the learner to understand the law of corporate and the practice of the enterprise.

notes: (群組 1) 經營與策略管理，北科附工 302 室

description.zh: 本課程教授人工智慧技術的基礎理論與實務技巧，並對於人工智慧在製造業、服務業、金融業的應用，提供啟發性的基本認知與創意，以激發學生在人工智慧領域的創新應用。課程內容包括：人工智慧基礎、機器學習、大數據技術、深度學習、生成對抗網路、創業家思維、設計思考、商業模式、人工智慧與現代科技、工業 4.0、人工智慧的製造業應用個案、人工智慧的服務業應用個案、人工智慧的金融應用個案。
description.en: This course aims to teach students the basic concepts and practical techniques of artificial intelligence and to introduce its applications on manufacturing, service, and finance industries. The course focuses on inspring students for innovative artificial intelligence applications. The course includes: artificial intelligence basics, machine learn-ing, big data, deep learning, generative adversarial network, entrepreneurial thoughts, design thinking, business models, artificial intelligence and modern technologies, industry 4.0, real case applications on manufacturing, service, finance industries.

notes: (群組 3) 工業與科技管理，北科附工 302 室

description.zh: 本課程是教導學生金融科技的基本概念，使學生能夠建立金融科技的創新應用。內容包括：金融科技概論、金融科技商業模式、P2P 借貸、虛擬貨幣、雲端服務、第三方支付、群眾募資、P2P 匯兌、區塊鏈、跨境電商、程式交易、機器人理財與期末專題製做。
description.en: This course is to instruct students the basic concepts of financial technology and to enable students to develop innovative applications of financial technology. The contents include introduction to financial technology, business models of financial technology, P2P lending, virtual money, third-party payment, crowd funding, P2P remittance, blockchain, cross-border e-commerce, program trading, and robotic financial advisory.

notes: (群組 7) 資訊管理，北科附工 304 室

description.zh: 資訊安全以全面觀點說明執行完整的資訊與通訊安全管理所需考量的各個層面，課程包括：資訊安全管理國際標準、資訊安全政策與組織、人力資源安全、資產管理、存取控制、密碼學與金鑰管理、實體與環境安全、作業與通訊管理 系統獲取、開發及維護、供應商管理、資訊安全事故管理、營運持續管理之資訊安全層面、制度及法規的遵循
description.en: Information Security provides a comprehensive view of information and communication security. This course content includes as follows: information security management international standards, information security policy and organization, human resource security, asset management, access control, cryptography and key management, physical and environmental security, operations and communication management system acquisition, development and maintenance, supplier management, information security incident management, operational sustainability management, information security aspects, systems and regulatory compliance.

notes: (群組 7) 資訊管理，北科附工 304 室

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹人力資源與組織管理的進階理論與實務，內容包括了 (但不限於) 人才任用、訓練與發展、績效評估、薪酬管理、組織設計、領導、工作激勵、以及工作團隊運作等等重要議題。課堂上並討論上述理論對於管理實務上的意涵。
description.en: This course introduces many advanced topics of human resource management, organization theory, and organization behavior. Topics include (but not limited to) staffing, training and development, performance appraisal, compensation, organization design, leadership, work motivation, workgroup functioning. Implications for managerial practice will be discussed in this class.

description.zh: 本課程主要內容包括：（1）生產策略（2）產品設計與規劃（3）製程設計與規劃（4）廠址選擇（5）產能規劃（6）資源需求規劃（7）品質管理（8）物料管理（9）存貨管制。
description.en: The course mainly includes following topics：（1）operation strategy, （2）products planning and designing, （3）process planning and designing,（4）location strategy, （5）capacity planning, （6）material requirement planning, （7）quality management, （8）material management,（9）inventory management.

description.zh: 資訊科技是整合策略，使用者和組織系統，幫助高階主管達成組織目標，以及了解資訊科技。本課程學習主題：透過資訊系統獲取策略優勢，透過資訊系統應用，支援管理和執行資訊科技應用，獲得競爭優勢。全課程以哈佛個案研討方式進行。
description.en: The need for information-based support for managers is increasing as the modern management imperatives of reach and to meet their organization's goals. Information management function provides information to support operations, management analysis, and decision- making functions in an organization. We will also look at the role in formation play in helping managers meet goals by examining the characteristics of information systems that make managers' job easier. Topic of learning: Acquiring strategic advantage through information systems. Supporting managers and executives through IS applications. Managing the risk inherent in developing and using IS applications. Attaining and practicing technological leadership. This course is taught by HBS cases.

description.zh: 1. 電場強度電通密度、磁場強度、磁通密度電荷與電流之介紹；2. 材料之導電特性，介電特性與導磁特性之介紹；3. 向量數學分析之複習；4. 馬克斯威爾方程式與羅倫磁力；5. 靜電場之介紹；6. 靜電問題之解決；7. 靜磁場之介紹；8. 靜磁問題之解決。
description.en: To make the students understand the basic concepts and applications of Electromafneties which includes :1.Electromafnetic Model.2.The Vector Analysis.3.Static Electric Fields.4.Electrostatic Problems`Solutions.5.Steady Eletric Currents.6. Steat Mafnetic Fields.7.Time Varying Fields and Maxwells`Equations.8.Plane Electromapnetic Waves.9.Theory and Applications of Transmission Lines.10.Wavef uide and Carity Resonators.11.Antenna and Radiation Theory.

description.zh: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
description.en: The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in learning how to process, and decipher the readings that serve as springboards for reading skills development, vocabulary building, language analysis, and thought-provoking discussions. The readings include a variety of viewpoints on global topics centered around social issues, the environment, psychology, business, and technology.  Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

name.zh: 進階英文閱讀與聽講練習

description.zh: 課程包含以下主題 1. 交流馬達簡介 2. 交流馬達機電能量轉換基礎 3. 磁性材料 4. 交流馬達繞線 5. 交流馬達設計原理 6. 交流馬達之有限元素分析 7. 交流馬達之機械設計
description.en: The contents of this course include:1. Introduction of AC motors2. Energy conversion and AC electric machine basics 3. Magnetic materials 4. AC electric machine winding 5. Design principles of AC electric machines6. Finite element analysis of AC electric machines 7. Mechanical design of AC electric machines

description.zh: 智慧手機、智慧車、智慧家電、智慧電網、智慧化控制系統等，一場科技革命正熱鬧展開。看似單一產品的創新，背後其實有著更大的驅動力，那就是當行動通訊與網際網路結合後，催生出來的 Mobile Internet 新領域，所有資料都上網、所有物品都連網、所有人都掛網，個人到企業都必須做好準備，因此，當企業在邁向資訊化與自動化的同時，工業工程系責無旁貸的需將行動運算納入考量。本課程的目標在幫助學生瞭解雲端運算在工廠上的應用，學習建構所謂服務導向的企業，以及提供進階之程式開發知識，與跨入 3G 最新手機開發平台，培養未來開發手機程式設計之技術實力，使學生具備獨立開發手機應用程式的能力。
description.en: This is an introduction course of mobile computing. The course is designed principally to provide the Followings topics: 1. fundamentals of mobile technology; and applications, 2. Location-based service 3. Could-based computing 4. Mobile applications; 5. Mobile programming

name.zh: 資訊與通訊科技在工業工程之應用
name.en: Information and Communication Technologies for Industrial Engineering

description.zh: 本課程說明知識的定義、知識的分類、產業知識的產生和移轉，進而探討知識的創新，並利用知識管理提升產業生產及營運的效率，產業應用知識管理的概況和案例
description.en: This course is to explain definition of the knowledge, classification of the knowledge and generation and transfer of the knowledge. Moreover, the innovation of the knowledge will be discussed. Using knowledge management, it will improve the efficiency of the production and operation of the business. The applications and examples of the knowledge management will be included.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意自動控制概論，汽車自動變速簡介，液動基本原理，液體接合扭力變換器，行星齒輪與超速控制，自動閥控系統與換檔裝置，液壓油與液壓油之冷卻，電動自動變速簡介，各式變速箱舉例。
description.en: Introduction to Automatic Control, Introduction to AutomobileTransmission, Hydraulic Principle, Hydraulic Coupling, Planetary Gears, Automatic Transmission Valve System, Hydraulic Oil Cooling System, Introduction to Electrical Transmission System.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意．煞車動力學，煞車性能之極限，液壓煞車系統及元件，鼓式煞車，碟式煞車，駐車煞車，真空輔助動力煞車，液壓輔助動力煞車，電動輔助動力煞車，防鎖死煞車系統．
description.en: Brake Dynamics, LImit of Braking Performance, Hydraulic-Brake-System Components, Drum Brake, Disc Brake, Parking Brake, Vacuum-Assist Power Brake, Hydraulic-Assist Power Brake, Electro-Hydraulic-Assist Power Brake, Antilock Brakes System。

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.  This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。

For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 探討邊坡穩定、滲流、壓密及現地試驗土壤力學之分析方法 (1) 邊坡穩定分析理論及案例應用 (2) 平面滲流分析 (3) 壓密理論及沉陷分析 (4) 現地試驗土壤力學分析及其應用含電子震測錐試驗、平鈑膨脹儀試驗、水力破裂錐試驗及表面波震測試驗分析等。
description.en: 英課名：Advanced soil mechanics        Probe slope stability, seepage, consolidation and         soil mechanics analysis method of present the earth         test.      （1）The theory of slope stability analysis and case         application.      （2）Plane seepage analysis.      （3）Theory of consolidation and analysis of sink.      （4）Soil mechanics analysis of present the earth test         and that application. Include electron shake measure         cone test, plane expand instruments test, hydraulic         power rupture cone test and surface wave shake         measure test analysis, etc.

description.zh: 1. 結構物劣化形態，介紹.2. 目視檢測與非破性檢測。3. 現況評估與分析。4. 維修與補強設計。
description.en: 1.Reterioration types of concrete structures. 2.Visual an Non-estructive inspection. 3.Conition Evaluation and Analysis. 4.Maintenance and Repair Design.

name.zh: 結構物檢測評估及補強

description.zh: 本課程旨在對非工程類科出身之研究生，做有系統基礎材料科學之建立。課程包括 (1) 原子鍵結與配位 (2) 晶體 [原子規律性](3) 固相中之不規律性 (4) 相平衡 (5) 材料微結構 (6) 反應速率 (7) 材料破壞學 (8) 導電材與半導材料 (9) 陶瓷材料 (10) 聚合物及複合材料
description.en: This course is aimed at systematically introducing some important concepts of material engineering for students who were not an engineer training in their BS. The course covers (1)Atomic Bonding and Coordination (2)Crystal Structure (3)Disorder in Solid Phase (4)Phase Equilibria (5)Microstructures (6)Reaction Rate (7)Deformation and Fracture (8)Conducting and Semi-conducting Materials (9)Ceramic Materials (10)Polymer and Composites.

description.zh: 本課程適用於一般大專之決策分析課程。其目的在說明決策理論之基本觀念，及其在真實世界裡相關決策問題之分析。本課程授課主題包括：不考慮機率之決策問題、與機率有關之決策問題、獲取額外資訊之決策分析、效益分析、遊戲理論。相關之授課內容包括：機率分配、期望值方法、貝氏分析、完全資訊與額外資訊之期望值。
description.en: This is an undergraduate course dealing with decison making and analysis.The objective of this course is to interpret the basic concepts of decision theory and its applications on some real world decision analysis problims.The main topics of this course include decision making without probability,decision making with probability,decison analysis with additional information,utility theory,gametheory.The related studies includes prlbability distribution,expected value approach,Bayesian analysis,expected value of perfect informatin and sample information.

description.zh: 藉由國內外設計競賽主題與產學合作設計案進行實際演練，著重於資料蒐集、商品分析、創新構想與成果表達之進階能力養成，期讓學生在國內外設計競賽舞台上展現光芒，在產學合作中習得實務經驗並獲致產業界肯定。因此本課程旨在以實際演練達成兼具創新性與商品化專業設計能力養成。
description.en: Advanced Product Design (I) educates students to identify and resolve design problems - innovatively and with sensitivity to the social, physical and ecological environment.  Students learn to analyze and solve diverse design problems from technical, aesthetic, social and ecological viewpoints. Students are given the resources to identify, expand and test personal and professional development through an intensive exploration of design ideas.  Innovation is stressed, along with the ability to refine formal design issues.  There are numerous opportunities for students to work with industry through corporate-sponsored studio projects and design competitions.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹研究電腦輔助設計軟硬體，並藉設計實例演練，以熟悉研究電腦輔助設計軟應體之操作與功能。
description.en: To introduce and study the software of computer-aided-design. By the design project practice, to be adept at the operation and function of computer-aided-design software.

description.zh: 聯合國全球契約 (UN Global Compact) 於 2004 年首次提出 ESG 的概念，由環境 (environment)、社會 (social)、公司治理 (corporate governancer) 評估一家企業的永續 (sustainability) 發展指標，提出如何實踐 CSR 的原則。2008 年全球金融海嘯爆發時，更獲得關注。ESG 為衡量一家企業經營的績效指標，亦即市場參照的投資標準。因此，注重環境永續、社會責任與公司治理的 ESG 原則，已成全球風潮，更是決定企業未來是否能順利接到訂單之關鍵，也是維繫企業在產業鏈永續發展之命脈。換言之，落實 ESG 原則，將帶動企業高成長、創造更多的社會福祉。本課程介紹環境永續、社會責任與公司治理面向的理論與實務及其實踐的能力，結合國內企業推動 ESG 之相關做法與成功發展經驗，進而發掘、陳述、分析 ESG 如何促使企業創造出新的商業經營模式？推動 ESG 創造企業新價值與股東財富以及公司利潤間如何求取平衡？並進而提供解決問題之能力。
description.en: The UN Global Compact first proposed the concept of ESG in 2004. The environment, social, and corporate governance assess the sustainability development indicators of a corporation and propose how to practice CSR. When the global financial tsunami broke out in 2008, ESG gained more attention. ESG is a performance indicator that measures the operation of an enterprise, that is, the investment standard referenced by the market. Therefore, ESG principles focusing on environmental sustainability, social responsibility and corporate governance have become a global trend. It is also the key to determining whether a corporation can successfully receive orders in the future, and it is also the lifeblood of maintaining the sustainable development of the company in the industry supply-chain. In other words, the implementation of ESG principles will drive high growth of corporation and create more social well-being.This course introduces the theory and practice of environmental sustainability,

description.zh: 1.	建立企業經營管理的基本認知 2.	企業管理的經營模式認知 3.	導入運用的方法與案例 4.	提升學生經營管理能力
description.en: 1.	Establish basic understanding of business management2.	Cognition of business model of enterprise management3.	Methods and cases of introduction and application4.	Improve students' management ability

notes: (群組 1) 經營與策略管理 (聯輔會)，台北上課

description.zh: 本課程將以近期著作權法著名案例的評析，培養學生關鍵的基礎能力，再導入若該著作為人工智慧自行創作或人類以人工智慧為輔具所創作之法律爭議，鼓勵學生從比較法考察及跨域科法整合之觀點，剖析立法、司法或行政所面臨的問題，並探求可能解決問題的具體措施或建議方案。
description.en: This course will analyze recent well-known copyright cases, expecting that relevant fundamental capability of students can be built.  Further, legal issues will be introduced in dealing with the copyright work created by AI itself, or created by human beings who are aided by AI.  Besides, efforts will be made to encourage students to analyze the problems encountered in legislative, judiciary, and administrative sectors, with considerations on comparative law and with viewpoints from integration of law and technology, and to propose concrete measures and suggestions that may help to solve the problems.

description.zh: 本課程將以智慧財產局最新頒佈之「專利侵權判斷要點」為藍本，主要介紹專利侵權判斷流程、專利請求項之解釋、專利侵權之比對與判斷、均等論之限制事項。並輔以國內外案列閱讀與討論，也瞭解未來專利侵害之發展趨勢。。
description.en: Based on "The Essential of Patent Infringement Assessment (2015)" issued by the Taiwan Intellectual Property Office, this course will focus on critical topics, such as the procedure of patent infringement judgement, claims interpretation, comparing the properly interpreted claims to the accused devices, Doctrine of Equivalents and limitations on the Doctrine of Equivalents. Furthermore, through some Taiwan and U.S. infringement cases, participants will be familiar with the trend of patent infringement.

name.zh: 專利侵害鑒定與專利爭訟專題研究
name.en: Seminar on Patent Infringement Assessment and Patent Litigation

description.zh: 本課程將探討 (1) 智財商業模式與智財交易 (2) 英美契約法 (3) 智財授權契約規範 (4) 授權程序與稽核 (5) 技術合作契約 (6) 智財合資契約及章程
description.en: This course will illustrate the following issues: (1) IP Business Model and IP Transactions, (2) Anglo-American Contract Law,  (3) Definition,  Regulation, Types & Management of IP License,  (4)License Agreement Auditing for Licensing Business, (5)  Technical Cooperation Contract, (6) IP Joint Venture Contract and Articles of Association.

name.zh: 國際智權契約與技術移轉

description.zh: 科技的進步不僅利於人類文明的創新，也考驗當代法律制度是否能確保法正義的理念與法秩序的維持。本課程主要是探討我國與先進國家智慧財產權、公平交易法、消費者保護法、電子商務、網路犯罪與生物科技法律等問題。
description.en: The advance of technology facilitates an innovation of human civilization; in addition, it also proves to be a test of the modern legal system-seeing whether a balance between legal justice and legal order can be maintained. Some important topics available for class discussion are: intellectual property, fair trade law, consumer protection, e-commerce, internet crimes and biological technology.

description.zh: 本課程主要是在於介紹一些駭客常用的攻擊方法和可能使用工具，並藉由這些技術的解說讓學生瞭解實際駭客的攻擊行為與思維模式，進而習得如何保護所管理的網路或資訊系統免於被攻擊成功。課程中將輔以實機操作，教導您如何利用現有電腦資源掃描及測試系統的安全問題，藉以保護系統安全，課程中將加強實際的上機操作，藉由上課所模擬的網路環境中，讓同學能夠實際感受攻擊的可能實況
description.en: This course is mainly to introduce network and system attack methods and security assessment tools used by hackers, and to explain the attack behavior and thinking strategy of hackers through the explanation of these technologies. In addition, this course teaches students learn how to protect the managed network or information system to against from being compromised successfully. The course will be supplemented by practices, and teaching students how to use the existing tools to scan and test the security of the system. In order to protect the security of the system, the course will focus on the system and network practices, which can let the students feel the possible network and system attacks.

description.zh: 由於網路的發展迅速，電子商務已經是必然的趨勢。本課程中介紹經營電子商務所需的各種重點技巧，包括產品規劃，通路規劃，商業網站設計、行銷網站建置與管理、網路行銷工具、行銷資訊系統、Google 管理工具的應用、關鍵字廣告、商業部落格、電子郵件與會員電子報廣告管理，網路行銷企劃案實務等重要議題，讓同學對經營電子商務有一個整體的了解。
description.en: This course will teach how to management the e-commerce.

description.zh: 本課程重點在於台灣專利法的主要法律議題，包括產業利用性、新穎性、進步性、可實施性、說明書支持性、請求項不明確性、請求項解釋、侵權行為、救濟手段、專利授權、強制授權、專利訴訟之展開和舉發。本課程教材包括專利法教科書、智慧局頒發的專利審查基準和智慧財產法院裁判。
description.en: This course focuses on the main legal issues of the Taiwan Patent Law including industrial utility, novelty, inventive step, enablement, written description, claim indefiniteness, claim interpretation, infringement, remedies, patent licensing, compulsory licensing, initiation of patent litigation, and opposition. The class materials include a patent law textbook, patent examination guidelines issued by the Taiwan Intellectual Property Office and recent decisions from the Taiwan Intellectual Property Court.

description.zh: 倫理學 (Ethics) 是討論「應不應該」的一門哲學分支。倫理學可分為「微觀倫理學」：探討個人性之行為的應不應該的問題，以及「宏觀的倫理學」：探討整個社會的政治、經濟、法律、社會等方面的問題。倫理學亦可區分為「規範倫理學」及「應用倫理學」兩大類，前者探討善的定義與判斷準則、動機論與結果論、人的意志是否自由、決定論與責任、自律與他律、幸福與快樂、哪些德行 (virtue) 值得追求等等課題，後者則是運用倫理學觀點探討諸如安樂死、墮胎、環保、複製人等種種課題。本課程主要目的是在對倫理學課題與種類作一個基本的介紹，訓練及培養學生在倫理問題上思考的能力，期能讓學生在作道德問題的判斷與抉擇上能夠有所進步。
description.en: This course will introduce basic ideas of Ethics to students. The topics will include: the definition and criterion of good, motivation and consequence, the problem of free will, determinism and responsibility, autonomy and discipline by others, happiness and pleasure, and virtues. This course will also touch upon those issues in applied Ethics, such as abortion, environment, business ethics, death sentence, etc.

description.zh: 本課程以個案研究和文獻探討方式讓學生了解總體經濟的環境（包括 GDP、GNP、失業率、景氣循環、通貨膨脹、政府的財政政策和貨幣政策的規劃與制定、匯率制度、總合供給與需求等課題）。
description.en: This course is to analyze the macroeconomic policy, international economy, business cycles, government policy, exchange rate and other macroeconomic-related issues. The course will be taught with case studies and journal literature. Group discussions are needed.

notes: 前三週在六教 727 上課
